loans.name: Francisco Salomon

texts.es: Francisco se 71 años de edad vive desde hace 20 años en casa propia y tiene 30 años de dedicarse a la venta de verduras en un puesto del mercado de su localidad. Francisco tiene la necesidad de reparar el techo de su casa por lo que solicitó a FUSAI un crédito para comprar la lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera para la estructura además sustituirá la teja que está quebrada. Espera que para las próximas semana pueda iniciar con los trabajos y se compromete a solventar puntualmente el pago de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Francisco is 71 years old and has lived in his own home for 20 years. He has worked for 30 years selling vegetables in a stall in the market of his town.

Francisco needs to repair the roof of his house, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood for the structure. He will also replace the clay tile, which is broken. He hopes to start this work in the coming weeks. He promises to punctually make his payments.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails, wood and clay tiles to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Carmen Elena

texts.es: Carmen tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 16 años de edad. Carmen se gana la vida mediante la venta de pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, queso, frijoles, etc.) De esta forma mantienen a su hija y trata de darle lo necesario. Con el fin de mejorar su seguridad y la de su hija solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de un portón, hierro, cemento, arena y grava para serrar la entrada de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Carmen is 39 years old and lives in her own home with her 16-year-old daughter. Carmen earns a living by selling pupusas, which are a prepared food made from corn dough, cheese and beans. With her business, Carmen supports her daughter and tries to give her all that she needs.

To improve her and her daughter’s security, Carmen is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy an entrance door, iron, cement, sand and gravel to close in the entranceway to her home.

loans.use: to buy an entrance door, iron, cement, sand and gravel to close in the entranceway to her home.

loans.name: Lidia Cristina

texts.es: Lidia de 43 años de edad reside junto a su compañero de vida quien se dedica a la agricultura y le colabora con la economía del hogar. Lidia es una mujer trabajadora quien se dedica a la crianza de patos y a la confección de prendas de vestir. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar. Lidia desea terminar un cuarto dormitorio el cual no ha podido terminar por falta de recursos económicos por lo que se se acercó  a FUSAI para solicitar este crédito y así poder comprar hierro, cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, para terminar el cuarto.
texts.en:
Lidia is 43 years old and lives with her partner, who works in agriculture. They work together meeting their household expenses. Lidia is hardworking and works raising ducks and making clothing. With these businesses she earns a living, and together with her partner they manage their household finances.

Lidia would like to finish the construction of a bedroom that she has not been able to finish because of a lack of financial resources. She went to FUSAI to request this loan to buy iron, cement, sand, gravel and brick to finish the bedroom.

loans.use: to buy iron, cement, sand, gravel and brick to finish the construction of a bedroom.

loans.name: Sector Norte Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SECTOR NORTE” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Elena es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, macramé en mantillas, venta de humintas, venta de comida, tejido de fajas, tienda de barrio, compra y venta de ganado.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Elena es integrante, ella indica que es la dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido y venta de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años cuando empezó a convivir con su esposo quien trabajaba en el mismo rubro.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará a pedido del cliente. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen esta auncente una socia, l que se tuvo que marchar por razones de trabajo.
texts.en:
The communal bank “SECTOR NORTE” will begin its third loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Achacachi regional office. It is comprised of eight members and led by a board of directors with Elena serving as president. The members carry out a variety of business activities such as blanket knitting, macramé shawl knitting, tamale sales, food sales, belt weaving, livestock purchase and sales, and running a neighborhood store.

The loan that they will take out will benefit micro-entrepreneurs such as the member Elena. She says that joined Pro Mujer two years ago by invitation from a promoter of the institution who visited her at home. Currently, Elena has a business of knitting and selling blankets. She says that she learned this trade several years ago when she started living with her husband who is in the same line of work.

The loan that she will take out is to buy wool which she will acquire from wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz. She will subsequently make her products and sell them by order. This form of work allows her to earn an income to support her family since she lives in a common-law marriage and has four children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that the likes the training that the institution offers. 

One member is absent in the above photo: she had to leave due to work-related reasons.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: Roberto de 41 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 15 años y 11 años de edad. Roberto trabaja como motorista de transporte pesado desde hace dos años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea terminar de construir el cuarto de la cocina ya que no ha podido terminar el techo de la misma por falta de recursos económicos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y polines.
texts.en:
Roberto is 41 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and two children, ages 15 and 11. For two years now he has earned a living as a heavy transport driver, and he supports his family with this work.

Roberto would like to finish the construction of his kitchen, the roof of which he has not been able to finish because of a lack of financial resources. For this reason he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting and wooden beams.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wooden beams to finish the construction of the roof of his kitchen.

loans.name: Maria Argelia

texts.es: María de 63 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa desde hace mucho tiempo. María se dedica a la venta quesadillas y queso fresco desde hace dos años. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. María desea mejorar la galera la cual le sirve para ordeñar las vacas y así poder sacar la leche y hacer el rico queso para la venta. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena, etc. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Maria is 63 years old and has for a long time now lived in her own home with her husband. Maria has worked for two years selling quesadillas and fresh cheese. With this business she earns a living and meets her household expenses.

Maria would like to improve the shed in which she milks her cows to make the delicious cheese she sells. For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, galvanized sheeting, cement and sand. She says that she has the capacity to pay that the loan requires.

loans.use: to buy bricks, galvanized sheeting, cement and sand to improve the shed in which she milks her cows.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan tiene 52 años de edad, vive con su esposa en casa propia. Juan es un pequeño comerciante que elabora artesanalmente manteles de tela con diferentes diseños y variedad de colores. La esposa de Juan hace todos los días tortillas las cuales vende a sus vecinos. Juan ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, arena, grava, hierro, bloques de concreto para construir un dormitorio. Juan está dispuesto a cancelar todas las cuotas que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
Juan is 52 years old and lives with his wife in their own home. Juan has a small business making artisanal tablecloths out of fabric with different designs and a variety of colors. Juan’s wife makes tortillas every day that she sells to neighbors.

Juan has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and concrete blocks to build a bedroom. Juan says that he is prepared to make all the payments that the loan requires.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and concrete blocks to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Roxana Maricela

texts.es: Roxana de 34 años de edad es madre soltera tiene dos hijo de 14 años de edad y uno de 1 año de edad. Roxana es una pequeña comerciante de ropa de primera calidad para hombres y mujeres. A diario desde hace 5 años tiene que recorrer largas distancias para poder vender su mercadería. Roxana desea dar mejores condiciones de vida a sus dos hijos. Actualmente su vivienda está mal distribuida, la cocina de leña se encuentra a la par del dormitorio de sus hijos y el humo de la cocina se introduce directamente al dormitorio, lo que le ha generado problemas respiratorios a sus dos hijos. Roxana a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para re ubicar la cocina y separar el dormitorio de esta; así que contratará la mano de obra y comprará la lámina y madera necesaria para hacer esta re ubicación de espacios, evitando que el humo de la cocina siga afectando la salud de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Roxana is 34 years old and a single mother of two children, ages 14 and 1. Roxana has a small business selling high-quality clothing for men and women. Everyday for five years now she has traveled long distances to sell her merchandise.

Roxana would like to improve her children’s living conditions. Currently her house is laid out poorly, with the wood-fire kitchen not separated from her children’s bedroom. The smoke from the kitchen goes directly into their bedroom, which has caused respiratory problems for both children. Roxana is requesting a loan from FUSAI to relocate her kitchen away from her children’s bedroom. She will use the loan to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood and to pay for the labor to relocate her kitchen so that the smoke no longer affects her children’s health.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood and to pay for the labor to relocate her kitchen away from her children’s bedroom.

loans.name: Milagro Elizabeth

texts.es: Milagro de 26 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus pequeños dos hijos (un niño de 6 años y una niña de 1 año de edad). Milagros se dedica a la venta de calzado por catalogo, su esposo es propietario de un pequeño taller de enderezado y pintado de vehículos. Milagro desea construir un dormitorio para sus hijos actualmente todos comparten una sola habitación. Por esa razón Milagro ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar madera, hierro, cemento y lámina galvanizada que utilizará para construir la habitación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Milagro is 26 years old and lives with her husband and two small children (a six-year-old boy and a one-year-old girl). Milagro works selling footwear by catalog. Her husband owns a small garage where he does body work and paints vehicles.

Milagro would like to build a bedroom for her children, as currently she, her husband and her children all share one room. For this reason, Milagro has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy wood, iron, cement and galvanized sheeting to build her children their own bedroom.

loans.use: to buy wood, iron, cement and galvanized sheeting to build her children their own bedroom.

loans.name: Diego Fernando

texts.es:
El es diego fernando, estudiante actual de la institución campo alto, se encuentra realizando el programa técnico en ensamble y mantenimiento de computadores, el cual desea finalizar, tiene 17 años de edad, termino el bachillerato en el colegio Instituto Cultural rafael maya con mención de honor y alto puntaje en el  ICFES, ahora por los resultados académicos  del primer semestre a demostrado interés en continuar este programa, tanto a si que el proyecto es culminarlo profesionalmente, quiere estudiar y trabajar para pagar la carrera profesional ayudar a la mama en el estudio del hermano menor,  ya que no han contado con el soporte del padre.    
 En este momento quiere el convenio con Kiva, para que pueda seguir con su carrera, puesto que el  convenio que tenia antes, con el cual pagaba una mensualidad mas económica ya no esta para este, el convenio qu etenia antes era de gran ayuda económica para la familia, este convenio impulsaba el desarrollo académico y facilitaba el desempeño de diego.    
El vive con la mama quien es cabeza de hogar, es empleada domestica  por días,  cuenta con ingresos que cubren los gastos básicos  y el hermano de 5 años que se encuentra estudiando, vive en un barrio estrato 2 en la localidad de suba. 
Las expectativas son, ser profesional en Ingeniería de Sistemas  y crear empresa, pues desde niño siempre demostró curiosidad por reparar los juguetes y objetos en general. 

A los señores de Kiva  le da gracias por la atención prestada y que Dios los bendiga.
texts.en:
He is Diego Fernando, current student of the Campo Alto Institution. He is found carrying out the technical program in computer assembly and maintenance, which he desires to finish. He is 17, he finished high school in the Instituto Cultural Rafael Maya school, with honors' mention and high grades on his final standardized exam. Now because of the academic results of the first semester, he has demonstrated interest in continuing with this program. Because his plan is to complete the professional program, he would like to study and work to pay for his degree program and to help his mother with his younger brother's school costs.

Currently, they feel the necessity to ask the favor of Kiva that they continue supporting given the agreement they had, with which they paid a lower monthly payment. They do not have this support this semester since it was a great help economically for the family. This support boosted academic development and facilitated Diego's development.

He lives with his mother, who is the head of household, domestic employee by day, has income that covers the basic expenses and the 5 year-old brother who is studying, lives in the Estrato 2 neighborhood in the Suba district.

The plans are to be a professional in Systems Engineering and create a business. Since he was a boy, he always demonstrated curiosity for repairing toys and objects in general.

To the people of Kiva, they give thanks for the attention, loan and that God blesses them.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items such as candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks and other items for his store.

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: Maria de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles entre otros tiene 6 años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio; en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Ella esta agradecida con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old and lives in her own home with her two children. She works selling fruits and vegetables, such as strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions and peppers. She has had this business for six years, which has given her a lot of experience in sales and has enabled her to obtain the best profits. Her selling location is strategically located and frequented by many people. She has earned many customers, who prefer her because her products are fresh, high-quality and are offered at good prices and with excellent service.

In recent weeks, demand has increased and Maria would like to take advantage of this opportunity to make a new investment in her business, but she does not have enough capital. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices. Maria is grateful for the support and promises to repay the loan, which she believes will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Maria Deonila

texts.es: Doña Maria de 49 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora, quien se dedica de lleno a su negocio, y de esta manera brindarle una vida mejor a su familia. María vive junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras, la cual esta ubicada en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, su esposo le ayuda con el negocio. María solicita un préstamo para poder comprar papas, cebollas, ejotes, sandias, piñas, guineos, etc. ya que de esta manera ella podrá obtener mejores ganancias y asi podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 49 years old and is a very hardworking woman.  She dedicates herself fully to her business so she can provide her family with a better quality of life.  Maria lives with her husband and three children in a home of her own and she sells fruits and vegetables in the market near her home, and has done this for several years.  Her husband helps her with the business.  Maria is asking for a loan to buy potatoes, onions, green beans, watermelons, pineapples, bananas, etc., so she can increase her earnings and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba está estudiando la carrera de análisis de sistemas, ella vio un gran futuro no solo para ella, sino también para su familia, es por eso que está estudiando.
Quiere ser una gran profesional que pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de sus conocimientos. Comenta que quiere hacer su tesis, y de esa forma poder tener su título y también poder hacer especializaciones.
Pide este préstamo para pagar sus cuotas y también para sus gastos de manutención.
texts.en:
Rosalba is studying to become a systems analyst and she sees a great future, not just for herself, but also for her family.  This is why she is studying.

She wants to be a great professional who can help others through her knowledge.  She says that wants to do her thesis and have a title so she can work in her specialty.

She is asking for this loan to pay her expenses and tuition.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es secretaria en un estudio Jurídico hace más de 2 años. Vive con sus en la ciudad de encarnación, y cuenta que su aspiración es seguir enriqueciendo sus conocimientos profesionales, es por eso que pone su mayor empeño siempre.
Está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, ya que quiere ser una profesional exitosa que el día de mañana sea de ayuda a las demás personas. Pide este préstamo ya que quiere poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma poder cubrir con anticipación esa obligación.
texts.en:
Maria is a secretary who has been studying law for more than two years.  She lives in the city of Encarnación and she aspires to continue enriching her professional knowledge; this is why she always puts forth her greatest effort.

She is studying to become a lawyer and wants to be a successful professional and help others in the future.  She is asking for a loan to pay her university expenses and be able to cover that expense with anticipation.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
Anibal es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, trabaja como funcionario de una agencia de Curuguaty.   Comenta que está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas cursando el tercer año.
Es un estudiante que se esfuerza mucho, y dice que su familia es su mayor fortaleza, ya que siempre lo han apoyado y le han dado lo que necesita para una vida sin necesidades.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma estar cerca de cumplir con su meta que es ser un profesional útil a los demás.
texts.en:
Anibal is from the city of Curuguaty and works as an official for a Curuguaty agency.  H says that she is in his third year of studying for a management career.

He is a student who puts forth lots of effort and says that his family is his greatest strength because they have always supported him and provided him with what he needs.

He is asking for this loan so he can pay his university tuition and be close to completing his goal of being a helpful professional for others.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
Liezel is from Plaridel and tends her own sari-sari store. She is 37 years old, and is raising her five children on her own. Through her store, she earns a meager income of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) per month, which supports her family's needs. Liezel has signed up for a membership to Paglaum MPC and applied for a loan of 15,000 PHP. She wants to restock her store's inventory but does not have enough means of her own to do it. 

Liezel wishes to save some of the increased profits to improve her family's living condition.

loans.use: to restock her inventory.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana Julia, tiene 50 años de edad, casada, tiene 4 hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Puerto Cortes junto a dos hijos. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, ella vendía todo tipo de mercadería. Hace mas de 6 años decidió establecer un negocio de venta de comidas ya que es rentable. El local esta ubicado Anexado a su casa donde vende refrescos, golosinas, comidas como pollo frito con tajadas, baleadas, fritas, tacos, y otros. Ella ha solicitado varios préstamos lo que ha permitido que su negocio se mantenga en crecimiento. Actualmente solicita el noveno ciclo y es por 30,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar insumos para la elaboración de comidas como ser harinas, carnes, frijoles, refrescos, lácteos, manteca, condimentos etc. Su meta es seguir trabajando con el negocio para satisfacer a sus clientes y tener un crecimiento con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Julia is 50 years old, married, has four children, and lives in a suburb of the town of Puerto Cortes with her children.  She has always been a merchant and sold all types of merchandise.  She decided to set up her food business more than six years ago because its more profitable.

Her shop is located as an annex to her home and she sells soft drinks, snacks, food such as fried chicken, baleadas, tacos, and other things.  She has asked for various loans which have allowed her business to keep growing.  Currently she is asking for 30,000 Lempiras so she can buy ingredients, such as flour, meat, beans, soft drinks, dairy, lard, condiments, etc. to make her dishes.  Her goal is to continue working with her business to satisfy her customers and grow with her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Saraswati

texts.en:
Saraswati is a rural housewife of 48 years from the village West Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She has four children (two sons and two daughters).  She lives with her husband and children.  Saraswati is illiterate and only knows how to sign her name.  Her husband, Narayan, 51 years old, is also illiterate and can only sign his name.  They live in their own small kachha house (mud, straw and bamboo made). Their two daughters are married and two sons are engaged in small business.

Saraswati's husband is an experienced farmer. To take care of her family, Saraswati's husband works hard to overcome the financial hardship of their family. Saraswati assists her husband.  They sell the agricultural products in the local market, which is the family's main source of income.

To continue the business in a sustainable way, they need to expand their business.  They have decided to start a potato cultivation business. Saraswati applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to purchase fertilizers and potato seeds to start cultivation of potatoes. The loan will help her run her agribusiness in a productive way.

Her goals are to assist her husband to cover the expenses of their family and to purchase a piece of land with the profit generated from the business to use for cultivation.

She is thankful to her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivation of potatoes.

loans.name: Minati

texts.en:
Minati is a 38-year-old hardworking lady of a small village of Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri district. She stays with her husband and two children. One is in class IX (grade 9) and other is in class VII (grade 7).  Minati and her husband are illiterate but know how to sign their name. Her husband is a van puller, working under a local owner, so the income is not sufficient to meet the educational expenses of their children and also household expenses.
 
Minati’s son, Krishna, is a meritorious student and the best boy in his class. If he could get private coaching then he could do much better in his final examination. All the teachers of his school are waiting for his outstanding result in final examination. Minati seeks this loan to support her son’s education so that he does not face any difficulty in receiving education. 

This loan would help her to pay the tuition fees, to purchase educational equipment like books, notebooks, pens, pencils, etc. and to pay private coaching fees for her son’s education.
 
Minati and Krishna (in the photo) are very much thankful to BJS and Kiva for this educational loan.

loans.use: To pay tuition fees, private coaching fees and to purchase educational equipment for her son.

loans.name: Ayomati

texts.en:
Ayomati, 29, lives in a remote region of West Bengal.  She lives in the small town of Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She lives with her husband and two sons. They live in their own small house. Ayomati is illiterate but knows how to sign her name. She could not receive education due to poverty, but she is willing to provide her children a higher education.

Her husband has been a van puller for many years and his earnings are hardly enough to cover the educational expenses of their children after managing the household expenses.  Her younger son, Shubhankar, is now studying in class VI (Grade 6) and very much serious with his studies as well as with his examinations. He is busy in his studies all day long as he has no private tutor.

Ayomati learned about BJS (Kiva’s partner) and applied for a loan of 15,000 INR for her son Shubhakar’s smooth education and for making him a deserving student in appearing for state board examination without any problem. With the loan amount she will pay the private tuition fee and buy necessary articles like books, notebooks, pen, geometry box, exercise copies, guide notes to let Shubhankar proceed a step forward for achieving good skill and knowledge. She wants her son to get the chance for admittance to a Bachelor of Arts class in future.

Ayomati and her son Shubhankar (as per photo) are grateful to BJS and Kiva for their support because Shubhankar is going ahead to higher classes without any monetary problems.

loans.use: To pay the tuition fees and buy necessary articles for her son’s educational purpose.

loans.name: Niyati

texts.en:
Niyati is a 53-year-old woman living in Dhupguri with her husband and two children. One of them is her son, Ranjit, of class X (grade 10), who is on the threshold of the secondary board examination. Both Niyati and her husband are illiterate and can sign their names only, but they are very much concerned in their children’s education.

Her husband is a farmer by profession and the family expenses are increasing gradually against their income. That is why some disputes arise in their children’s education. As Ranjit possess an outstanding merit, he might score high marks in the coming board exam, so to improve his educational skill and to give him proper tutorial help, Niyati is requesting a loan from BJS. This loan would help Ranjit to purchase educational equipment and to pay private tuition fees, so that he can receive education without any obstacle.
  
Ranjit in future wants to become a lawyer; this loan will help him to proceed towards his goal. Niyati and her elder son, Ranjit (pictured above), are thankful to BJS and Kiva for funding loan.

loans.use: To purchase educational equipment and to pay private tuition fees for her son’s education.

loans.name: Dashami

texts.en:
Dashami is a 43-year-old housewife who lives in Raipara village at Dhupguri with her husband, Ratan, and two daughters. Her daughters are now reading in class VII (grade 7) and class III (grade 3).

Though Dashami is illiterate and only can sign her name, still she is very much interested to educate her children and make them good citizens. Her elder daughter, Sampa, reading in class VII (grade 7), is a very intelligent student and her good performances in school examinations inspire Dashami to take a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) for her schooling expenses. 

Her husband, Ratan, is involved in selling firewood to the village market but their inconsistent income makes them unable to go ahead with their daughter’s education. Dashami takes the loan to purchase Sampa’s text books, pens, study materials etc, to pay the school fees, tuitions fees, caution money and for other necessary educational dealings.

Now Dashami and her daughter Sampa (as in the picture) are very much grateful to BJS and Kiva for funding the educational loan.

loans.use: To pay for books, pens, study materials and tuition fees for her daughter’s schooling.

loans.name: Maria Olinda

texts.es: Maria de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de us hogar. Doña Maria solicita un credito para comprar maiz por quintales para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica con su familia.
texts.en: Maria is 47 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and two children.  She has been selling tortillas from her home for a number of years, works seven days a week and has many customers because she is a hardworking and friendly person.  She helps her husband pay the household expenses with her earnings.  Maria is asking for this loan to buy quintals of dried corn so she can continue making tortillas and have greater earnings to improve her family’s financial stability.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Noemy Haydee

texts.es: Noemy de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanías hechas de barro desde hace 25 años, posee clientela ya establecida que la prefieren porque su trabajo es de excelente calidad y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Noemy esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de moldes de varios tamaños, barro, pintura y las herramientas necesarias para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noemy is 41 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and three children.  She has been making and selling clay arts and crafts for 25 years and has an established clientele who prefer to buy from her because of the excellent quality and good prices of her items.  She pays some of the household expenses with what she earns from her work.  Noemy is asking for a loan to buy molds of various sizes, clay, paint, and the tools she needs to continue with her work which is her only source of income.  This will allow her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Elsy Alicia

texts.es: Doña elsy de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo quien trabaja como albañil, ella se dedica  a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol también siembra hortalizas, adicional a eso también vende atol de chuco (atol hecho de maíz) los fines de semana, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere hacer una mejora en su casa encementando y colocando el techo, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza apara poder realizarlo por esa razon doña Elsy solicita un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, arena, laminas, y pago de mano de obra para poder vivir junto a su hijo mas seguros.
texts.en: Elsy is 62 years old and lives in her own home with her son who works as a mason.  She is a farmer and her principle crops are corn, and beans.  She also grows vegetables and also sells “atol de chuco” (a hot drink made from corn) on the weekends.  She uses the money she earns to pay some of her household expenses.  She wants to make some home improvements by adding cement and putting up a roof, but she does not earn enough money to do it, so Elsy is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy cement, sand, metal sheeting, and pay for labor so she and her children can live safer.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es: Delfia de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos y su esposo que trabaja como empleado,  ella  trabaja como costurera, ella se encarga de confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad de muchos clientes amigos y vecinos. Delfia elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas de vestir para vender en su casa de habitación, donde también se dedica a elaborar su trabajo con lo que puede obtener ganancias extras. Delfia solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa con lo que pueda realizar más trabajos y asi obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Delfia is 36 years old and lives in a home of her own with her four children and her husband, who works as an employee.  She works as a seamstress and makes formal clothing, uniforms, and casual clothing.  She is very detail oriented and develops her work very well, which allows her to count the loyalty of many customers, friends, and neighbors.  Delfia does work on order and also makes clothing to sell out of her home, where she also earns extra money.  Delfia is asking for a loan to buy fabric of different colors and patterns, as well as thread, needles, and everything needed to make the clothing so she can do more jobs and obtain more earnings so she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy tables and chairs, as well as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Dalia Yanira

texts.es: Dalia de 36 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos,ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Dalia is 36 years old, a single mother, and lives in her own home with her two children. She has a store where she sells basic household necessities such as beans, milk, eggs, bread and other items. She has many years with her business and that has given her experience in sales which allows her to obtain the best earnings. It is located in her home, in a very busy location, and is very well-known by people who live in the area. 

She has attracted a large clientele, as she has the store well stocked. She wants to expand her business and undertake a new investment, but needs working capital. That is why she is requesting loan from Integral which will allow her to buy what she needs for her store. She says she will pay off the debt and at the same time has confidence that she will provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy basic staples, cooking oil, sugar, candy, etc.

loans.name: Deysi Iduvina

texts.es: Deysi de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su nuera esposa del hijo que vive en estados unidos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de quesadillas desde hace 35 años, posee clientela ya establecida que la prefieren por que las quesadillas las vende a un buen precio y son de muy buena calidad con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda que recibe de su hijo logar salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en la parte de atrás de su vivienda, ponerle la puerta al baño y mejorar el horno donde cocina que es el que muestra la fotografía, por esa razón solicita un crédito para comprar los materiales necesarios como: arena, cemento, ladrillos, pago de mano de obra, barro, lamina, pintura, etc. y asi poder vivir junto con su nuera mas cómodas y seguras.
texts.en:
Deysi is 61 years old and lives in her own home with her daughter-in-law, the wife of her son who lives in United States. She has been making and selling quesadillas (tortillas stuffed with cheese) for 35 years. She has an already established clientele who prefer her because she sells the quesadillas at a good price, and they are of very good quality. 

With what she gets from her work and with the help she receives from her son, she is managing to cover her household expenses. She wants to improve her home by building a wall in the back of her property, by installing a door on the bathroom and improving the oven where she cooks, which is the one shown in the photograph. 

For that reason she is requesting a loan to buy the necessary materials, such as sand, cement, bricks, clay, sheet metal roofing, paint, and pay for labor.  This will enable her and her daughter-in-law to live more comfortably and securely.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, bricks, clay, sheet metal roofing, paint, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Henri

texts.es: Henri de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposa, el se dedica a la reparación y venta de escapes y radiadores desde hace varios años, posee clientela por su buen trabajo con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Henri esta solicitando un credito para la compra de herramientas y materiales que utiliza para su trabajo como: piezas, estaño, alambre, laminas, electrodos, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Henri is 38 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has been repairing and selling exhaust pipes and radiators for several years. 

He has a clientele because he does good work. With what he gets from his work he manages to pay for some of his household expenses. 

Henri is requesting a loan in order to buy tools and materials that he uses for his work, such as: parts, solder, wire, sheet metal, electrodes, etc. This is so that he can continue with his work, as that is his only source of income, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy parts, solder, wire, sheet metal, electrodes, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy recyclable metals, plastic and paper at wholesale

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable. Oscar se dedica a la pesca artesanal, contando con una lancha y algunas redes para obtener mariscos. Él se ha dedicado prácticamente toda su vida a esta actividad, la cual incluso ahora le permite salir adelante. El solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más redes para pescar, también anzuelos y otros instrumentos necesarios para realizar la pesca diariamente. Oscar desea darles una mejor vida a sus hijos en donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Oscar is 39 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their two children. He is a very hard-working and responsible person. Oscar is a small-scale fishermen, having a small boat and some nets to catch shellfish. He has devoted practically his entire life to this activity, which even today allows him to keep going. 

He is requesting a loan from Integral by means of which he will be able to have the money necessary to buy more fishing nets, as well as hooks and other tools he needs to carry out his fishing every day. Oscar wishes to give a better life to his children, where they can have everything they need.

loans.use: To buy fishing nets, hooks and other tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, cold cuts, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Ángela

texts.es: ángela de 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir, su taller está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, debido a que el años escolar está por iniciar, esta es la temporada en que se elaboran muchos uniformes, es por esto que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el fin de poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de hilos de colores, botones, telas, y otros más, para poder tener todo lo necesario para seguir con su trabajo. Angela desea mejorar sus ganancias y de este modo darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Angela is 46 years old and lives with her husband and two children. She makes articles of clothing and her workshop is located in her home. Due to the fact that the school year is about to begin, this is the season when many uniforms are made. 

This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral, with the aim of being able to have the necessary money to buy colored thread, buttons, fabric and other materials so that she can have everything she needs to continue with her work. Angela wishes to improve her earnings, and in this way give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: To buy colored thread, buttons, fabric, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy vitamins and feed concentrate for her chickens.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: Juan de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene 6 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas lo prefieren y lo mantienen delante de la competencia porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, como todo buen comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. para poderle dar asu familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 39 years old and lives in his own home with his family. He has a store where he sells basic household necessities such as beans, milk, eggs, bread and other items. He has six years with his business, and that has given him experience in sales, allowing him to obtain the best earnings. The store is located in his home, which is in a very busy area. He has attracted a considerable clientele, as he has the store well-stocked. 

People prefer his store and keep it ahead of the competition, because he always has what they need, with quality products at affordable prices and with unmatched service–always at the disposal of his customers. 

As every good businessman does, he wishes to expand the business and undertake a new investment; but he needs capital. That is why he is applying to Integral for a loan which will allow him to buy basic staples, candy, eggs, bread, drinks, etc., so that he can give his family a better life.

loans.use: To buy beans, milk, eggs, bread, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo de 56 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y su hija, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol. Guillermo desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Guillermo is 56 years old. He is a man who is very responsible with his household obligations. He has always been described as offering his children the best. Right now, he lives with his wife and his daughter. He is very hardworking and has always worked with cheerfulness and enthusiasm. He works as a farmer, every year planting basic grains to the area such as corn and beans. Guillermo wants to increase his sales and that is why he visited the offices INTEGRAL to ask for a loan which will allow him to buy: seeds, fertilizer, pesticides and more. He wants to have the help he has asked for because he doesn't have any other income and this way, he can keep bringing the daily bread home without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticides, and more.

loans.name: Jaime Antonio

texts.es: Jaime de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijas, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene 24 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Jaime is 40 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and his daughters. He has a store in his residence and has had his business for 24 years. This has given him experience in sales and has allowed him to obtain better profits. He is very well known by the area residents and has gained a lot of customers because his store is well stocked. He wants to expand the business and make a new investment but he needs capital. That is why he is asking for a loan that will allow him to buy what he needs for his store, such as snacks, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, beverages, etc. He is certain he can pay off the debt and also trusts that it will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snacks, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Claudia Beatriz

texts.es: Claudia de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de pollos su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por ser un producto muy vendible con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Claudia esta solicitando un credito para la compra de pollos por mayor para seguir con su trabajo y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle  a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Claudia is 34 years old. She lives in her own home with her family. She sells chickens and her business has been located in her residence for several years. She has a lot of customers because her product sells very well. With the profits she gets from her work, she is able to pay for some household expenses. Claudia is asking for a loan to buy chickens wholesale to continue with her work and thus obtain better profits to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy chickens wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: Maria de 59 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra frijol y maiz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es una mujer responsable, honesta y trabajadora,  vive con su esposo y su hijo. Maria está solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en: Maria is 59 years old. She has worked in agriculture for several years, growing corn and beans. With the sales of her crops she is able to pay for her household expenses. She is a responsible, honest and hardworking woman. She lives with her husband and child. Maria is asking for a loan to be able to buy harvest materials, such as fertilizer, seeds, herbicides, pest control, etc. What she earns isn't enough to cover these expenses and this way she will have better income and more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, herbicides, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mollusks (seafood) wholesale.

loans.name: Jessica Liduvina

texts.es: Jessica de 34 años de edad es madre soltera vive junto a sus dos hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene 15 años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, Jessica tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Jessica is 34 years old. She is a single mother who lives with her two children in her own home. She has sold clothes for 15 years and this has given her a lot of experience which allows her to obtain the best profits. The business is located in her residence. She has gained a lot of customers because people know that everything is quality at accessible prices and with unmatched service always to the orders and tastes of the customers. During the last few weeks, demand has increased and she wants to take advantage with a new investment, but she doesn't have enough capital to back her up. That is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy her clothes wholesale. Jessica has good payment references and unimpeachable morals. She is sure that she can pay off the debt and at the same time, she hopes to bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Neris Yaneth

texts.es: Neris de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene 4 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Neris is 34 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband and two children. She has had a small store in her residence for 4 years. This has given her a lot of experience in sales, which allows her to obtain the best profits. She is very well known to the area residents and has gained a lot of customers because she has a well stocked store. She wants to grow her business and make a new investment, but he needs capital. That is why she is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy what she needs for her store, such as snacks, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, beverages, etc. She is certain she can pay off the debt and she is confident it will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snacks, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Willian Ernesto

texts.es: Willian de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, se dedica a la mecanica de obra de banco( elaboracion de estructuras metalicas: puertas, balcones, portones, techos) desde hace 11 años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Willian solicita un credito para comprar mas materiales como: hierro, metal, herramienta, electrodos, etc. ya que tiene mucha demanda porque hace un buen trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Willian is 35 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and his daughter. He is a very responsible and hardworking now. He has done metallic work (making metallic structures: doors, balconies, gates, roofs) for 11 years. With what he earns from his work, he is able to cover some of the household expenses. Willian is asking for a loan to buy materials such as: iron, metal, tools, electrodes, etc. He has a lot of demand and this way he can make better profits to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, tools, electrodes, etc.

loans.name: Oun's Group

texts.en:
Oun, age 64, is a widowed mother with no kids. She is a local borrower from Kandal Stoeng district in Kandal province. To provide her living, she has been planting rice and farming for 32 years. Her farming earned an income of 23,600 KHR per day.

Now she is the group leader of five, and they are seeking their first loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for 1,000,000 KHR each. As the group leader, she is going to use her entire loan to buy rice seeds and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes her rice will gain a good crop yield for her to earn a profit to support her business.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Jocely

texts.en:
Jocely, is 45 years old and lives in Plaridel, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. She had three children and was happily married for five years. For those years of having a family, her fish lending was the only business where Jocely and her husband generated enough to live and survive in this world.
Jocely has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for three years. With it, she asks for financial assistance from the institution for the amount of 12,000 PHP to buy "banyeras" (big basin)of fish to  sell. Through it, she can have more displays to nearby municipalities.

loans.use: to buy "banyeras" of fish to  sell

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en: Sopheap is 28 years old. She is married and lives with her husband in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a singer for wedding parties. She makes an income of $2 per day. Her husband is a well digger who makes an income of $6 each day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sopheap is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her reduce transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home to generate more income to financially support the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Heann

texts.en: Heann is 57-years-old and a widowed mother of two daughters, and they still attend school. She is a villager from the Prey Chhor district in Kampong Cham province. For her living, she grows rice on one hectare of land and piglets to get income. She has been in this business for 37 years and that makes her income about ten dollars per day. She is a first cycle client and now she is seeking a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  She will use her entire loan to cover her daughter's school fees, who is majoring in Finance and Banking. She hopes her daughter will successfully complete her course and get a good job after she graduates.

loans.use: to cover her daughter's school fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Mirna Alicex

texts.es: Mirna, tiene 23 años de edad, esta soltera, vive junto a una Tía en el municipio de Roatan. Su negocio es la elaboracion y venta de tortillas de maiz y lo tiene desde hace 8 años instalado en un anexo a su casa,anteriormente trabajaba en un restaurante luego decidio por su propio negocio. Solicita 7,000 Lempiras para comprar harina de maiz para la elaboracion  de tortilla, y poder incrementar las ventas. Su meta es seguir creciendo Con su negocio para darle mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Mirna is 23 years old. She is single and lives with an aunt in the town of Roatan. Her business is making and selling corn tortillas She has had it set up for 8 years in an annex to her house. Previously, she worked in a restaurant and then she decided to open her own business. She is asking for 7,000 Lempiras to buy corn meal to makes the tortillas and be abel to increase sales. Her goals is to keep growing with her business to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn meal to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan tiene 28 años, está casado y tiene tres hijos, su actividad principal es el transporte de carga, viaja al trópico de Cochabamba y a todo el país, cuenta con una experiencia de 8 años, pero como los ingresos que obtiene no le alcanzan para cubrir todos sus gastos, los fines de semana fabrica lavanderías de cemento, mientras que su esposa se dedica a la ganadería. Desde muy joven tuvo que dedicarse a trabajar para salir  adelante y se compro un lote para contruir su casa. Con el objetivo de otorgar mayores beneficios a su familia, solicita un crédito para terminar la construcción del segundo piso de su vivienda, ya que la obra no se termino por que no tenia dinero suficiente, de esta forma lograra proporcionarle a su familia mayor comodidad y bienestar.
texts.en: Juan is 28 years old. He is married and has three children. His main economic activity is cargo transport. He travels to the tropical area of Cochabamba and the whole country. He has 8 years of experience, but since the income he earns isn’t enough to cover his expenses, he makes cement wash basins on the weekends. His wife takes care of their cattle. Since the time he was very young, he has had to work to get ahead and buy a lot for his house, with the goal of continuing to get ahead and to provide better benefits for his family. He is requesting a loan to finish the construction of his house, which he could not finish because he did not have the necessary funds. This is how he will provide improved comfort and well-being for his family.

loans.use: Terminar la construcción del segundo piso de su vivienda

loans.name: Koeurn

texts.en:
Koerun is a villager from Kompong Thom province, 59 years old and married with eleven children.

To provide for the family, she and her husband grow rice.  She and her husband have been in this business for 42 years. 

She has been with VisionFund for seven cycles, and the past loan helped raise her family's standard of living and support her children in school. 

Now she is applying for an education loan with VisionFund to cover her daughter's school fees. She hopes her daughter will get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To cover her daughter's school fees.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Kampong Svay District

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 33-years-old, from Naivasha and is married. They have three children aged between 14-years-old and two-years-old.

Mary is a fruit vendor and has been in the business for many years and has applied for her first loan from Vision Fund Kenya to enable her buy more tomatoes, bananas and onions to add to her stock. She is optimistic that her business will do better after the loan.

She hopes to expand her business in the near future.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, bananas and onions

loans.name: Rosmaida

texts.en:
Rosmaida is a housewife living with five persons in the family home in Bandung. Bandung is the main city in West Java located about a two to three hour drive from Jakarta. 

Rosmaida owns a small stall that sells snacks, drinks, and mobile phone airtime credits and also services bill payments. For Rosmaida, doing business in selling mobile phone airtime with Ruma is pretty helpful, especially when she needs urgent cash to help her husband, who works in a private company. 

She felt interested in joining Ruma because of her friend's recommendation. For the last three months, she has had around $9 to $10 per day in sales on average just from selling mobile phone airtime credits. She hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to process more transactions on weekends. In the future, Rosmaida hopes that she will be able to improve her current business and seek more business opportunities. Rosmaida thanks you for your support.

In the photo, Rusmaida is standing in her stall called "warung", an Indonesian typical corner store.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Aba is a widow who has seven children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Aba is a successful businesswoman. She sells cloth, purses, shoes, and undergarments in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). Aba has been actively involved in this business for about four years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Aba uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Aba will use this loan to purchase increased amounts of cloth and other products, thus aiding her to improve overall sales. Aba plans to use the new profits from her expanded business to further diversify the type of products that she sells, thereby adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cloth and other products to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Although she has received no formal education, Aba is an entrepreneur. She is a food vendor who sells fried fish, tomatoes, and kenkey (a traditional Ghanaian staple dish made from corn dough and wrapped in banana leaves) in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). Aba has been involved in this enterprise for six years. 

Aba is married and has four children. Her husband works as a mason and also farms. The proceeds from Aba's business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. Aba wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory of ingredients, which would allow her to sell greater quantities of food. In the long term. Aba plans to reinvest future profits in her business, thus helping her to expand and to meet rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory of ingredients in order to sell greater quantities of food.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances, Elizabeth did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. For the past three years, Elizabeth has been selling plastic containers in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). As a divorcee with seven children, Elizabeth uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. 

Elizabeth will use this loan to purchase an increased amount of plastic ware, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Elizabeth wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of plastic ware to improve overall sales.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en: Abena is divorced and has five children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Abena is a successful businesswoman. She sells secondhand clothing in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). As the sole breadwinner in the family, she uses her income to provide for the entire family. Abena will use this loan to purchase increased amounts of secondhand clothing, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. Abena will use the new profits from her expanded business to further diversify the type of products that she sells, thereby adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of secondhand clothing to improve overall sales.

loans.name: Araba

texts.en:
Although she has received no formal education, Araba is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling personal care products, such as lotions and soaps, in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). Araba is married and has five children. Her husband works as a fisherman. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Araba will use this loan to purchase increased amounts of personal care products, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. She will use the new profits from her expanded business to further diversify the type of products that she sells, thereby adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of personal care products to improve overall sales.

loans.name: Adwowa

texts.en:
Even though Adwowa grew up in poverty without an education, this has not stopped her from fulfilling her dream of achieving a better life for her and her family. Currently, Adwowa is an entrepreneur. She runs a chop bar (food stand) in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). Her business enterprise has grown substantially since she began three years ago. Adwowa is married and has three children. Her husband works as a mason. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Adwowa wants to use her loan to purchase more ingredients which would improve her overall sales. In the long term, Adwowa plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients which would improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Efua is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Wakye’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made primarily from beans, rice, and colored leaves). She usually sells her Wakye in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling Wakye for eight years. 

Efua is married and has five children. Her husband works as a mason. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Efua wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of rice and beans, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty Wakye. 

In the long term, Efua plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her to expand her business and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of rice and beans, thus increasing her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Aba did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Aba sells maize in Ohiaba (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about two years. 

As a widow with three children, Aba uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. Aba will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of maize, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Aba wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of maize, which will aid her in improving her overall sales.

loans.name: Ruby

texts.en:
Ruby is the mother of three children. She lives in Roypara village in Dhupguri. In spite of being illiterate, she is highly interested in her children’s education. All three of them are regular good student in class X (grade 10), class IX (grade 9) and class VI (grade 6).

Mahananda (Ruby’s son) is the youngest child in the family of five members. His mother is simply a housewife and his father is a hocker. In the photo, Mahananda is standing next to his mother. He is a student in class VI (grade 6). His father, Moti, is facing difficulties in paying Mahananda’s tuition fees after meeting the educational expenses of his two older children. This is a vital problem for him because his two children are going to complete their school education and his youngest child, though reading in a lower class, is very sincere about his studies and school curriculum. 

Ruby has been unable to take care of all the things they need. She thanks BJS (Kiva’s partner) for helping her with a loan that will resolve this dilemma. She is an honest woman and is requesting a loan of INR 15,000 to buy education tools for Mahananda and pay his the tuition fees.

She hopes that her children will have a stable job after they complete their bachelor's degree. It has been a help for her children’s education and to Dhupguri’s youth generation in general, so Ruby and her son Mahananda (shown in the picture) are now very happy about getting the loan from BJS and Kiva and both of them are thankful to the lenders.

loans.use: To pay tuitions fees and to purchase educational tools for her son

loans.name: Sandhya

texts.en:
Sandhya belongs to a conservative poor family. She can’t receive an education and remains illiterate, but knows how to sign her name. Her husband has a plywood business, selling plies in the village shops as well as in the wholesale market. Her two sons are students in class X (grade 10) and they are planning to work in their study field after graduation to start their work life. Because of the financial crisis Sandhya and her husband Pradeep are facing, they couldn't pay their son's tuition fees, school and examination fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan to BJS (Kiva’s partner), an organization that gives financial assistance to poor families who have a low income. She is taking the loan for her son Partha, a 16-year-old boy in grade 10 who is appearing for his final board examinations. She will use the loan to buy his educational needs like books and uniforms and to pay his tuition fees, school and examination fees etc. It would enable her to cover all the expenses related to her children’s education and stabilize them in their study field. She also has a desire to make Partha a renowned doctor in the future.

Sandhya and Partha (standing next to her mother in the photo) are both grateful to BJS and Kiva for funding their educational loan.

loans.use: To buy educational equipment and to pay tuition fees for her son

loans.name: Saraswati

texts.en:
Saraswati is a 44-year-old housewife whose husband Kobul is a farmer. Both of them are illiterate and can only sign their names, but give full inspiration to their children in their studies. They are blessed with three children and all of them are students in different classes. Her eldest daughter Kalyani is reading in class VIII (grade 8). She has obtained high marks in her previous annual examination and she is still doing marvelously well for her smooth promotion to the next class. 

The family’s financial condition is poor, Saraswati is unable to give Kalyani her private tuition for the subject she needs.  For this reason, Saraswati is taking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to pay her daughter’s private tuition fees and school fees for her higher education, which will make her a responsible citizen. Kalyani’s aim is to be an engineer in the future. This loan will help Kalyani to progress towards her goal. Saraswati and her daughter (shown in the photo) are very much pleased with the loan and thank BJS and Kiva from the core of their heart.

loans.use: To pay private tuition fees and school fees for her daughter

loans.name: Chhaya

texts.en:
Chhaya is a rural woman from the village of East Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri who lives in her own house. She lives with her husband Moloy and two children (one son and one daughter).  She is 45 years old and studied up to grade 8.  She is engaged in a cattle-raising business.  Her husband, age 51, attended school up to grade 7.  Their son and daughter are studying in grade 10 and grade 7.
 
Chhaya's husband is a greengrocer by profession. Currently, he works on a parcel of land in their village where he lives. What he produces is sold, so he can complement the income from his current job.  He is thriving, active and dynamic.  His persistence and positive attitude motivate him to seek new alternatives to upgrade his poor financial condition.

They have decided to start a milk products business.  For this reason, Chhaya is requesting a loan from BJS to buy a dairy cow. This will allow her to increase production and offer more products (milk. curd, butter, cheese, paneer etc.) for sale.  She will be able to meet the household expenses with the income. Moreover, she will be able to give her children a proper education with the profit generated from this business.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to start a dairy products business.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina, 46, is from the countryside and lives happily with her husband and their only son.  They are from the small town of Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. Both of them attended school up to grade 8.  They live in their own concrete house.

Rina’s husband is engaged in the business of buying and selling coconuts.  He buys coconuts from his village and neighboring villages and sells them in the local market.  Coconut is in great demand in his area and is a very popular fruit used in most Bengali sweets.  Rina has always been an exemplary housewife who helps her husband in his work after managing her household works. Their son is also engaged in this business. All of them work hard with the aim of improving the family income because they are in a very difficult situation.

Therefore, Rina has decided to develop their coconut business and applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS to purchase more stocks of coconut. She hopes, with her tenacity and perseverance, she will be able to succeed and overcome the obstacles, especially the growing prices of essential commodities.

In the future, she dreams of buying a cycle van to carry the products to the market.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase more coconuts to sell

loans.name: Feroza

texts.en:
Feroza is a 39-year-old married woman. She is a homemaker. Her husband Rafiqul, aged 42 years, is a farmer by trade and earns money by selling his farmed vegetables and crops to the village market. Both of them are illiterate, can sign their names only. Feroza is a mother of three children. They are receiving an education. Amongst them, two children study in class IX (Grade9) and class X (Grade10) respectively. They live in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri in their own semi-pakka (concrete walls with a thatched roof) house.

Feroza needs a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) so that she can buy seeds and fertilizers for potato cultivation and make a good profit from this business. She hopes to upgrade their financial condition and give a good upbringing to their children. There is a very good demand for potatoes in this area, so the business will be a lucrative one. She wants to become financially successful from this business. 

Feroza and her husband dream of upgrading their semi-pakka house to a brick-built house and want to buy more agricultural lands for cultivation with the profit from this business.

Her full thanks go to BJS as well as to Kiva for giving her the loan.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivating potatoes.

loans.name: Anima

texts.en:
Anima is a housewife in a small village in Dhupguri (Roypara) in the district of Jalpaiguri.  Anima and her husband Surendranath are illiterate and only know how to sign their names. They have three children who are engaged in study. They live in a kaccha house (made of straw and mud).

Anima’s husband Surendranath sells timber to the market as well as in the locality.
