Anima and her husband decided to take this loan of INR 15,000 to invest in their existing timber business to purchase more timber, wood, logs of wood etc. for their business.  There is a high demand for timber in their locality as there are only a few timber shops in that area. Demand in the locality is the main reason for expanding their existing business. Anima is confident that she will be financially stable if she can expand the business with the loan. It will also enable her to build a pakka (concrete) house with the profit they will earn from their business. 

They are thankful to both Kiva and BJS for the loan, which will help them to enhance their existing business.

loans.use: To purchase timber to sell

loans.name: Bachiran

texts.en:
Bachiran is a 28-year-old housewife and there are two children and her husband in her family. Her husband Bacchu is 38 years old.  Both of them are illiterate and can only sign their names.  Their two children are receiving an education. They study in class I (Grade 1) and class IV (Grade 4). Bachiran and her husband have their own kaccha house (straw and mud-made) at Stationpara in the small town Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri.

Bachiran’s husband cultivates different crops in their own small piece of land.  He has been working with agriculture for many years and produces beans, onions and other vegetables for the family's consumption and to retail in the local bazaar.

The small income of Bachiran's husband is not sufficient to get over the financial hurdles of their family, so she decided to start cultivating potatoes in their land. For this she needs capital, so she applied for the loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) for purchasing good quality potato seeds and fertilizers.  She hopes the profit, which will be generated from their new business will meet the financial needs of their family as well as help her to give her children better education. She hopes to upgrade their kachha house to a Pacca one (made of concrete) in future.

She thanks BJS and Kiva very much for funding the loan.

loans.use: To purchase good quality potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivating potatoes.

loans.name: Chabita

texts.en:
Chabita is a 19-year-old woman who lives with her husband, Dipu, and one child in Dhupguri. Her child is too small to go to school. Chabita is a homemaker while her husband is a farmer and sells different vegetables in the market. 

Their income is so inconsistent that she is unable to cover the household expenses, but Chabita dreams of providing her child with a proper education and make him responsible and a good citizen. She decided to cultivate broad beans with the other vegetables on her own land as there is a great demand for broad beans now and she will be able to generate more income for her family. She is confident that she will grow her business with the profit she will earn from her business.

She requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase seeds, fertilizers, pesticides etc. for growing broad beans, which will ultimately help in generating more income. They live in a kaccha house (made of mud and straw), so in the future, she wants to build a concrete house with the profit from her business. She is so enthusiastic that she will be able to meet her expectations.

Her best regards go to BJS and Kiva as well for the loan.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers to grow broad beans

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas lives in Kisii, a prime area for the growth of bananas and production of sugar cane.He is married and has three children, all of whom are of school-going age. He has been doing farming for the past ten years. He produces and sells milk, tea and eggs.
Farming is his major source of income, and therefore he puts a lot of effort and resources into it. His major challenge in farming is poor infrastructure and lack of proper markets.
Thomas chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they meet the needs of small-scale farmers, and the interest rate on their loans is low. The income generated from this loan will enable him to cater to his children's school fees and also improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Henrietta

texts.en:
Henrietta is a baker. She graduated from ‘A’ level. She bakes bread with a locally made oven. She supplies it to retailers both near and far, as well as individuals around her locality that is Abura, Cape Coast. She has been involved in this business for quite some time. Henrietta is a widow with three children. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her pay her children’s school fees. 

She has noticed that there are growing demands among consumers for her bread. Nevertheless, she is unable to meet their needs due to limited inventory capacity. Thus she aims to use her loan to purchase more flour, sugar, and other ingredients for the bakery. With the new profits from her expanded business, Henrietta wants to buck the trend by ensuring that all her children will be given the opportunity to education to further distance their family from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, and other ingredients for the bakery.

loans.name: Vida

texts.en:
After graduating from middle school, Vida decided to set up a shop selling cosmetics and used children’s wear in Abura, Cape Coast. She has some years' worth of experience; she is currently looking to expand her enterprise further. 

Unfortunately, she is limited due to a lack of funding. As a result, this loan will be used to help her purchase more products like powder, perfumes, pomade, body lotions, antiseptics, hair relaxers, used clothes etc, thus enabling her to prepare and sell more of her products so she can meet her customers' needs. She aims to use the profits from her business to help support her husband (who is a farmer) with the upkeep of their house whilst ensuring that her two children are able to experience a better life.

loans.use: to purchase more products like powder, perfumes, pomade, body lotions, antiseptics, hair relaxers and used clothes.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance sells second-hand clothes in Abura, Cape Coast. She has been in this business for some years. She is divorced with six children. She is a middle school leaver. Her income is mostly used to pay her children’s school fees, and for food and utility bills. 

Constance will use her loan to buy more clothes in order to expand her business thus allowing her to meet rising customer demand. Her new profits from the expanded business will be used to assist in paying her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es: José de 41 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 9 años y  3 años de edad. José es un hombre trabajador y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos lo necesario. Él se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para pavimentar el piso del corredor de la vivienda.
texts.en: José is 41 years old. He lives in his own home with his life's companion and their two children, aged 9 and 3. José is a hardworking and responsible man who does everything within his reach to give his children what they need. He works buying and selling cattle and earns a living this way and supports the home. He wants to improve the living conditions in his home and that is why he is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand, and gravel to pave the floor of the corridor of his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to pave the floor of the corridor of his house.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
Doña Eugenia a sus 31 años de edad es madre de 3 hijos pero solo los dos mayores estudian y ayudan a sus padres en los diferentes trabajos de campo. Ella es casada y en compañía de su esposo y sus hijos se dedican al cultivo de papa ya que dicha actividad la aprendió de sus padres quienes a temprana edad le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra ya que en su familia el trabajo de campo es una vocación y tradición. Ella tiene un grado de escolaridad primario completo el cual pudo cursar gracias al apoyo financiero y moral de sus padres pero en su familia la economía no era la mejor ya que desciende de una familia económicamente humilde por lo que no pudo seguir con sus estudios. Sus clientes para la venta del producto de papa son los diferentes intermediarios que llegan a la zona como también familiares y amigos. Sus cultivos están ubicados a 20 metros de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan caminando para dar mantenimiento y asistencia a sus cultivos.
Sus matas, planes y sueños a futuro es dar a sus hijos una buena educación estudiantil con una buena calidad para que se especialicen en carreras universitarias que sean de provecho para ellos y sus futuras familias.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento con el cual comprara insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de papa ya que de esta manera ella podrá lograr cuidar y proteger sus cultivos para poder obtener una excelente cosecha, incrementar sus ingresos y generar mayores ganancias para re invertir en sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Eugenia, 31, is the mother of three children, but only the two older study and help their parents with the work in the field. Eugenia is married and, along with her husband and two children, she cultivates potatoes. She learned this activity from her parents at a young age when they taught her how to work the land. This is her family's vocation and tradition. She completed one year of primary school, which she was able to do because of her parents' financial and moral support. However, her family didn't have that much money, coming from a modest family, so she wasn't able to keep going to school.

Her customers for selling potatoes are the intermediaries who come to the area as well as family and friends. Her crops are located 20 meters from her house and she walks there to perform maintenance and assist the crops.

Her goals, plans, and dreams for the future are to give her children a good quality education so they can specialize in university concentrations that will benefit them and their future families.

This is why she is now requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies to help her potato crops. This will allow her to protect and take care of her crops to get an excellent harvest, increase her income and earn more profit so she can reinvest in her crops.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her potato crops.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is 26 years old and live in Gardnersville. She is married and has a two-year-old child who is in school and lives at home. Her husband is a local business man. For the past seven years she has been selling stationery in the local market. She sells 12 hours each day of the week. She describes herself as a serious woman. She started this business with money from her husband, and she learned this trade from her friends. Her business has enabled her to support her family, which makes her proud of her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more stationery (pens, copy books, reading books, etc.) for her business. Her plans are to educate her child and to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more stationery items (pens, copy books, reading books, etc.) for her business.

loans.name: Kirubukene Group

texts.fr:
Catherine fait partie du groupe  Kirubukene  et habite à  Gitega. C’est une veuve de   53 ans.  Elle a 3 enfants  âgés de 15 à 25 ans.

Elle  fait le commerce de  bière. 

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de bière  à  revendre  pour gagner  plus.
texts.en:
Catherine is a member of the Kirubukene group and lives in Gitega. She is 53 years old and a widow. She has three children, aged from 15 to 25 years old. 

Catherine sells beer. She is on her third loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, she is going to increase her capital to buy a large quantity of beer, which she will resell and earn more.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of beer to resell

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: teodoro vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas lo prefieren y lo mantienen delante de la competencia porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. Teodoro tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Teodoro lives in his own home with his wife. He has a store where he sells basic necessity products such as beans, milk, eggs, and bread. He has had this business for many years and it has provided him with experience in sales, which allows him to earn more income. The store is located in his home, which is a busy area. He has gained many customers because he has the most well-stocked store. People prefer him and support him as opposed to the competition because he always has what they need, and they are good quality products with affordable prices. His service is unbeatable, and he is always at his customers' service.

Teodoro wants to grow his business and make a new investment but he needs capital, so he is requesting a loan from Integral, which will allow him to buy basic grains, sweets, eggs, bread, and drinks. Teodoro has good credit references, and he assures lenders that he will pay off his debt. Also, he says that this will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, eggs, bread, and drinks.

loans.name: Noe Antonio

texts.es: Noe tiene 46 años de edad  y reside junto a su padre de 73 años quien depende de sus cuidados. Noe trabaja como empleado de una institución cercana a su localidad y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Noe habita en condiciones muy humildes las cuales desea mejorar. Actualmente, el techo de la vivienda es muy bajo y desea levantarlo por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina galvanizada, cemento y arena. El señor Noe esta consiente del compromiso que el crédito implica y expresa tener la capacidad de pago.
texts.en: Noe, 46, lives with his 73-year-old father, who he cares for. Noe works as an employee for an institution near his home. This is how he makes a living to support the household. Noe lives in very humble conditions that he would like to improve. Currently, the roof of his house is very low and he wants to raise it so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in wood, galvanized laminate, cement, and sand. Noe knows about the terms of the loan and says he is able to make the payments.

loans.use: to buy wood, galvanized laminate, cement, and sand to raise the roof of his home.

loans.name: Marleny Antonia

texts.es: Marleny de 39 años de edad vive en casas propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Marleny, 39, lives in her own home with her husband and their two children. She has a store where she sells basic necessity items such as beans, milk, eggs, and bread. She has had this business for many years and this has provided her with experience in sales, which allows her to earn more income. The store is in her home and she is well-known by her neighbors in the area. She has gained many customers because her store is well-stocked. She wants to grow her business and make another investment but she needs capital so she is requesting a loan to buy the necessary supplies for her store. She assures lenders that she will pay off her debt, and she also says that this will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, and drinks.

loans.name: Agatha

texts.en: After completing middle school, Agatha decided to set up her own bakery in Ebubonku, a town near Cape Coast. She is currently looking to expand her business, but is limited by a lack of funds. As a result, she is requesting this loan to help her buy more baking ingredients. She aims to use the profits from her business to help her husband (who is a laborer) support the upkeep of their house and ensure that their four children are able to experience a better life.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for baking.

loans.name: Jesus Alfonso

texts.es:
Jesús Alfonso tiene 19 años de edad, el vive en la calurosa ciudad de ICA, junto a sus padres, los cuales son su inspiración para salir adelante. Jesús Alfonso es un joven muy estudioso, responsable y alegre, el actualmente estudia y trabaja para darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus padres y lograr ser un buen profesional.
Jesús Alfonso, trabaja en el área de mantenimiento mecánico de una agrícola de la cuidad y también estudia la carrea de mecánica en la universidad de la misma ciudad.
Jesús Alfonso está muy agradecido con los prestatarios KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de herramientas para realizar las prácticas correspondientes a su carrera de mecánica industrial.

El sueño de Jesús Alfonso es ser el mejor mecánico de la cuidad y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jesus Alfonso, 19, lives in the welcoming city of Ica with his parents, who are his inspiration to move forward. Jesus Alfonso is a studious, responsible, and happy young man. He currently studies and works to give his parents a better quality of life and to be a successful professional.

Jesus Alfonso works in mechanical maintenance for a farm in the city and he also studies mechanics at the university in the same city.

Jesus Alfonso is very grateful for Kiva loans because he will invest the money into buying tools to complete his practicals for his industrial mechanics degree. His dream is to be the best mechanic in the city and to have his own home.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Cecilia is an entrepreneur. She runs a small grocery store in Ebubonku (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 18 years. Cecilia is married and has four children. Her husband works as a teacher. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Cecilia wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell more goods. In the long term, Cecilia plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to have more goods to sell.

loans.name: Hawasata

texts.en:
Hawasata is divorced and has one child. After successfully completing middle school, Hawasata is now an established businesswoman. She is a seamstress in Ebubunko (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 15 years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Hawasata uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Hawasata will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of cloth, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Hawasata plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customers' preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cloth, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Isabel De La Paz

texts.es: Isabel de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo de 33 años de edad quien trabaja y le ayuda en los gastos del hogar, Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, y sus ganancias han aumentado es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra tener junto a su hijo seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
Isabel, 58, lives in her own home with her 33-year-old son who works and helps with household expenses. She has a business selling various styles of clothing for all people: men, women, and children. The clothes she sells are a very good quality and she sells them at affordable prices.

She decided to request a loan from Integral so she can buy a variety of skirts, pants, blouses, shirts, and suits. This will allow her to satisfy her customers' needs. She hopes that this will bring her and her son financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, blouses, shirts, and suits.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Although she has received no formal education, Rebecca is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling bread in Abura, a town near Cape Coast, and has been involved in this business for 10 years. Rebecca is married and the mother three children. Her husband is a driver, and she uses the proceeds from her business to help cover the family’s general expenses and pay her children’s school fees. Rebecca will use this loan to buy more baking ingredients so that she can make more items to sell. With the profits from her expanded business, she plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, because this will allow her to adapt to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for baking.

loans.name: Santos Jesus

texts.es: Santos de 60 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su compañera de vida y su hijo de 17 años de edad. Santos  se dedica  a la prestación de servicio de transporte desde hace 6 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Las condiciones de la vivienda de Santos son muy humildes y en mal estado lo cual desea mejorar. Solicita a FUSAI un crédito para invertir en la compra de madera, cemento y arena para cambiar la madera del techo que se encuentra deteriorada y levantar las paredes ya que son muy bajas.
texts.en: Santos, 60, lives in his own home with his family, which is comprised of his life partner and 17-year-old son. Santos has worked in the transportation service industry for six years. This allows him to make a living and pay household expenses. Santos's living conditions are very modest and in bad condition so he would like to improve this. He is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in wood, cement, and sand to replace the deteriorating wood from his roof. He will also heighten the walls, which are very short right now.

loans.use: to buy wood, cement, and sand to repair the roof and walls of his home.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is divorced and has three children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Elizabeth is a successful businesswoman. She prepares and sells kenkey (a traditional Ghanaian staple dish that is made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves) for a living. She normally sells her kenkey in Ebubunko (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 10 years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Elizabeth uses her income to provide for the entire family. Elizabeth will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of maize, thus helping her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Elizabeth plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase maize

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale milk, sugar, and corn on the cob.

loans.name: Ma Angela

texts.es: Doña Ma Ángela gracias a su primer financiamiento pudo comprar semilla de papa certificada de primera calidad misma que cultivo y abono para obtener una excelente cosecha sobre sus cultivos de hortalizas (papa) logrando obtener una cantidad total de 40 QQ los cuales fueron vendidos con mucha diligencia y prontitud justamente como ella lo había previsto agradeciéndole a Dios en primer lugar por la cosecha obtenida y por la prontitud de salir de su compromiso de pago con la cooperativa COMIXMUL para nuevamente acercarse a dicha institución con la frente en alto y solicitar un segundo financiamiento el cual podrá re invertir en sus cultivos. La papa fue vendida a los intermediarios de la localidad, comerciantes de la zona entre otros. La utilidad que ella logro obtener de sus cultivos de papa considera fue una de las mejores ya que no se perdió nada a pesar del bajo precio del producto en el mercado local.
texts.en:
Ma Angela was able to buy good quality certified potato seeds thanks to her first loan. In addition, she got fertilizer, which resulted in an excellent harvest of her potatoes. She had a total of 44 quintales, which were sold quickly with much hard work just as she predicted. She first thanks God for the crop that she had and for the quickness with which she was able to make her payments to COMIXMUL.

She is again working with this institution for a second loan to reinvest in her crops. The potatoes were sold to intermediaries in her area, vendors, and others. She considers this to be one of her most effective potato harvests because she didn't lose anything despite the low price of the product in the local market.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to attend to her potato crops.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama operates a business selling cold water and soda in Ebubonko, near Cape Coast. Ama is divorced and supports four children. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Ama uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Ama will use her loan funds to purchase a larger number of beverages to offer for sale. This will allow her to improve her overall sales. 

She plans to use the profits from her expanded enterprise to ensure that all her children remain in school.

loans.use: to purchase a large number of beverages to offer for sale

loans.name: Patience Ama

texts.en:
Patience earns an income by selling cooking ingredients in Abura, near Cape Coast. She has been involved in this business for about three years. Her husband is a carpenter, and both of them use their incomes to support themselves and their three children. Patience attended school through the end of Primary 3.

Patience will use her loan funds to add new cooking ingredients to her current offerings. With the new profits from her expanded enterprise, Patience plans to develop her business further by venturing into newer markets.

loans.use: to add new cooking ingredients to her current offerings

loans.name: Francisco Alejandro

texts.es: Francisco de 53 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee una panadería en el cual elabora pan francés, posee mucha clientela por su amabilidad a la hora de vender y los precios muy accesibles. Francisco es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre esta en busca de darle lo mejor a su familia, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, latas, levaduras, manteca, etc. y todo lo necesario para su panadería para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos, el tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Francisco, 53, lives with his life partner and their children. He has a bakery where he makes French bread. He has many customers due to his kind sales practices and affordable prices. Francisco is a very hard-working man who is always looking to give his family the best.

For this reason, he is requesting a loan from Integral so he can buy wholesale flour, tin plates, yeast, butter, and all the other necessities for his bakery. This will allow him to keep working since this is his main source of income. He hopes that this will allow him to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, tin plates, yeast, and butter.

loans.name: Angela Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña angela de 44 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos,  Ella posee una tienda desde hace 2 años en su lugar de residencia donde vende pan, refrescos, aceites, verduras, frutas, golosinas y también de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo entre otras cosas con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar. Doña angela solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en:
Angela, 44, lives with her husband and two children. She has had a store at home for two years, where she sells bread, beverages, oil, vegetables, fruits and sweets, as well as soap and shampoo. With the profits she makes and with the help of her husband, they manage to cover their home expenses.

Angela is requesting a loan to stock her store in order to offer her customers a better service. Her sales will increase, which is important for her in order to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy bread, beverages, oil, vegetables, fruits, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Maria Evelia

texts.es: María de 51 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Las condiciones habitacionales de María y su familia son muy humildes. Con el fin de mejorar su seguridad y la de su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, grava, arena y hierro. Expresa que con lo que percibe de su negocio de venta de antojitos típicos logrará pagar el las cuotas mensuales que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and lives with her family in a house of their own. María and her family live in very humble conditions.

María is requesting a loan at FUSAI in order to create safer conditions for her family. She will build a retaining wall and she needs bricks, cement, gravel, sand and iron bars.

María says that she will pay the installments with the profits she makes from selling traditional sweets and snacks.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, gravel, sand and iron bars to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Reina De Los Angeles

texts.es: Reina de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 13 y 20 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, Reina es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace 10 años se decidió en poner una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de estos años, Cuenta con mucha clientela que la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos buscan, Reina solicita un prestamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que Dde esta manera logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Reina, 46, lives with her husband and two children aged 13 and 20 in a house of their own. Her children are students and she is an enterprising and hardworking woman. Ten years ago, she decided to open a small store and she has been able to keep it running with effort and dedication. She has many customers, who prefer her because they always find what they are looking for.

Reina is requesting a loan at INTEGRAL to invest in her store and stock it with all kinds of products, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, toilet paper, detergent and many more products that her customers need. She is confident that in this way she will be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, etc. for her store.

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es:
Doña Elvia tiene 40 años de edad ella es agricultora y ama de casa, madre de 4 hijos de los cuales 2 estudian y los otros dos trabajan. Su estado civil es unión libre y con 6 años de estudio ella agradece a su padre por el apoyo brindado en su juventud a pesar de los diferentes problemas financieros y las muchas limitaciones ya que su familia es de escasos recursos y no proveían los suficientes ingresos para optar a una mejor calidad de vida. Sus ingresos económicos dependen del café siendo su compañero de hogar quien le enseñara las diferentes actividades del campo y los procesos de cultivo para una mejor cosecha. La tierra que trabajan es propia la cual con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio en compañía de su pareja pudieron comprar en la cual también tienen cultivado hortalizas como ser: zanahoria, repollo, lechuga, etc. generando por medio de estos mayores ingresos.
Sus planes a futuro seguir fortaleciendo el patrimonio para sus hijos quienes se merecen lo mejor ya que por medio de estas tierras podrán trabajar y construir sus hogares para dar un techo a sus familias y generar ingresos para cubrir las diferentes necesidades que en un futuro puedan presentarse.
Por lo que hoy en día Doña Elvia ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas con las cuales podrá asistir y dar mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café dando seguridad y protección para la próxima cosecha.
texts.en:
Elvia is 40 years old. She works in agriculture and as a housewife, and has four children; two of them study and two of them work. She lives in a common-law marriage. She studied up to the sixth grade thanks to her father, who supported her despite the lack of resources and the difficult financial situation her family was going through.

Her income comes from growing coffee. It was her partner who taught her the different activities needed to take care of the fields and obtain a good harvest. They work their own land. They were able to buy it after working hard and with a lot of sacrifice. They also grow carrots, cabbage, lettuce, etc., which give them an additional income.

Their plan for the future is to work to leave their children a better legacy, since they deserve the best. With this land, they will be able to work and generate an income to cover their expenses, and give their own families a place to live in.

This is why Elvia is today requesting a loan at COMIXMUL. She will buy agricultural supplies to give maintenance to the coffee plants and create good conditions for the upcoming harvest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to give maintenance to her coffee plants.

loans.name: Ana Dolores

texts.es: Ana tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y sus dos hijos de 17 años y 8 años de edad. Ana se gana la vida por medio de la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una pequeña tienda que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado adecuar en su lugar de residencia. Ana desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio. Además, desea enrejar la vivienda para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: hierro y una puerta. Espera poder tener acceso a esta vivienda y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 36 years old and lives with her husband and two children aged 17 and 8 in a house of their own. Ana makes a living selling essential supplies in a small store that she opened at home with a lot of effort.

Ana wants to improve their living conditions and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will pay for the installation of electricity, a service she lacks at the moment. She is also thinking to fence her house and for this she needs materials such as iron and a door. She hopes to be able to make the improvements she has in mind in order to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for the installation of electricity and to buy materials to fence her house.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofia de 61 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus nietos de 16 años y 14 años de edad. Sofía se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Su deseo es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita esta crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro para reparar  las paredes de la vivienda las cuales son de bajareque y se encuentran dañadas. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así proceder a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Sofía is 61 years old. She lives in a house that she owns with her grandchildren, aged 16 and 14. Sofía has been working as a housekeeper for a long time. She would like to make some home improvements and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI.

She will buy bricks, sand, cement and iron bars to repair the walls of her house, which are made of bajareque [wattle and daub] and are in bad conditions. She hopes to receive this loan in order to start working as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement and iron bars to change the walls of her house.

loans.name: Kelyn Yorleni

texts.es:
Kelyn es una joven de 23 años de edad, ama de casa y casada en un estado civil de unión libre, madre de un hijo el cual está de meses de nacido. Con un grado de estudio de primaria completa agradece a sus padres por el apoyo tanto moral como financiero para que ella terminara sus estudios primarios y pudiese aprender a leer, escribir, sumar, restar, etc. Sus ingresos dependen del café rubro que en su familia es una tradición de generaciones y que hoy en día no es la excepción ya que en compañía de sus padres fue como aprendió a trabajar la tierra, limpiarla, abonarla y dar el mantenimiento y preparación necesaria para que el grano tenga el crecimiento y desarrollo adecuado. Junto a su pareja compro el terreno el cual está ubicado a 15 minutos de distancia desde su casa de habitación una parte y la otra en la misma propiedad donde está construida su casa siendo sus clientes los intermediarios de la zona.
Sus metas lograr comprar más parcelas de tierra y extender sus cultivos ya que de esa forma ella lograra ampliar el patrimonio para su familia, generar mayores ingresos y cultivar una mejor variedad la cual ayuda a ofrecer diversidad de grano en el mercado.
Por lo que hoy en día Kelyn solicita financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas con lo cual mejorara y asistirá de una mejor manera sus cultivos de café lo cual para ella es muy importante ya que de este rubro dependen sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Kelyn, 23, is a young woman. She works as a housewife and lives in a common-law marriage. She has a newborn baby. She finished primary school thanks to her parents, who supported her financially and morally so that she could study and learn to read, write, add, subtract, etc.

Her income comes from her coffee business, which has been a tradition in her family for several generations. She keeps the tradition alive; her parents taught her how to work the land, cleaning it, nourishing it and giving it maintenance for an optimal coffee growth.

They have some plants where they live, but they also bought a piece of land located fifteen minutes away from there. They sell their produce to local middlemen. Their goal is to acquire more land and expand their business. This will help them increase their family’s assets, increase their income and obtain good quality coffee beans in order to compete with a wider diversity in the market.

This is why Kelyn is requesting a loan at Cooperativa COMIXMUL. She will buy agricultural supplies to improve and maintain her coffee plants, which are important to her since her income depends on this business.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantations.

loans.name: Blanca Trinidad

texts.es: Blanca de 42 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos de 23 años, 21 años y 15 años de edad. Blanca posee una pequeña tienda en su comunidad en la cual vende variedad de artículos. Blanca hace todo lo que esta a su alcance para  dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de construir un pequeño cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, grava, arena  y pagar mano de obra para la construcción del dormitorio.
texts.en:
Blanca, 42, lives with her children, aged 23, 21 and 15, in a house of their own. She has a small store where she sells a wide variety of things. She does everything she can to improve her children’s living conditions.

Blanca has decided to build a small bedroom and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will buy cement, gravel and sand, and will pay for the labor needed.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel and sand and pay for the labor needed to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Louise's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été crée le 02 novembre 1995. Il est composé de 9 femmes très solidaires et habitant toutes le même village. Leur principale activité est le commerce de bétail.

Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, la vedette est âgée de 51 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 03 garçons dont le cadet a 15 ans.

Avec le prêt reçu, elle s’approvisionne au marché de sa capitale régionale  en petits ruminants que sont les moutons et compte en acheter 05 à 30 000 frs l'unité. Elle achète de la nourriture destinée à l'engraissement des sujets en embouche.  Le reste du prêt est utilisé en fond de roulement. 

Après 05 mois, elle revend l'unité à 75 000 frs toujours au marché d'approvisionnement. 

Les bénéfices lui servent à inscrire ses enfants à l'école et l'Université en même temps leur acheter des fournitures scolaires mais également améliorer les besoins alimentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
This group was established on November 2, 1995. It is made up of nine women who live in the same village and show great solidarity as a group. Their main business consists in raising livestock.

The featured borrower is standing on the right and rising her hand in the photograph. She's 51 years old, married, and the mother of seven children, including three boys. The youngest is 15 years old.

With her loan, she will buy small ruminants (sheep) at the market of her regional capital. She intends to buy 5 sheep for XOF 30'000 each. She will also buy animal feed to fatten them. The remainder of the loan will be used as working capital.

After five months, she will resell each animal, for XOF 75'000, at the same market where she bought them.

Her profits are used to register her children to school and university and buy them school supplies. They also improve the family's feeding conditions.

loans.use: to buy five sheep to fatten and resell

loans.name: Wilian Isaac

texts.es: Wilian tiene 31 años de edad  y reside solo en su propia casa. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ganarse el sustento. ES muy conocido en su comunidad y sus vecinos dan muy buenas referencias ya que se caracteriza por ser trabajador y responsable. Wiliam desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para cambiar las deterioradas paredes que actualmente posee su  vivienda.
texts.en:
Wilian is 31 years old and lives alone in a house he owns. He is a hardworking man, who fights hard to make a living. He is well-known in his community and his neighbors give good references of him. He is a hardworking and responsible person. 

Wilian wants to make some home improvements, and this is why he is requesting a loan at FUSAI. He will buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to change the walls of his house, which are in bad shape.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to change the walls of his house, which are in bad shape.

loans.name: Maria Xiomara

texts.es:
María Xiomara es una joven madre de 25 años de edad la cual se desempeña como ama de casa llevando a cabo las diferentes labores domésticas así como también una conocedora de las diferentes actividades que se desarrollan en el campo como ser: limpieza de terreno, aplicación de abono, recolección del grano, entre otros. Desde muy temprana edad ella aprendió a trabajar la tierra siendo su padre la persona encargada de instruirla en las diferentes actividades de campo para poder defenderse en la vida ya que el cultivo de granos básicos es la principal actividad económica para la alimentación de su familia misma que está compuesta por 5 hijos: el mayor en primaria, los dos siguientes en el kínder y los últimos 2 menores de 5 años quien cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es agricultor. María Xiomara también se desempeña los fines de semana para generar mayores ingresos para su familia ya que los días sábados ella hace nacatamales para la venta así como también pan de casa. María Xiomara es una persona visionaria la cual tiene varios pequeños proyectos para este año gracias a sus habilidades en la cocina como perfeccionar por medio de un curso de panadería y repostería de esta manera ofrecer en su comunidad una mayor variedad y aperturando una pequeña panadería. Con las ganancias obtenidas ella planea comprar un horno eléctrico para ornar mayores cantidades tratando de cumplir sus sueños: apoyara a sus hijos en sus estudios y dando la oportunidad que ella no tuvo en su juventud para poder prepararse académicamente, con mejores oportunidades de empleo y mayores ideas de prendimientos de negocios para generar empleo entre otros.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas para así poder asistir sus cultivos de café y dar a estos la protección necesaria para poder cosechar al final de la temporada un buen grano que ayude a cumplir sus sueños por medio de las ganancias obtenidas.
texts.en:
María Xiomara, 25, is a young woman who works as a housekeeper. She takes care of the household chores and also knows a lot about different agricultural activities. She knows how to clean the fields, spread compost, collect the harvest, etc.

She learned to work the land when she was a little girl. Her father taught her the different activities of the countryside so she could make a living. The family’s main economic activity is growing basic grains. Her family is composed of her husband, who works in agriculture too and helps her, and five children: the eldest child goes to primary school, two go to the kindergarten and the remaining two are not even five years old. 

María Xiomara has an additional job in order to make more money for her family. She prepares nacatamales [a dish similar to the tamal] and home-made bread every Saturday. She is a visionary and has a few small projects for this year. Thinking of her talent for cooking, she is planning to take a course in bakery, open a bakery and offer a wider variety of products. With the profits, she is planning to buy an electric oven with a larger capacity. She is pursuing her dreams: to support her children with their studies and give them the opportunities she did not have for herself when she was young to study, have better job opportunities and even start their own company and create job opportunities for others.

This is why she is requesting a loan at Cooperative COMIXMUL. She will buy agricultural supplies to give maintenance to her coffee plantations. She wants to take good care of them in order to obtain a good bean at the end of the season and start achieving her goals with the profits she will make.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantations.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana de 45 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hija de 4 años de edad. Ana se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 5 años. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a este negocio por lo que ya cuanta con mucha experiencia y con muchos clientes. Ana solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra cemento, arena, grava, arena, ladrillo y hierro para hacer las bases para colocar un portón en su vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana, 45, lives in her own house with her husband and 4 year-old daughter.  Ana's had a business selling clothing for 5 years.  She's been in this business for a long time, and so she already has a lot of experience and many customers.  

Ana is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and steel to use as the base to place a gate on her property, so that her family can have greater security.

loans.use: to buy building materials to install a gate

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es: José de 31 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar  y trabaja como jornalero y agricultor desde hace 10 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. José desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tejas, madera y polines para mejorar el techo de la vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a la familia.
texts.en: Jose, 31, lives in his family in his own home.  He's been working as a farmhand and farmer for 10 years.  This is how he earns a living and contributes to the household finances.  Jose wants to improve the condition of his home.  For this reason, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of tiles, wood and beams to improve the roof of his house and provide better security to his family.

loans.use: to buy tiles, wood and beams to improve the roof of his house

loans.name: Rubia Yolanda

texts.es: Rubia manifestando su gratitud en el seguimiento mediante el tiempo que ha tenido al participar con el apoyo brindado por la cooperativa COMIXMUL en alianza con los inversionistas de KIVA con su primer financiamiento ella  pago puntualmente sus intereses como lo había acordado y el capital al tiempo que ella tenía planeado. Ella pudo vender el producto cosechado de café en su totalidad gracias a la gestión anticipada de compra que había hecho antes de solicitar su financiamiento con una institución local para su compra al final de la cosecha y poder asegurar los ingresos para el bienestar de su familia entre otros. Gracias a su excelente comportamiento de pago Rubia hablo con el oficial de promoción y crédito que la visita para solicitar un segundo financiamiento por una menor cantidad para dar asistencia y mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café, ya que los excedentes generados no son los suficientes para dar la asistencia técnica posible a sus cultivos de café. Por lo que ella hoy en día espera nuevamente ser apoyada con dichos fondos para poder llevar a cabo la parte de tecnificación y limpieza con este segundo financiamiento.
texts.en: Rubia expresses her gratitude here for the support provided by COMIXMUL and KIVA over the time she has been participating in the program.  With her first loan, she made her interest payments on time according the agreement she made, and she had capital at the time that she had planned.  She had been able to negotiate an advance purchase agreement for her entire coffee crop prior to taking a loan from a local institution to help with the harvest of her crops.  This way, she was able to ensure that she would get the income she needed for her family's welfare.   Thanks to her excellent payment history, Rubia spoke with a loan officer who visited her to request a second loan for a small sum so that she can maintain her coffee crops, since the profits that she generated were not sufficient for her to provide the best technical assistance to her crops.  This is why today she is awaiting a new loan, so that she will have the funds she needs to maintain her crops and clear her land.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es: María tiene 54 años de edad y se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen a sus tres hijas 21 años, 17 años y 14 años de edad. María habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y desea reparar el techo de la misma por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada para hacer el cambio del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Maria, 54, has been working as a domestic for a long time.  Along with her life partner, she has 3 daughters aged 21, 17, and 14.  Maria lives with her family in very humble conditions.  She wants to repair the roof on her home, and so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase wood and sheets of corrugated metal so that she can put in a new roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair her roof

loans.name: Maria Silvia

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos y un nieto. María trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace tres años y de esta forma lleva el sustento a sus hijos y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Ella solicita a FUSAI este crédito para invertir en la construcción de una fosa séptica para lo cual necesita comprar  materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y tubos. Confía que con los ingresos que percibe de su trabajo logrará cancelar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Maria, 36, lives in her own home with her children and a grandchild.  Maria has worked as a domestic for 3 years; this is how she supports her children and the household finances.  Maria is requesting this loan from FUSAI to build a septic tank.  To do this, she will need to purchase materials such as bricks, cement, sand, and pipes.  Maria is confident that with the income she earns from her work, she will be able to make the loan payments and pay off the debt.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a septic tank

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 5 años de edad. Sandra se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Sandra desea mejorar el las condiciones de uno de los cuartos de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera y así comenzar las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en: Sandra, 24, lives in her own house with her life partner and their young, 5 year-old daughter.  Sandra has been earning a living working as a domestic for a long time.  She wants to improve the condition of one of the rooms in her house.  For this reason, she has approached FUSAI to request a loan to buy sheets of corrugated metal and wood.  This way she can start making the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair one of the rooms in her house

loans.name: Tania Yaneth

texts.es: Tania de 19 años de edad habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su compañero de vida  y sus dos hijos. Tania es muy trabajadora y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se gana la vida mediante prestación de servicios domésticos y mediante la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. Tania desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina y clavos.
texts.en: Tania, 19, lives in very humble conditions with her life partner and their two children.  Tania is very hardworking and responsible, and she does everything she can to give her children better living conditions.  Tania earns a living by working as a domestic, and also by selling beauty products through a catalog.  She wants to improve her living conditions; this is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy building materials such as wood, corrugated metal, and nails.

loans.use: to buy wood, corrugated metal and nails to improve the condition of her home

loans.name: Pedro Lorenzo

texts.es: Pedro tiene 58 años de edad y trabaja como fotógrafo en eventos especiales y otros. Es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su esposa e hijos mejores condiciones. Pedro solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un servicio sanitario ya que el que tenia en uso colapso y es necesario construir uno nuevo. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en: Pedro, 58, works as a photographer for special events and other occasions.  He is a very hardworking and responsible man who does everything he can to give his wife and children better living conditions.  Pedro is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in building a bathroom, because the one he had been using collapsed, and he needs to build a new one.  With the sum he is requesting, he will buy sheets of corrugated metal, cement, sand, and iron.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, cement, sand and iron

loans.name: Genara

texts.es:
Doña Genara es una mujer de 49 años de edad quien es madre de 5 hijos muy trabajadora y luchadora que diariamente lucha en compañía de su compañero de hogar y sus 3 hijos mayores quienes apoyan a sus padres en las diferentes actividades de campo devengando un salario justo por parte de sus padres por la elaboración de viveros de café mismos que son vendidos en la comunidad. Ellos además cuentan con una tierra cultiva de café muy prospera por la cual agradecen a DIOS la cual genera 25 QQ de café uva ya que desde los 18 años ella aprendió a trabajar en compañía de su hermano mayor. Ella también relata que en compañía de su madre le enseño el arte de la alfarería la elaboración de comales, jarrones, cantaros de barro, etc. Para seguir generando ingresos y apoyar a su familia los días sábados hace nacatamales para salir a vender en su comunidad. Doña Genera tiene varios proyectos planeados para este nuevo año entre los cuales están: comprar 2 parcelas de terreno para sembrar café lempira ya que el año pasado la enfermedad de la roya afecto la mayor parte de las fincas con plantaciones de café catimora, borbón y catuay por lo que son variedades más vulnerables que el café lempira siendo este más fuerte que los anteriormente mencionados. También tiene planeado mejorar su vivienda repellarla con cemento y poner un mejor piso como la cerámica. También sueña con ver a sus hijas graduadas de maestras de educación ya que al menor eso es lo que le gustaría cuando sea adulta.   
Por lo que ella hoy día ha decidido solicitar financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL que ayude a la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, entre otros para poder proteger su plantación de café y echar a andar sus metas, sueños y esperanzas.
texts.en:
Genara, 49, is the mother of 5 children.  She is very hardworking and tenacious.  Each day, she works hard alongside her partner and their 3 adult children, who support their parents in the various farming activities, and earning a fair salary from their parents for growing coffee seedlings that they sell in their community.  The family also has some land where they cultivate coffee.  This business has been very profitable, for which they thank God, as it generates 2500 pounds of coffee beans.  

Genara learned to grow coffee 18 years ago, working with her older brother.  She also states that her mother taught her the art of making pottery.  She makes griddles, vases, clay jars, and other items.  Also, in order to generate more income and support her family, she makes nacatamales on Saturdays which she goes out to sell in her community.  

Genera has a lot of projects planned for the upcoming year, including purchasing 2 parcels of land to cultivate the Lempira (fugus-resistant) variety of coffee, because last year the Roya fungus affected most of the coffee plantations that were planted with other, more vulnerable, varieties of coffee.  She also plans to make some improvements to her house: plastering it with cement and putting in a new tile floor.  Genera also dreams of seeing her daughters get degrees in education, because she wants them to become teachers when they are adults.

This is why Genara is now requesting a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to purchase chemical and organic fertilizers and other supplies to protect her coffee crops, so that she can put her plans in motion to achieve her goals, hopes and dreams.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops

loans.name: Andres Hernan

texts.es: Andres de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 19 años y 11 años de edad. Él trabaja como albañil desde hace 22 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro perimetral para lo cual necesita comprar maya ciclón y postes de cemento y así dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en: Andres, 49, lives in his own home with his wife and their 2 children aged 19 and 11.  He has been working as a bricklayer for 22 years.  This is how he earns a living and supports his household.  With the aim of providing his family with better security, he decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a wall around his house.  To do this, he must buy chain link fence and cement posts.  This way, he can provide his family with greater security.

loans.use: to buy chain link fencing and cement posts to build a wall around his house

loans.name: Rafaela Francisca

texts.es: Rafaela tiene 47 años d edad y se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante desde hace 4 años por lo que cuenta con mucha experiencia y clientes. Rafaela solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para la hija ya que su vivienda es pequeña y no hay mucho espacio para toda la familia. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Rafaela, 47, sells cosmetics via catalogue.  She has done this work as a street vendor for four years, so she has a lot of experience and customers.

Rafaela's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in building a room for her daughter.  Her house is small and there's not much room for the whole family.  She's going to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails with the requested amount.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails

loans.name: Carlos Samuel

texts.es: Carlos de 31 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa, su hija y un hijo quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Carlos trabaja como carpintero dese hace 7 años. Es un hombre muy trabajador quien se gana la vida honradamente y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Carlos desea ampliar su pequeña galera donde con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña carpintería la cual es muy importante ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Carlos, 31, lives in his own house with his wife as well as his daughter and son, who attend public school in their town.

Carlos has worked as a carpenter for seven years.  He's a very hardworking man who earns an honorable living and does everything he can to support his household.

Carlos wants to expand his small workshop, where he has managed with a lot of effort to set up a small furniture store that's very important to him because it's his main source of income.  This is why he's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in buying galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails

loans.name: Jerlis

texts.es:
Jerlis vive en la ciudad de Ica, trabaja como obrero en un fundo de su ciudad y con el fruto de su trabajo puede salir adelante cada día.

Jerlis está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva, ya que gracias a sus apoyo el podrá comprar una cocina y una cama, ya que actualmente tiene estos implementos pero en malas condiciones, de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y poder seguir adelnate en busca de lograr su gran sueño:”Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Jerlis lives in the city of Ica.  He works on a farm in his city and is able to get ahead every day with the fruit of his labor.

Jerlis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he'll be able to buy a stove and a bed.  The ones he currently has are in bad condition.

This way Jerlis will be able to improve his quality of life and get ahead in search of his big dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to buy a stove and a bed

loans.name: Isaia Walberto

texts.es: Isaia de 44 años d edad reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 22 años, 16 años y 11 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Isaia trabaja como empleado desde hace mucho tiempo en una empresa cercana de su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a sus hijos. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una letrina ya que la que tiene se encuentra colapsada. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina, galvanizada, ladrillo, hierro y cemento.
texts.en:
Isaia, 44, lives in his own house with his life partner and his three children, ages 22, 16, and 11, who attend school.

Isaia has been an employee in a company near his town for a long time.  This is how he earns a living and supports his children.

He's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in building a latrine, because the current one is broken.  With the requested amount he'll buy galvanized metal sheets, bricks, rebar, and cement.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, brick, rebar, and cement to build a latrine

loans.name: Fiapai

texts.en: Fiapai is a 31-year-old single woman with two children. She has a small plantation and grows taro,yams, taamu, and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Fiapai has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, bush knives, weed-sprayer, and fertilizer. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Fipai hopes to extend her business and children's education as well.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weedsprayer, bush knives, spades, and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Faatu

texts.en: Faatu is a 26 year old married woman who has no children. She has a small business, taro and taamu plantation. She is requesting this loan to help her make improvements to her house, so her family can have better living conditions.Faatu will use the loan to iron roofing materials and cement. She will also use part of her loan to buy chemicals,bush-knives,tarpaulin and pickaxe for her business.Faatu joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy iron roofing materials , cement.,chemicals,bushknives, tarpaulin and pickaxe

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es:
Fatima trabaja como encargada de una Cabina Telefónica, vive sola, pues sus padres son del interior, y ella vino a la capital para poder estudiar y salir adelante.
Comenta que sus metas futuras son trabajar en su profesión, que es la de Kinesiología y poder especializarse en otra áreas de la medicina. Con esto espera realizarse profesionalmente y también lograr su progreso y el bienestar de su familia.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Fátima's the manager of a telephone center.  She lives alone because her parents are from the interior and she came to the capital to study and get ahead.

She says her goals for the future are to work in her profession, kinesiology, and be able to specialize in other areas of medicine.  She hopes to be an accomplished professional and bring progress and well-being to her family.

Fátima's asking for this loan so she can pay her fees and keep on studying.

loans.use: to pay her fees

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
Andrea es  hija de  madre soltera, atiende en una cantina, y comenta que su mamá y ella vendían comida para salir adelante.
Ella está estudiando para ser profesora, y por medio de ello poder aumentar y mejorar su calidad de visa, y así también seguir ayudando a su familia.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere pagar sus gastos de transportación, y así seguir cubriendo ese gasto del día a día. Ella agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir creciendo como persona y profesional.
texts.en:
Andrea's the daughter of a single mother.  She works in a cantina and said that she and her mother sell food to get ahead.

She's studying to be a teacher so she can increase and improve her quality of life.  This way she'll be able to continue helping her family.

Andrea's requesting this loan because she wants to pay her transportation expenses on a daily basis.  She's grateful for this opportunity to keep on growing as a person and a professional.

loans.use: to pay transportation expenses

loans.name: Gudelia

texts.es:
Gudelia trabaja como funcionaria de un diario, está estudiando la carrera de  Administración de Empresas, en el cuarto año. Comenta que pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas del año 2014.
Comenta que su sueño es poder ser una profesional que ayude a las demás personas, por medio de todo lo que pudo aprender con sus estudios. También quiere poder ayudar a su familia, y darles todo lo que ella no tuvo.
texts.en:
Gudelia works for a newspaper.  She studies business administration and is in her fourth year.  She said she's requesting the loan to cover her fees for the 2014 year.

Gudelia's dream is to be able to be a professional who helps other people with everything she was able to learn through her studies.  She also wants to be able to help her family and give them everything she didn't have.

loans.use: to pay her fees

loans.name: Elda

texts.es:
Elda es funcionaria de un banco,  está estudiando la carrera de ciencias contables, es una persona muy dedicada a sus estudios, y está luchando por ser una profesional exitosa y que pueda ayudar a las demás personas.
Comenta también que siempre pone su mayor esfuerzo en sobresalir en todo lo que hace, como ser sus estudios y su trabajo.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y de esa forma poder cumplir con ese compromiso que tiene y seguir luchando por cumplir con su meta.
texts.en:
Elda work in a bank.  She's studying accounting and is very dedicated to her studies.  She's striving to be a successful professional who can help other people.

Elda also said she always puts all her effort into getting ahead in everything she does, such as her studies and her job.

Elda's requesting this loan to be able to pay her fees so she can fulfill her commitment and continue striving for her goal.

loans.use: to pay her fees

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
San Francisco es un grupo que gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo ya está en su ciclo 13 de programa de comités, además de eso forman también parte del programa de la eliminación de la pobreza, que les permite conocer cómo se encuentra cada una y conforme a ello poder mejorar su calidad y estilo de vida, no solo de ellas sino también de su familia.
Ana es parte de este grupo, y comenta que entre los trabajos que ella hacen esta la confección de pantallas y sombreros hechos de Karanday,  que en esta época hay mayor venta , también se debe destacar el trabajo que todas hace, ya que ponen su mayor esfuerzo por poder crecer.
La Sra. Ana solicita de este crédito para la compra de sus materiales, como ser Karanday, hilos, pegamentos y demás lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
San Francisco Group, thanks to its effort and work, is in its thirteenth loan cycle with the committee program.  They're also part of the poverty-elimination program, which allows them to know where each one stands and how they can improve their quality of life and lifestyle, not only for themselves but also for their families.

Ana's part of this group.  She said one of the jobs she does is making screens and hats of karanday fronds, which sell better this time of year.  She also pointed out the good work that all the members do, because they put their best effort into being able to grow.

Ana's requesting this loan to buy karanday fronds, thread, glue, and other supplies.  This will help her firm up her business plan and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy karanday fronds, thread, glue, and other supplies

loans.name: Luchadoras Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo nuevo llamado Luchadoras, ya que eso es lo que todas son, mujeres luchadoras que quieren poder ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo en conjunto. Están en el primer ciclo del programa de comités, donde están con mucho entusiasmo de poder crecer y mejorar su estilo de vida.                                        La Sra. Edilberta, es una de las integrantes, quien es también la presidenta de este grupo, comenta que es empleada doméstica en una casa de familia, ella desea invertir este préstamo en compra de ropas para la venta, ya que quiere poder invertir en un negocio, para poder tener un mejor ingreso para poder ayudar a su familia. Ella agradece por esta oportunidad que todas estén recibiendo, que les permitirá poder ayudar a sus familias por medio de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Luchadoras [Determined women] is a new group of women who are just that--determined--and they want to work together to help their families through their jobs.  They're in their first loan cycle of the committee program and they're very enthusiastic about being able to grow and improve their lifestyle.                                      

Edilberta, one of the members, is also the president of the group.  She said she's a domestic employee in a family home.

Edilberta wants to invest this loan in buying clothing to sell.  She wants to be able to invest in a business so she'll have a better income to help her family.

She's grateful for the opportunity they're all getting because it will allow them to help their families through their work.

loans.use: to buy garments

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La Sra. Alicia es soltera, sin hijos, comenta que se inició en la confección de artesanías siendo muy joven, proveía a vendedores ambulantes de la zona, y ya que su ganancia era muy pequeña, entonces decidió comercializar ella misma hacia otras zonas y alrededores. Primeramente solo comercializaba las artesanías (hamacas y sobrecamas), con el tiempo aumentó la variedad de sus productos, ahora ya lleva todo tipo de productos sobre pedidos, como calzados deportivos, sábanas, colchones, jeans, etc.
Alicia viene de una familia muy trabajadora y humilde, ella es la que cuida de su padre de edad avanzada con quien vive actualmente.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas varias, calzados deportivos, jeans y demás productos para la venta, y está muy agradecida por esta oportunidad de poder seguir trabajando para ayudar a su papá.
texts.en:
Alicia is single and has no children. She says she started making craft items when she was very young, supplying street vendors in the area. Since her profit was very small she decided to sell the items herself in other districts and surrounding areas. At first she just sold the handicrafts (hammocks and bedspreads) and gradually she increased the variety of products. Now she sells all sorts of products to order, such as sports shoes, sheets, mattresses, jeans etc. Alicia comes from a very hard-working and humble family. She is the one who looks after her father who is of an advanced age and whom she lives with currently.

Alicia is asking for this loan to buy various clothing, sports shoes, jeans and other items to sell, and is very grateful for this opportunity so she can carry on working to help her dad.

loans.use: to buy various clothing, sports shoes, jeans and other items to sell.

loans.name: Cintya

texts.es:
La señora Cintya vive en su casa propia junto con Alcides quien es su pareja, ellos trabajan en el micro centro de la ciudad, donde ella tiene un pequeño puesto donde venden mate y terere, que son las bebidas oficiales del Paraguay, y que son consumidas todo el año.
Gracias a esta actividad han salido adelante, pues ya tienen clientela bien formada tanto Paraguayos y extranjeros. Ella es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación, tiene un espíritu jovial y emprendedor que no cabe dudas que va a llegar a conseguir todas las metas que se ha propuesto.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de termos y guampas para poder alquilar a sus clientes con el terere y mate que prepara.
texts.en:
Cintya lives in her own house with her partner Alcides. They work in the city centre where she has a small stall selling "mate" and "tereré", which are the official drinks of Paraguay and are consumed throughout the year [both are traditional herbal drinks]. Thanks to this business they have been able to make progress in life, since they now have an established clientele of both Paraguayans and other nationalities.

Cintya is a very responsible person and wants to get on in life. Because of her jovial nature and entrepreneurial spirit there is no doubt that she will achieve all of the goals she has set herself. 

Cintya is asking for this loan to buy thermos flasks and "guampas" [traditional drinking vessels made from horn] so she can hire them out to her customers with the tereré and mate she makes.

loans.use: to buy thermos flasks and "guampas" [traditional drinking vessels]

loans.name: Jorgelina

texts.es:
La  Sra.  Jorgelina  esta casada con el Sr. Ramón , ellos tienen 1 hijo mayor que ya esta casado. La señora tiene una despensa bien surtida y de buena ubicación ya que es la única despensa en los alrededores.
Comenta que se inició hace varios años con muy pocos productos, que poco a poco fue aumentando con el pasar de los años. Hoy día ella tiene una despensa bien surtida y buenos precios, con una clientela formada. Comenta que su marido es una persona muy trabajadora y con ello han dado a su hijo todo lo que pudieron para que sea una persona de bien. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable a sus compromisos.
