Pide este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de azúcar, arroz, fideo, jabones varios y otros para poder surtir su negocio y así seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Jorgelina  is married to Ramón ad they have an adult son who is now married. Jorgelina has a well stocked grocery store which is in a good location as it is the only one in the area. She says she started out several years ago with very few products and has gradually increased them over the years. Now she has a well stocked shop with good prices and an established clientele. 

She says her husband is very hard-working and together they have given their son everything possible to make him a good person. She is very hard-working and takes her commitments seriously. 

Jorgelina is asking for this loan to buy sugar, rice, noodles, various soaps and other items so she can stock her business and continue working.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, noodles, various soaps and other items.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
La Sra. Josefa es una persona muy trabajadora, por medio de su despensa sigue trabajando y con los ingresos que tiene puede cubrir los gastos de la casa. Su marido siempre es su mayor sostén y quien la apoya siempre.
Comenta que su anterior préstamo le ha sido de mucha ayuda, ya que compró insumos para poder surtir su despensa. Hoy pide de un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar mas insumos para su despensa, y de esa forma poder seguir trabajando y dar a sus clientes todo lo que piden.
Quiere comprar verduras, carne, frutas, vegetales y demás.
texts.en:
Josefa is a very hard-working person. By having a grocery store she has been able to continue working and with the income she makes she is able to cover the household costs. Her husband is the main breadwinner and he always supports her. She says the previous loan has been a great help as she was able to buy supplies to stock the shop.

Today she is asking for a new loan so she can buy more supplies for her grocery store. This will mean she can continue working and giving her customers everything they are looking for. She wants to buy vegetables, meat, fruit and other items.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, fruit and other items.

loans.name: Matilda

texts.en: Matilda is applying for a loan of 1,000 USD from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is married and she is 38 years old. She is running a kiosk in front of her house and she will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as water, noodles, cigarettes, salt, milk, eggs, coffee, sugar, bread and fish canes. She is making good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. Matilda is living in a town nearby a school; her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy, including students.

loans.use: to buy water, noodles, cigarettes, salt, milk, eggs, coffee, sugar, bread and fish canes.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is thankful for the financial assistance previously extended to her. She was able to buy the gardening materials and supplies needed in her business. Her income from business is assisting her to meet her family's everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another loan, this time in the amount of 25,000 PHP. She will be using the loan to buy gardening materials, like wire and baskets, and supplies such as seed and fertilizer. She needs these items in her business. Her profits from this business will definitely help her to meet her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Nida dreams that she will have an extension for her garden, and hopes that her family is always in good condition. She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her life and business, and to draw strength and inspiration from the group and from the Word of God.


* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to buy gardening materials, like wire and baskets, and supplies such as seed and fertilizer, for her business

loans.name: Enila Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 54-year-old Esther from Mutare. She is married with three children. She also cares for one other dependent. Esther runs a retail business selling ladies' suits, kids' wear and footwear. The business has been in operation for five years. She says one of the main challenges faced is that some clients fail to pay her on time. 

Esther has requested a loan of $400 to purchase ladies' suits, kids' wear and footwear for resale. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to improve general family welfare. In the future Esther plans to have ownership of a boutique shop. Esther is a member of Enila group.

loans.use: to buy ladies suits, kidswear and footwear for resale.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a repeat borrower, age 38, and a resident of Butinde Kinoni, Ntungamo district. He is married with five children who all go the school; he is also responsible for meeting their basic needs.

He applied for a loan of 3,000,000 shs to improve and increase his farming business. He has a piggery business and wants to buy more pigs and hire more labor for pruning, weeding, and mulching his banana plantation. In the foreground is the client and the credit officer at the back.

loans.use: To buy pigs and hire labour

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Please meet 46-year-old Esther from Liberia; specifically, she lives in the community surrounding Airport.  She is married with five children between 19 and 30 years old; they are in school and living on their own. 

For the past 10 years she has been selling clothes in the local market. She started her business with money from her mother and learned this way of selling from her. She sells from 7 am to 4 pm from Monday to Saturday.  She is grateful for her business because she makes a profit every day. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more clothes for her bread business. 

Her plan is to build a house and expand her business. She would like to thank BRAC Liberia for their continued support.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for her bread business.

loans.name: Himbarwa Group

texts.fr:
Egide fait partie du groupe  Himbarwa  et habite à  Gitega. Il  a 29 ans et est marié  à M. Rose, un  commerçant.  

Il est menuisier et fait le commerce des meubles depuis 12 ans.

Il est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter   beaucoup de  planches pour la fabrication  de beaucoup de meubles  à  vendre  pour gagner  plus.

loans.use: il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter   beaucoup de  planches pour la fabrication des meubles  à  vendre  pour gagner  plus.

loans.name: Argentina

texts.es: Argentina es una mujer de 398 años de edad lastimosamente solo pudo cursar hasta el cuarto grado de primaria ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos y es por eso que ha trabajado duro junto a su esposo para que sus hijos tengan lo que ella en su juventud no pudo tener. Con el apoyo de su esposo con quien se dedica a trabajar la tierra (cultivo de café) rubro principal para obtener ingresos para su familia y dar a sus hijos lo necesario. Sus 4 hijos les apoyan en el mantenimiento, limpia y fertilización de sus cultivos de café pero junto a su esposo trabajan la jornada completa para que sus hijos pudiesen cursar la primaria completa y lograr que sigan estudiando para alcanzar sus ideales. Tiene una experiencia de 26 años dedicándose a este rubro y las tierras donde cultivan son obtenidas por compra realizada con esfuerzo y sacrificio ubicados alrededor de su casa de habitación por la que agradecen a DIOS ya que de esa manera pasan más pendientes de los cultivos. Argentina sueña con poder reparar bien su casa de habitación con parte de las ganancias que le del café este año y re invertir la otra parte en sus cultivos de café para seguir ampliando la propiedad con una mejora variedad y solidificar el patrimonio para sus hijos esperando el apoyo de la cooperativa COMIXMUL en alianza con los inversionistas en la plataforma KIVA para poder comprar fertilizantes, abonos, etc. y lograr dar un excelente mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Argentina is 39 years old. Unfortunately she was only able to study as far as fourth grade of primary education since her parents had very little money. This is why she and her husband have worked hard so that their children can have what she was unable to have during her childhood. Together with her husband she works the land, growing coffee, which is their main source of work, to provide an income for the family and give their children what they need. 

Their 4 children help them with the maintenance, clearing weeds and fertilising the coffee crops but Argentina and her husband work all day long so that the children can complete their primary education and continue studying so that they can achieve their dreams. Argentina has 26 years' experience in this work and the land where they grow the crops has been bought through hard work and sacrifice. The land is situated around their home and they thank God for this as it means they can keep a better eye on their crops. 

Argentina's dream is to be able to repair her home properly with some of the profits from this year's coffee and reinvest the rest in her coffee plants so she can continue to increase the farm with a better variety and improve the assets for her children. 

She is hoping for the support of the COMIXMUL cooperative in conjunction with the Kiva lenders so she can buy fertilizers, manure etc. and be able to provide very good care to her coffee crops.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for tending the coffee crop.

loans.name: Maria Suyapa

texts.es:
María Suyapa es una mujer de 34 años de edad, madre soltera de 2 hijos quienes viven con ella y su abuelo y asisten a la escuela. Con un grado de estudio de primaria completa ella agradece el apoyo brindado por sus padres económicamente y moralmente ya que con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio lograron que ella aprendiera lo básico leer, escribir, sumar y restar entre otros conocimientos. Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la actividad de cultivar café siendo su padre quien le enseñara a muy temprana edad dicha actividad mismo quien le heredara la tierra que hoy en día en su compañía trabaja siendo el su único apoyo en el campo. En el trabajo de que realizan en el campo también se involucran sus hijos ya que al salir de sus actividades escolares se dirigen hasta la propiedad para poder apoyar a su madre y su abuelo.
Sus metas dar el mantenimiento necesario posible a sus cultivos de café para poder obtener una excelente cosecha al final de la temporada, mejorar la economía de su familia, su hogar y principalmente el futuros de sus hijos en quien ella tiene gran fe y esperanza, así como también poder seguir solidificando el patrimonio para los mismos y que puedan heredar la tierra que hoy en día con sus propia manos trabajan. 
Por lo que María Suyapa hoy en día ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas con los cuales dará asistencia técnica a sus cultivos de café y lograra protegerlos de plagas, bichos y enfermedades que destruyen la plantación.
texts.en:
María Suyapa is 34 years old and is a single mother with 2 children who live with her and their grandfather and go to school. As she had a complete primary education she is grateful for the financial and moral support her parents gave her as it took a lot of effort and sacrifice on their part for her to be able to learn the basics of reading, writing, adding and subtracting as well as learning other things. 

For the last 10 years she has earned a living growing coffee, having learnt the skills from her father at a very young age. Her father has given her the land which nowadays they work on together and he is the only help she has in the field. The children also get involved in working in the fields and when they finish their school activities they go to the farm so they can help their mother and grandfather. 

María Suyapa's goals are to give the best possible care to the coffee crops so they have an excellent harvest at the end of the season, as well as improving the family and household finances and especially the future of her children, in whom she has a great deal of faith and hope. She also wants to be able to continue improving the assets for her children so they can inherit the land which they are currently working with their own hands. 

This is why María Suyapa has today asked the COMIXMUL cooperative for a loan, to buy agricultural supplies so she can give specialised care to the coffee plants and successfully protect them from pests, insects and diseases which could destroy the plantation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for tending the coffee crop.

loans.name: Organizando Metas Group

texts.es: el grupo organizando metas esta compuesto por cuatro integrantes  siendo la responsable Maryury quien se esfurza por sacar adelante su negocio, es madre soltera de dos niños, uno de ellos cursa la escuela el otro no aun esta pequeño.  la joven trabaja de lunes a domingo  desde las seis de la mañana elabora sus tortillas y pone a cocer los frijoles para ofrecerle a sus clientes su productos.
texts.en: The "Organizando Metas" group consists of four members and is led by Maryury. She works hard to keep her business going and is a single mother of two children. One of her kids is in school and the other is still too young to attend. She works Monday through Sunday and starts making tortillas and cooking beans at 6 AM to offer her products to the customers.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her business such as beans, firewood, corn, bread, coffee, and sugar.

loans.name: Elvira De Los Angeles

texts.es: Elvira de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia  desde hace mucho tiempo y se dedica a los oficios domésticos desde hace tres años.  Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Elvira solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una galera para bodega ya que su vivienda es pequeña y no tiene mucho espacio para sus pocas pertenencias. Con el crédito solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
53-year-old Elvira has lived in her own house for a long time and for 3 years has earned a living doing domestic work. She is a very hard-working woman who does everything she possibly can to provide for her household. 

Elvira is asking for this loan from FUSAI to build an outbuilding to use for storage since her house is small and she does not have much space for her few belongings. With the requested loan she will buy laminated sheets and wood.

loans.use: to buy galvanised sheets and wood to build an outbuilding to use as a storeroom.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Carmen a sus 42 años de edad es madre de 2 hijos quienes son menores de edad el mayor asiste a la primaria en una escuela de la comunidad y el ultimo aún no tiene edad para estudiar. Ella es casada y en compañía de su esposo se dedican al cultivo de papa ya que dicha actividad la aprendió de sus padres quienes a temprana edad le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra ya que en su familia el trabajo de campo es una vocación y tradición. Ella tiene un grado de escolaridad primario completo el cual pudo cursar gracias al apoyo financiero y moral de sus padres pero en su familia la economía no era la mejor ya que desciende de una familia económicamente humilde por lo que no pudo seguir con sus estudios. Sus clientes para la venta del producto de papa son los diferentes intermediarios que llegan a la zona como también familiares y amigos. 
Sus metas, planes y sueños a futuro es dar a sus hijos una buena educación estudiantil con una buena calidad para que se especialicen en carreras universitarias que sean de provecho para ellos y sus futuras familias, fortalecer el patrimonio y poder heredarle a cada uno de ellos una parcela de tierra para que trabajen y construyan sus hogares.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento con el cual comprara insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de hortaliza como el brócoli, coliflor, frijol, Chile y papa ya que de esta manera ella podrá lograr cuidar y proteger sus cultivos para poder obtener una excelente cosecha, incrementar sus ingresos y generar mayores ganancias para re invertir en los mismos.
texts.en:
Carmen is 42 years old and has 2 young sons. The older one goes to a primary school in the local community and the younger one is still too young to go to school. Carmen is married and together she and her husband make a living growing potatoes. She learnt the skills from her parents who taught her at a young age how to work the land, since in the family there is a tradition and a vocation for farming work. She has completed primary education, which was made possible by the financial and moral support of her parents. However, in her family the financial situation was not the best as she comes from a family with a very humble background, so she was unable to continue with her studies.

The customers she sells the potato harvest to are the various middlemen who visit the area as well as family and friends. Her goals, plans and dreams for the future are to give her sons a good quality education so they can do specialised university courses which will be of benefit to them and their future families. She also wants to strengthen her assets so she can pass on a piece of land to each of them where they can work and build their homes.

This is why Carmen has now asked for a loan, which she will use to buy agricultural supplies to nurture her vegetable crops such as broccoli, cauliflower, beans, chillies and potatoes. They will help her to look after and protect the crops in order to get an excellent harvest, increase her income and generate better profits to reinvest in her crops.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for growing vegetables.

loans.name: Rosa Evelin

texts.es: Rosa de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo. Rosa se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que  este a su alcance para ayudar a la economía del hogar. Rosa desea construir el techo del corredor de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y teja.
texts.en: Rosa is 39 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and her son. Rosa earns a living selling vegetables at the central market in her local area. She is a very hard-working woman who does everything she possibly can to help the household finances. Rosa wants to build a roof on the passageway outside her home so she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy wood and tiles.

loans.use: to buy wood and tiles to put a roof on the passageway of her home.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Gracias a su primer financiamiento Ángela se encuentra muy contenta y muy feliz porque compro los fertilizantes, abonos, fungicidas entre otros con los que dio asistencia y mantenimiento a sus cultivos de fresa y papa logrando obtener una producción de 70 QQ de papa de primera calidad y 15 QQ de segunda las cuales vendió a muy buen precio a pesar de la baja de precios en el mercado local de dicho producto. Sus productos fueron vendidos a intermediarios de la zona, las personas que venden este producto en los puestos del mercado de la zona entre otros que hicieron posible su venta y los ingresos obtenidos. La lucha de Ángela por cumplir sus metas, esperanzas y sueños sigue ya que ella se puso al día con sus compromisos, el apoyo a su familia, la compra de víveres, vestimenta entre otras necesidades que son necesarias de cubrir para el bienestar. Gracias a la pronta paga, la credibilidad y la puntualidad de pago ella solicito un segundo financiamiento con el cual comenzara de cero comprando foliares, fertilizantes, abono, semilla de papa de primera calidad ya que gran parte de la misma gracias a la ganancia obtenida pudo comprar pero aún queda la preparación de suelo entre otros para que este segundo cultivo sea de provecho y de mucha dicha.
texts.en:
Thanks to her first loan Angela is very happy because she bought the fertilizers, manures, fungicides and other items which she used to cultivate her strawberry and potato crops. Thus she managed to get a harvest of 70 quintals of first quality potatoes and 15 quintals of second quality, which she sold at a very good price in spite of the drop in the price of potatoes in the local market. Her products were sold to middlemen in the area, people who sell the potatoes at the local and other markets and make it possible for her to sell her produce and make an income.

Angela's mission to meet her goals, hopes and dreams continues now she is up to date with her commitments: supporting the family, buying groceries and clothing as well as other necessities which have to be covered for the family's wellbeing. Based on her paying off the loan promptly, her credibility and her punctual payments, she is asking for a second loan which she will use to start afresh, buying foliar feeds, fertilizers, manure and first quality seed potatoes. She has been able to buy a lot of this with the profits she made but she still needs to prepare the land and do other tasks so that this second crop is worthwhile and makes her very happy.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for growing certified seed potatoes.

loans.name: Mercedes Yolanda

texts.es: Mercedes de 66 años de edad es una mujer admirable ya que es muy conocida en su localidad como una mujer trabajadora y responsable. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Dicho negocio es muy importante ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Mercedes desea reparar el techo de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y no es muy seguro. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Mercedes, 66, is an admirable woman who is very well known in her town as being a hard worker and responsible.  For quite some time she has been running a store and the business is very important because it is her main source of income.  Mercedes wants to repair the roof of her house which is dilapidated and not very safe.  Therefore she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy wood and metal sheeting.

loans.use: To buy wood and metal sheeting to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Etbel Jeannette

texts.es: Etbel de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 12 y 18 años de edad, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de cosmeticos, lociones, perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, etc.  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Etbel esta solicitando un credito a INTEGRAL para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio ya que le genera buenas ganancias y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Etbel, 44, lives in her own house with her husband and two children, ages 12 and 18.  For several years she has been selling cosmetics, lotions, perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc.  Her business is set up at home and the profits she earns, and help from her husband, go toward covering household expenses.  Etbel is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy more wholesale products so she can continue her business.  It generates a good profit, so she can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, lotions, perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Rosa tiene 20 años de edad y junto a su compañero de vida trabajan muy duro para sacar adelante a su pequeña hija. Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva desde hace dos años. Tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio por lo que ya posee muchos clientes que cada día  la prefieren más. Rosa desea hacer una pequeña ampliación a su pequeña vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en: Rosa, 20, lives with her common-law husband and they work hard to provide for their small daughter.  Rosa has been in business for two years selling new clothing.  She has a lot of experience and many customers who prefer her business to others.  She wants to carry out small improvements at home and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand and gravel to renovate her house.

loans.name: Maria Bernarda

texts.es: María de 62 años de edad vive con su hija de 19 años de edad. María ha logrado sacar adelante a su hija y se siente orgullosa ya que actualmente está cursando una profesión universitaria. María se ha dedicado desde hace mucho tiempo ha vender antojitos típicos como Tostadas, atol de maíz, empanadas de frijol y de leche entre otros productos. Ella tiene un lugar especifico en su comunidad donde hace su venta, aunque cuando las ventas no son tan buenas tiene que caminar buena parte del pueblo. María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar materia prima para su negocio así como aceite, harina, azúcar, canela, maíz, guineo etc.
texts.en: María, 62, lives with her 19-year-old daughter who she has raised and is very proud of because she is currently studying at the university.  María has been in business for several years selling local snack foods such as tostadas, atol de maíz (corn flower drink), bean and milk empanadas (pies) and other products.  She works in a specific neighborhood of the village and even when sales are low she has to walk quite a ways through the village.  María is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy ingredients for her business such as oil, flour, sugar, cinnamon, corn, bananas, etc.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as oil, flour, sugar, cinnamon, corn, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Maria Felicita

texts.es: María de 63 años de edad se dedica desde hace 32 años a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado de su localidad. María es una persona muy carismática y muchas persona prefieren comprar sus productos ya que la forma como los atiende es muy agradable. María desea seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes mayor cantidad y variedad de productos por lo que ha solicitado a FUSAI para un crédito y poder comprar más productos como; Naranjas, Papayas, Tomate grande, Frijol, Maíz, Maicillo y otros más. María tiene un buen record crediticio.
texts.en: María, 63, has been selling fruits and vegetables at the local market for 32 years.  She is a very charismatic person and many people prefer to buy products from her because of her kind customer service.  María wants to continue offering her customers a wider variety of products so she is requesting a loan through FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy more products such as oranges, papayas, tomatoes, beans, corn, sorghum and other products.  María has a good credit record.

loans.use: To buy products such as oranges, papayas, tomatoes, beans, corn, sorghum and others.

loans.name: Idalia Marizza

texts.es: Doña Idalia, esta casada, tiene 57 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 3 nietos en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Hace 7 años que se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como ropa usada americana, lociones, calzado y otra achinería. Las ventas las realiza en forma ambulante. Ha solicitado 8,000 Lempiras para comprar ropa en general como pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa de niño etc. para cumplir con los pedidos que tiene. Su propósito de seguir trabajando es poder ver en crecimiento su negocio.
texts.en: Idalia, 57, is married and lives with her husband and three grandchildren in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  For seven years she has been selling merchandise in general such as used American clothing, lotions, shoes and trinkets, working as a street vendor.  Idalia is requesting a loan in the amount of 8,000 HNL to buy clothing in general such as pants, shirts, blouses, children's clothing, etc. to fill the orders she has.  Her goal is to continue working and growing her business.

loans.use: To buy American clothing such as blouses, shirts, pants, children's clothing, etc. to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario de 43 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos menores de edad a quienes con mucho esfuerzo les están dando la educación escolar. Su esposo es jornalero y Rosario se dedica a prestación de servicios domésticos y los fines de semana se dedica a la elaboración de pupusas (plato típico de El Salvador, elaborado de arroz o maíz rellenas con frijoles refrito, chicharrón, ayotes u otros ricos ingredientes). Rosario a visto que con la elaboración de pupusas le está yendo muy bien por lo que ha decidido solicitar a FUSAI un crédito para comprar más productos para la elaboración de pupusas; con el dinero comprará maíz, frijoles, ayote, chicharrón y otros productos.
texts.en: Rosario, 43, lives with her husband and their three minor children who are receiving a school education through the efforts of their parents.  Her husband is a wage earner and Rosario works as a domestic employee.  On weekends she makes pupusas (a typical dish in El Salvador made with rice or corn and stuffed with refried beans, pork cracklings, pumpkin and other tasty ingredients).  Rosario sees that the pupusa business is going well for her so she has decided to request a loan through FUSAI to buy more products to make pupusas.  She will use the money to buy corn, beans, pumpkin, pork cracklings and other products.

loans.use: To buy corn, beans, pumpkin, pork cracklings and other products to make pupusas.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es: Ana de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar y  trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Ana desea construir un muro de retención frente a su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra para la construcción del muro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio lo antes posible a la construcción.
texts.en: Ana, 24, lives in her own home with her family and she works in a company near her town.  Ana wants to build a retention wall in front of her house and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron, and to hrie workers to build the wall.  She hopes she can count on this financing and begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, sand and iron, and to hire workers to build a retention wall.

loans.name: Maria Adelaida

texts.es: María Adelaida se encuentra muy feliz y muy satisfecha pero sobre todo agradecida con DIOS por haber dado la oportunidad de poder acceder a los fondos KIVA en alianza con la cooperativa COMIXMUL mismos que ayudaron a poder comprar los insumos que necesitaba para lograr obtener una excelente cosecha y muy buenas ganancias. Gracias a su primer financiamiento María Adelaida pudo invertir en sus cultivos de hortalizas (papa) comprando los insumos necesarios para la aplicación y protección de sus cultivos logrando obtener un excelente resultado de 18 QQ de papa de segunda calidad que a pesar de todo pudo vender su producto a muy buen precio en el mercado local y con los diferentes intermediarios que llegan a la zona y 50 QQ de primera calidad. Antes de poder de tener acceso al financiamiento relata que su vida era muy difícil ya que la credibilidad en el pequeño productor en muchas instituciones no es muy considerada. Por lo que gracias a las ganancias obtenidas ella pudo cancelar su primer financiamiento y acercarse con la frente en alto nuevamente a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para solicitar un segundo financiamiento con el cual nuevamente preparara un nuevo pedazo de tierra de maleza, comprara insumos que son necesarios para la protección y desarrollo del producto a cosechar.
texts.en:
María Adelaida is very happy and content, and grateful to God for having the opportunity to receive a KIVA loan through COMIXMUL to help her buy the supplies she needs for an excellent harvest and very good profit.  Thanks to her first loan, María Adelaida was able to invest in her potato crop and buy the supplies she needed to protect her crop and get excellent results.  Although the crop was second grade 18 QQ, she was able to sell it all at a very good price at the local market.  Through different dealers she was able to get to a 50 QQ first grade.

Before having access to the loans she says her life was very difficult because the credibility of a small farmer is not highly considered by many institutions.  So thanks to her earnings she was able to pay off her first loan and return with her head high to the COMIXMUL cooperative to request a second loan.  She will use it to prepare a new plot of land and will buy the necessary supplies to protect and develop a new crop.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies for her potato crop.

loans.name: Juan Melquicedec

texts.es: Juan de 36 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres. Juan trabaja como mecánico  desde hace 16 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Juan solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de dos puestas y tres ventanas para la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma ya que pronto se casará y desea tener lista la vivienda.
texts.en: Juan, 36, is single and lives in his own home with his parents.  He has been working as a mechanic for 16 years, earning a living and maintaining his household this way.  Juan is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy two doors and three windows for the house.  He also wants to put down a cement floor, which he will do himself, because he is getting married soon and wants to have the house ready.

loans.use: To buy two doors, three windows, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.name: Maria Fredesvinda

texts.es: María de de 63 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad. María es una mujer trabajadora quien se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas como: limones, guineos, marañones, arrayán, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene a su familia. Ella desea reparar su  cocina dado que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y es necesario hacer cambio del material. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera, ladrillo, cemento y arena.
texts.en: María is 63 years old and lives in the house that she owns with her children, who are all now adults. María is a hard-working woman who makes a living selling a variety of fruits such as a lemons, bananas, cashews, myrtles and more. With this work, María earns a living and can support her family. María wants to repair her kitchen as, over time, it has deteriorated and she needs to replace some of the material. To do this, María is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy metal laminate sheeting, wood, bricks, cement and sand.

loans.use: to buy metal laminate sheeting, wood, bricks, cement and sand in order repair her kitchen.

loans.name: Raul Humberto

texts.es: Raul tiene 59 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Raul se gana la vida mediante la comercialización de mariscos los cuales vende en el mercado central de su localidad. Raul solicita a FUSAI este crédito para construir una pila y para comenzar un pequeño cuarto dormitorio para lo cual requiere de materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Raul is 59 years old and lives in the house that he owns with his partner and children. Raul makes a living selling seafood at the local market. Raul is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to build a sink and to start building a small dormitory. To do this work he needs to buy materials such as bricks, cement, sand, iron and galvanised laminate sheeting.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron and galvanised laminate sheeting to build a sink and start building a bedroom.

loans.name: Santos Isabel

texts.es:
Santos Isabel es una mujer de 27 años de edad luchadora con un grado de escolaridad primaria completa gracias al apoyo financiero de sus padres tanto moral como económico. Su estado civil es en unión libre trabajan juntos en la agricultura la siembra y cultivo de hortaliza (papa) ya que es el rubro que fortalece la economía en su hogar. Su familia está compuesta por 5 personas incluyéndola ya que es madre de 3 hijos quienes son menores de edad y están en la primaria en una escuela de la comunidad. Junto a su compañero de hogar se han podido superar gracias a la dedicación en la actividad del cultivo de hortaliza. Ella tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad ya que aprendió hace más de 10 años dicha experiencia la adquirió desde su juventud inculcada por sus padres y en la actualidad con su pareja. Su producto es comercializado a través de intermediarios que llegan a la zona teniendo una gran reputación por su calidad, higiene y forma de trabajar; pero como toda siembra y cultivo no deja de tener riesgo siendo estos las plagas y la variación de precios en el mercado actualmente solicita ayuda para poder invertir en la misma comprando semilla certificada ya que es más segura higiénica y limpia e insumos agrícolas ya que por medio de esto ella podrá aumentar sus cultivos y obtener una mejor ganancia del mismo.
Su sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda, re invertir en sus cultivos de papa y poder brindar una variedad a sus clientes para su compra/venta; pero la prioridad de ella es ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales teniendo una mejor educación y a sí mismo un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Santos Isabel is 27 years old and is a plucky woman. She completed primary school, thanks to the financial and moral support that she received from her parents. Santos has a partner and they work together in farming, sowing and growing vegetables (potatoes). With this work, the are able to strengthen their household economy. Santos' family has a total of five members - including her - as she is the mother of three children, all of whom are attending a local primary school. Alongside her partner, Santos has been able to prosper thanks to her work growing vegetables. Santos has a lot of experience in the work as she has been learning it for over ten years. She gained experience from an early age, taught by her parents and now by her partner. Santos and her partner - who have a reputation for producing good, clean products and for their working style - sell the product to intermediaries who come to the area. There are always, however, risks with growing crops, such as a plagues and fluctuations in the market prices. Santos is currently applying for a loan to invest in her crops; she will by certified potato seeds - as they are the safest, most hygienic and cleanest - and farming supplies. With these products, she will be able to increase her crop yield and earn a higher profit.

Santos' dream is to be able to improve her home, to reïnvest in her potato crop and offer her customers a variety of products to buy and sell. Nevertheless, Santos' priority is to see her children earn a profession through a better education and to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and certified potato seeds to grow.

loans.name: Oscar Alfonso

texts.es: Oscar de 46 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su y sus dos hijos de 20 y 18 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Oscar es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Oscar solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la terminación de las paredes de su vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar. Con el crédito solicitado comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y pagará mano de obra.
texts.en:
Oscar is 46 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their two children (aged 20 and 18 years old each). Both the children are in education. 

Oscar is very hard-working and is doing everything possible to give his family better living conditions. He is applying for this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in finishing the walls of his house. For financial reasons, Oscar has previously been unable to finish building them. With this loan, Oscar will buy bricks, cement, sand and iron and pay labourers.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron and to pay labourers to finish building the walls on his house.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora es una mujer muy trabajadora quien a sus 63 años se dedica a la venta de pollo. El negocio lo tiene desde hace 10 años el cual ha sido y sigue siendo muy importante ya que con lo que ella y su esposo perciben logran llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de su familia. Teodora solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para repellar las paredes de la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en: Teodora is 63 years old and is very hard-working. She makes a living selling chicken, a business which she has had for ten years. The business has been and continues to be very important for her as, with it, she and her husband earn a living to support their household and family economy. Teodora is applying for this loan from FUSAI so as to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to plaster the walls and cement the floor of her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to plaster the walls and cement the floor of her house.

loans.name: Jose Vicente

texts.es: jose de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 27, 26, 21 y 19 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, Jose es un hombre emprendedor y luchador. Hace 18 años se decidió en poner una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de estos años, Cuenta con mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos buscan, él solicita un prestamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose is 58 years old and lives in the house that he owns with his wife and their four children, who are aged 27, 26, 21 and 19 years old, respectively. All of the children are in education. Jose is enterprising and feisty. Eighteen years ago he started his own little shop and, with a lot of effort and dedication, he has managed to keep it going all these years. He has many customers who prefer Jose's shop because he always has the products that they are looking for. Jose is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in his shop and to stock it up with all sorts of products, such as rice, beans, sugar, coffee, milk, sweets, oil, paper, detergent, and more products that customers like. Jose  is confident that, with this loan, he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rice beans, sugar, milk, coffee, sweets, oil, paper and detergent.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana de 45 años de edad es madre soltera y aun tiene a su cargo un hijo menor de edad y viven en casa propia. Ana ha acomodado un pequeño negocio en su casa de habitación dedicándose a la elaboración de distintos platos de comida; siendo la predilecta para sus clientes la sopa de patas (plato típico del país con ingredientes de patas de vaca, verduras, y tripas). Ana ha visto un incremento del número de clientes y ya que necesita comprar más insumos para su negocio se ha dirigido a FUSAI para solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar más materia prima como; Chile verde, elotes, güisquil, Yuca, cebolla, plátano, pipian entre otros productos claves para una exquisita sopa de patas. Ana está muy confiada que podrá saldar la deuda que este crédito implica.
texts.en: Ana is 45 years old and a single mother. She is still responsible for her son, who is under 18. The two of them live together in a house that Ana owns. Ana also has a small business in her home, where she makes different dishes. To tempt her neighbours, Ana prepares "sopa de patas" (a typical Salvadoran soup made with cow's feet, tripe and vegetables). Ana has seen an increase in the number of customers and, as she needs to buy more supplies for her business, she has come to FUSAI to apply for a loan. This will allow her to buy basic ingredients, such as green chillis, corn on the cob, yucca, onions, plantains, chilli sauce and other key products necessary for making her delicious soup. Ana is very confident that she can pay off this loan.

loans.use: to buy more basic supplies such as green chillis, corn on the cob, yucca, onions, plantains, chilli sauce and other products for her food business.

loans.name: Marina De La Paz

texts.es: Doña Marina de 61 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos en casa del hijo mayor, ella se dedica a vender ropa y zapatos en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella desea acrecentar su negocio pero no tiene suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por eso solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar ropa por mayor para damas, caballeros y niños para tener mas clientela y asi pueda obtener mejores ingresos para tener lo necesario en su hogar sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: Marina is 61 years old and lives in her eldest son's house. Marina makes a living selling clothes and shoes at the market near to her home. She has many customers because of the quality of her products, and the good prices. Marina is able to cover some household costs with her profits. She wants to expand her business but she does not have enough capital to do so. As a result Marina is applying for a loan which will allow her to buy men's, women's and children's clothes in order to have more customers and to earn a higher income and have everything she needs at home.

loans.use: to buy men's, women's and children's clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Wiliam Ernesto

texts.es: Wiliam tiene 19 años de edad y reside junto a su grupo familiar. Él es un joven muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ayudar a su familia en la economía de su hogar. Él trabaja como ayudante de albañil desde hace mucho tiempo y así es como ayuda a su madre con los gastos diarios. Wiliam solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro.
texts.en: Wiliam is 19 years old and lives with his family. He is a very hard-working young man and is doing everything that he can in order to support his family with the household economy. Wiliam has been working as a builder's assistant for a long time now and, with this work, he helps his mother with daily costs. Wiliam is applying to FUSAI for this loan in order to build a bedroom in his home. To do this, he needs to buy materials, such as bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cements, sand, gravel and iron in order to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Atilio

texts.es:
Atilio tiene un taller donde trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día, es una persona muy luchadora, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo invirtió en la compra de repuestos para su taller para poder seguir con su trabajo.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo nuevamente en la compra de repuestos para su taller. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo de poder seguir trabajando y mejorando su vida.
texts.en:
Atilio has a workshop where he works every day from early in the morning. Atilio is a very feisty person and he tells us that he invested his previous loan in buying spare parts for his workshop, so that he could continue working.

Atilio is applying for this new loan in order to invest in spare parts for his workshop. Atilio is grateful for this opportunity that will allow him to continue working and improve his life.

loans.use: to buy vehicle spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Arrouyo Verde Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Arroyo verde está en su ciclo número 11 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al trabajo y el esfuerzo de todas están mejorando sus vidas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ingrid, quien vende cosméticos, también se destaca el gran entusiasmo que ella pone por mejorar y dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan y poder ir mejorando su situación de pobreza.
La Sra. Ingrid solicita de este crédito para la compra de cosméticos variados, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con sus ventas, y luchando por poder mejorar su situación de pobreza.
texts.en:
This is the "Arroyo" group, which is on its 11th loan cycle as part of the women's committee programme. Here everybody is working and helping each other to prosper. The group members are undergoing the poverty elimination survey and, thanks to their work and their efforts, each member is improving their life.

One member of the group is Ingrid, who sells cosmetics. She is very enthusiastic about improving her life and giving her family everything that they need and about improving her poor financial situation.

Ingrid is applying for this loan in order to buy a variety of cosmetics so that she can continue with her sales and continue to improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Tekojoja Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Tekojoja está en su ciclo número dos del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante.  Este comité es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo y las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas no solo en lo económico sino también como personas.
Olga es la presidenta de este grupo, comenta que siempre ayuda a sus amigas y las insta a poder seguir trabajando y luchando. Ella por su parte se dedica a la venta de prendas variadas, a la vez que es maestra de forma particular de algunas materias. Es una persona muy empeñada en crecer y mejorar.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere agrandar su stock de prendas, y de esa forma seguir con sus ventas y ofrecer buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The "Tekojoja" group is on it second loan cycle as part of the the women's committee programme, where everybody is working and helping each other to get ahead. This group is from the city of San Lorenzo and the members' main objective is their own personal growth. They do not want to grow just in financial terms, however - they also want to grow as people.

Olga is the president of this group. She tells us that she is always helping her friends and urging them to keep on working and fighting. Olga herself makes a living selling various clothing items. She also works as a private tutor for children. Olga has pledged to grow and improve.

She is applying for this loan in order to increase her stock and, with it, continue with her sales and offer good quality products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy items of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
Las 26 integrantes de este comité cuentan con actividades variadas, cada una de ellas pone su mayor esfuerzo y está muy entusiasmada de poder capacitarse, y de esa forma poder aplicar todo eso a los emprendimientos que cada una tiene.
Angela es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella es una persona que se destaca por su entusiasmo y por las ganas que tiene de poder salir adelante para ayudar a su familia. Se dedica a la olería, donde tiene su fábrica de ladrillos y así está saliendo adelante. Su sueño es poder seguir trabajando y también el día de mañana poder dar fuente de trabajo a otras personas que al igual que ella quieren poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de ladrillos, que le permitirá poder seguir con la elaboración de sus ladrillos y a la vez que sigue trabajando por su familia.
texts.en:
The 26 members of this communal bank have a variety of businesses. Each one of them puts forth her best effort and is very enthusiastic about being able to receive training and in this way to be able to apply all this to the business undertakings that each one has.

Angela is one of the members of this group. She is a person who stands out for her enthusiasm and for the will that she has to be able to advance in order to help her family. She works in brick-making and has her own brick factory and thus is moving forward. Her dream is to be able to continue working and also in the future to be able to give work to other people who, like herself, want to be able to grow.

She is asking for this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of clay, which will allow her to continue making her bricks and at the same time continue working for her family.

loans.use: to buy clay to make bricks

loans.name: Chai's Group

texts.en:
Chai is aged 31 years old and married. She is a mother of three children. She lives in a rural area of the Tbaung Khmum district. To make a living, she and her husband have been working as a paid worker for a rubber factory. Together, they can earn about 30,000 KHR per day. 
Chai’s group consists of three members who live in the same area. She is in her fourth cycle with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Chai, who is the leader, will user her portion to buy household supplies and use a portion of it to spend on a decent motorbike. She hopes this loan will enable her to have enough household supplies and also have a proper motorbike for her family to use.

loans.use: to buy household supplies and a motorbike

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Mut

texts.en:
Mut, 30, lives in a rural area of the Srey Sonthor district of Kampong Cham province. She is married with two children. The main source of the family’s income is from rice farming. To earn more income, her husband also sells grocery items. The current business earns her about US $13 per day to meet the family’s needs 

Mut has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back the loan, which has helped her relieve her family's burden and improve their  livelihood. Now she is asking for a new loan to pay for her youngest brother’s tuition fees to study English Literature. She hopes that this loan will keep her youngest brother in the university.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s tuition fees

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Srey Santhor District

loans.name: Karima

texts.ru:
Карима 37-летняя продавщица. Она замужем и живет с мужем и тремя сыновьями в городе Исфара. Ее сыновьям по 4, 7 и 8 лет. Старшие сыновья уже ходят в школу. Муж Каримы в сёлах и районах оказывает услуги мастера по стройке и ремонту домов. Сама Карима занимается торговлей. Она оптом закупает сухую молочную продукцию (курут) и перепродает с наценкой. В Таджикистане есть такой продукт, который называется "курут". Это маленькие и белые шарики, которые вы видите на фотографии. Курут изготовляется путём вывода влаги из сгущённой молочной массы "катыка". Для этого мешочек с катыком подвешивается в тени и влага стекает через ткань в течение нескольких дней. Образовывается густая питательная масса. В него добавляют соль, и потом из него руками катают шарики, диаметром 1—5 см. Эти шарики высушиваются на солнце в течение нескольких дней, иногда доводятся до твердокаменного состояния. Они употребляются как сухарики или размачиваются и употребляются как суп.  
Карима занимается купле-продажей курута в течение 4 лет. Для продолжения торговой деятельности она нуждается в кредите. На сумму кредита Карима хочет закупить партию курута с целью перепродажи. В будущем она планирует расширить свою торговую деятельность.
texts.en:
Karima is a 37 years old saleswoman. She is married and lives with her husband and three sons in the city of Isfara. Her sons are 4, 7 and 8 years old. The eldest sons already go to school. Karima's husband provides a service of constructing and refurbishing houses in the villages and districts.

Karima works with retail. She purchases dairy products and resells them at a higher price. She has worked with this activity for a period of four years. Karima needs a loan to continue her retail business. For the loan amount, she would like to purchase dairy products for resale. She plans to expand her retail business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase and resell kurut (dried dairy product)

loans.name: Chea

texts.en: Chea is a mother of three children, 42 years old, and a borrower from the Prey Chhor district in the Kampong Cham province. To provide for her family, she has been in rice and cassava farming, and worked as a paid worker for 17 years. She is a past client with Vision Fund (Kiva’s partner) and this is the second cycle for her with Vision Fund; the first time helped her to support the family on time. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes that her cassava will grow on time and provide her a good income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Swapna

texts.en:
Swapna is a rural hardworking woman who stays with her husband and three children in a small house in Dhupguri. Sudipta is the elder daughter of Swapna. Recently, she was promoted to class XI (grade 11) under the West Bengal Board of Higher Secondary Education. 

Swapna and her husband, Harekrishna, face a lot of financial difficulties to bear the educational costs of their children. They generate a small income from their small firewood business.

Swapna’s son, Sudipta, plans to complete his higher secondary examination (grade 12) in December 2015 with good marks, and take admission to a good college. Due to the lack of family income, Swapna could not afford the proper tuition and to buy books. So, she decided to take an educational loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS, to purchase her son’s textbooks, notebooks, test papers, etc., and to pay the tuition fees for his uninterrupted education. 
 
With this loan amount, her son can buy books and hopes to understand his subjects better. Swapna is now quite confident with her son’s education, and Sudipto is also very happy after getting the loan for his studies. 

Swapna, along with her son Sudipta (shown in the picture), are highly grateful to BJS and Kiva for the financial support.

loans.use: to meet the costs of her son's education.

loans.name: Atef

texts.en:
Atef is 32 years old. He lives in Gaza with his wife and two children. He sells various kinds of foodstuffs, such as cookies, candies, soft drinks, juices, macaroni and many other items, in his grocery store. He opened it three years ago.

Atef is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a display refrigerator and shelves. This will allow him to be able to increase his stock. 

He is ready to work even harder, make sacrifices and push every once in a while to achieve his goal and become a successful entrepreneur. His dream is to expand his business, and he desires to use part of the profits on his children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a display refrigerator and shelves, which will allow him to be able to increase his stock.

loans.name: Sabita

texts.en:
Sabita and her husband both have completed their education up to primary level. Her husband, Kartick, aged 39 years, is engaged in cultivation. Their children are receiving education and read in grade 6 and grade 5.

Sabita could not complete her education due to poverty, but she is willing to provide her children a higher education and desires that her children do not face any obstacle in receiving education. Sabita’s husband has been associated with agricultural activities for many years, but his income is hardly enough to cover all the expenses, especially the educational expenses of their children.

Sabita’s son, Lakhsman, is in grade 6 now. He is a very meritorious and studious boy.  He wants to go for higher education in the future. But, because of the financial crisis, Sabita and her husband cannot provide his school fees, necessary articles and private tuition. 

Sabita learned about BJS and applied for a loan for her son's uninterrupted education. With the loan amount, she will pay the private tuition fees and school fees, and buy necessary articles like books, notebooks, pens, geometry box, etc. for educational purposes for her son.

Sabita and her family are very much grateful to Kiva and BJS for this loan.

loans.use: to pay the tuition fees and buy necessary articles for her son's education.

loans.name: Sabita

texts.en:
Sabita is a 39-year-old woman who lives with her husband and three children (two sons and one daughter).  She is married to Dinanath, who is engaged in a milk supply business. Sabita is uneducated and can only sign her name, while her husband attended school up to grade 6. They live in their own house in the small village of Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. All their children are getting an education. Sabita's husband supplies milk door to door in his neighborhood. His income is so scanty that it has become impossible for him to continue their children's education in addition to covering household expenses.

Sabita's son Nonigopal is a meritorious and sincere student. He is very serious with his studies as well as with his examinations.  He makes himself busy all day long, as he has no private tutor. He wants to become an engineer in the future.

Sabita has learned about BJS and has taken a loan from them for her son's smooth education. With the loan, she will pay the private tuition fees and school fees and buy necessary articles for his education so that her son can proceed towards achieving his goal.

Sabita and her son are very much thankful to BJS as well as Kiva for their support because Nonigopal is going ahead to higher classes without any monetary hindrance.

loans.use: To pay school tuition fees, private tuition fees and other educational expenses

loans.name: Tanuka

texts.en:
Tanuka is a 40-year-old housewife.  She is from the small village of Magurmari in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.  Her husband Dhirendranath is a cycle-van puller by profession. Both Tanuka and her husband are uneducated and can only sign their names. Tanuka's husband earns for the family by carrying goods and people in his van.  He is the only earning member of the family. They live in their own kachha house (bamboo, straw and mud made). They have only one son who is a student in grade 9.

Their son Toton is brilliant in his studies.  He is only 16 years old but really passionate about mathematics.  He hopes to go for higher studies in mathematics.  If he could have received private tuition, then he could have done much better in his final examination. Tanuka is very eager to give her son all kinds of support, but is unable to do so for the lack of money, so she is requesting an education loan for her son to buy education supplies like books, pens, pencils, notebooks etc. and to pay for her son's tuition fees, school fees etc.

Tanuka and her son (in the photo) are very happy and thankful to BJS and Kiva for this educational loan.

loans.use: To pay school fees, tuition fees and purchase educational supplies

loans.name: Arati

texts.en:
Arati is a 36-year-old housewife.  She is married to Jaykanti and they are raising one son together. They live in their own house in Maynaguri town in the district of Jalpaiguri. She and her husband both have completed their education up to class VIII (grade 8). Her son didn’t get the chance to receive an education due to their poverty.

Arati started her business of selling sarees (an Indian dress) a few years ago to generate some income for her family. She sells sarees mainly to her friends, neighbors, and acquaintances. Her saree business is not running properly as the prices of sarees are going up daily. She would like to get a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to buy a variety of sarees and expand her business to meet her customer's needs and to upgrade their financial condition. The profits generated will be used to build her savings to purchase a shop in the local market in order to expand her business. She is a lady with great enthusiasm and never wants to stop fighting for her business. 

She is very much grateful to BJS and Kiva for this loan.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of sarees (an Indian dress) to sell

loans.name: Endali

texts.en:
Endali is a 48-year-old housewife who lives with her husband and one son in Dhupguri. Both she and her husband are illiterate, but can sign their names.

By profession, her husband is a farmer. Due to their illiteracy, they are unable to engage themselves in any other work that can generate more income. They have their own land and experience in the agricultural field, so this is the reason for choosing this business.  

Endali wishes to cultivate broad beans on her own land to generate more income.  With this loan amount, she wants to buy bean seeds and fertilizers to grow a bean crop. Endali is confident that she will be able to grow her business.

They don’t have a concrete house, so in the future she wants to build a concrete house with the profit she earns from her business. She is a lady with great enthusiasm, and she has started dreaming of purchasing a tractor for fresh and good cultivation in the future.

Endali is very much grateful to Kiva and BJS for this loan.

loans.use: to buy broad bean seeds and fertilizers to cultivate broad beans.

loans.name: Fani

texts.en:
Fani is a very courageous 46-year-old woman with many hopes. She is a housewife of Dhupguri town and the mother of a son who keeps himself busy in farming along with his father. She and her husband are both illiterate, but know how to sign their names.

Fani’s husband is a farmer. He has an agricultural business. They have land where her husband cultivates different seasonal vegetables and sells them to the market. Fani also assists her husband in this work. 

Now they want to cultivate broad beans on this land, as per the demand of their local market and because it is the best season to cultivate broad beans. She is requesting this loan to buy broad bean seeds, fertilizers and pesticides to cultivate broad beans, avoiding contamination of insects and diseases.

She hopes broad bean cultivation will give her extensive financial support in the near future and will produce a more helpful environment, which is lacking in her family.

Now Fani is very happy about getting the loan and gives her heartiest thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for broad beans cultivation.

loans.name: Ntagoheka Group

texts.fr:
Sylvie fait partie du groupe  Ntagoheka  et habite à  Gitega. Elle  a 38 ans et est mariée  à Gabriel, un  commerçant. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 6 à 20 ans. 

Elle fait le commerce de bananes depuis 1 an.

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter   beaucoup de  bananes   à  revendre  pour gagner  plus.

loans.use: elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter   beaucoup de  bananes   à  revendre  pour gagner  plus.

loans.name: Ajima

texts.en:
Ajima is a 33-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband, Tajamol, and three children at Khagrabari in the small town of Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. Ajima is a housewife, and she received education up to class VI (grade 6). Her husband studied up to class V (Grade 5). Their children are receiving education and facing many difficulties in their own one-room, kaccha house (made of straw and mud).

Her husband is a cycle-van puller. He works hard, and carries goods from one place to another with the help of his cycle-van. He sometimes rents the van for transportation, but he has to face tough competition from the other van pullers, and he does not get enough profit to cope with the financial stringency to run his family well. 

Ajima wants to start a dairy products business to give financial support to her husband and family. Ajima heard that Kiva’s partner, BJS, offers loans to women in the community to start businesses, so she applied for a loan to help her husband to buy a cow. She plans to supply milk, as well as dairy products, in the locality. There is a good demand for milk and dairy products in their locality.

Ajima hopes that the profit she will get from the business will give good support to upgrade their financial condition and to give her children a better education. Her dream is to make a pacca (brick-built) house instead of living in a kaccha house.

She gives hearty thanks to the lenders of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and start a dairy products business.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es:
Reina es casada y tiene dos hijos, vive en casa de sus padres la misma se encuentra ubicada en la zona de San José de Yunguyo de la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundaria; se dedica a venta de CDS en una de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto. Su esposo es albañil y trabaja en diferentes obras en la ciudad de El Alto.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construccion (cemento, estuco,arena, fierros y otros)para la construccion de una cocina pequeña en la casa donde vive. Así tendrá mayor comodidad. 
El sueño de Reina es tener una tienda de CDS y a si ofrecer comodidad a toda su familia  y mejor calidad de vida.
Es la primera  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Reina is married and has two children. She lives with her parents in the San José de Yunguyo area of the city of El Alto. She only studied up to high school. She sells CDs at a local fair. Her husband is a mason, and he works on different jobs in city of the El Alto. She is requesting this loan to buy construction materials to build a small kitchen, such as cement, plaster, sand, iron, and other items. In this manner, she will be more comfortable. Reina's dream is to own a CD store, and so provide with her family with comfort and a better quality of life. This is the first time that she is applying for a loan together with IMPRO and also with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a kitchen, such as cement, plaster, sand, and iron.

loans.name: Maira Claribel

texts.es: Maira de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 6 años de edad. Maira se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como yuca frita, enchiladas, pasteles de carne, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Maira desea construir un baño y cambiar el techo de la vivienda ya que esta deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y ladrillo y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Maira, who is 23 years old, lives in her own house along with her little son, who is 6 years old. Maira's work is selling typical foods such as fried yucca, enchiladas, meat pastries, etc. In this way she earns a living and brings sustenance to her household. Maira wants to construct a bathroom and change the roof of her house, since it is deteriorated. To do this, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets, wood, cement, sand, and bricks and thus begin the construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy sheets of galvanized metal, wood, cement, sand, and bricks to construct a bathroom and to repair the roof of her home

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es: María de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y  sus hijos de 16 años, 13 años y 8 años de edad. María se dedica a la crianza de pollo, venta de pollos y tamales. Las ventas las realiza d forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. María desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena,grava, teja y varilla para encementar el piso de la vivienda y para reparar el techo de la misma.
texts.en: Maria, who is 53 years old, lives in her own house along with her husband and their children, ages 16, 13, and 8. Maria raises chickens and sells chickens and tamales. She makes her sales as a street vendor in the different zones of her district. Maria wants to improve their living conditions, and so she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, tiles, and rods to cement the floor of her home and repair the roof.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, tiles, and rods to cement the floor of her house and to repair the roof.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier vive en compañia de sus 2 hijos y su esposa  en la zona de Miraflores de la ciudad de La Paz. Es dentista; por algun motivo le fue mal y perdio todo su instrumental medico. Actualmente ejerce su profesion en su propio domicilio con la visita de algunos de sus clientes. Javier necesita el crédito para poder Comprar material dental  y asi poder tener un mayor ingreso y mas adelante constituir su propio consultorio privado,

El sueño de Javier es llegar a tener su propio consultorio medico dental, ejercer su profesion con la comodidad que se requiere y dar una casita a su familia.
texts.en:
Javier lives in company of his wife and two children in the Miraflores neighborhood of the city of La Paz. He is a dentist. For some reason he had bad luck and lost all his medical instruments. Currently he exercises his profession in his own home with some of his clients visiting him. 

Javier needs the loan to buy dental materials  in order to make more income. Later on he'll open his private dental office. His dream is to get to have his own dental office, exercise his profession with the comforts it requires and provide his family with a small house.

loans.use: to buy dental equipment.

loans.name: Ana Alicia

texts.es: Ana de 45 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus hijo y sus padres. Ella se dedica a la venta de chocolate artesanal y a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace tres años. Ana desea construir una pila para almacenar el agua ya que actualmente utiliza barriles los cuales se encuentran picados y el agua se filtra. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena.
texts.en: Ana, who is 45 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house along with her son and her parents. For three years she has been selling artisanal chocolate and providing domestic services. Ana wants to construct a water trough to store water, since she now uses barrels, which are rotting and the water leaks out. To do this, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, and sand.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand to construct a water trough.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es: Cristino de 55 años de edad es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la agricultura y presta sus servicios en una institución pública de su localidad. Cristino habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 17 años, 10 años y 8 años de edad. Cristino solicita este crédito a FUSAI para construir una pila para almacenar el agua ya que actualmente almacena el agua en barriles los cuales se encuentran dañados y desperdicia mucha agua. Con el Crédito comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava para la construcción de la pila.
texts.en: Cristino, who is 55 years old, is a hard-working man who works in agriculture and also in a public institution in his district. Cristino lives in his own house along with his wife and their three children, ages 17, 10, and 8. Cristino is applying to FUSAI for this loan to construct a trough to store water, since now he stores water in barrels that are damaged and lose a lot of water. With the loan, he will buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to construct the trough.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to construct a water trough

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Ángel tiene 68 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de un año de edad. Ángel trabaja como auxiliar de albañil desde hace 10 años lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Desea reparar el techo de la casa ya que se encuentra dañado a causa del sol y las lluvias. Ángel solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: lámina galvanizada y madera para hacer el cambio respectivo de la cubierta del techo.
texts.en: Ángel is 68 years old. He lives in his own house along with his life companion and their little daughter who is one year old. Ángel has worked as a bricklayer's assistant for 10 years, and this allows him to bring sustenance to his household. He wants to repair the roof of his house, since it has been damaged by sun and rain. Ángel is applying to FUSAI for this loan to buy the necessary materials, such as sheets of galvanized metal and wood, to make these changes in the roof covering.

loans.use: to buy sheets of galvanized metal and wood to make changes in the roof covering of his home

loans.name: Silvia Janet

texts.es: Silvia de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella  trabaja como costurera, se encarga de confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad de muchos clientes amigos y vecinos. Silvia  elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas de vestir para vender en su casa de habitación, con lo que puede obtener ganancias extras. Silvia  solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa con lo que pueda realizar más trabajos y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Silvia, who is 47 years old, lives in her own house with her family. She works as a seamstress and makes formal clothing, uniforms, and casual clothing. She is someone who is very detail-oriented, and she produces very good work, which allows her to have the loyalty of many customers, friends and neighbors. Silvia does work on order and she also makes articles of clothing to sell in her home, with which she can obtain extra income. Silvia is applying for a loan with the goal of being able to buy fabrics in different colors and patterns, as well as thread, needles, and everything necessary to make clothing; she will use these items to complete more work and thus obtain better earnings to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, needles, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Sandra Dinora
