Este grupo se llama Mujeres Trabajadoras, y lleva ese nombre, ya que eso es lo que son todas las integrantes, mujeres trabajadoras que quieren ayudar a sus familias. Ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, el cual les permitirá conocer la situación en la que cada una está y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
La Sra. Maria es presidenta del grupo, es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, ella en su última encuesta de eliminación de pobreza estuvo en el nivel uno, lo cual quiere decir que tiene ingresos muy bajos, pero ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Comenta que entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta con Venta de Sabanas, también se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder superar la pobreza.
La Sra. Maria pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de sabanas, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y luchando por mejorar y así por medio de ese trabajo seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called Mujeres Trabajadoras, and bears that name because that is what all the members are: hard-working women who want to help their families. They are part of a poverty elimination program which will allow them to find out the situation each one is in, and be able to work according to this.  

Maria is chair of the group and is a very hard-working and enterprising woman.  In her last poverty elimination survey she was at level one, which is to say she has very low income. But through her effort and constant work, and by applying the life behaviors of a successful woman, she finds herself improving her poverty situation. 

She says that one of the jobs she has is selling sheets. The work of the advisers must also be highlighted. They do on-going training and verification follow-up that somehow requires and at the same time encourages the women to overcome poverty. 

Maria is asking for this loan in order to buy sheets, so that she will be able to continue working and striving to improve, and continue helping her family by means of that work.

loans.use: To buy sheets to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres en Accion está en el 2º ciclo  del programa de Comité, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Las integrantes realizan actividades productivas y las que aún no tienen, están en proyecto de emprender para poder ir aumentando sus ingresos. 
Una de las integrantes la Sra. Mercedes, quien es modista y posee un pequeño taller de costura en su casa, ella pidió el crédito para la compra de insumos y materiales para su trabajo, como ser telas e hilos, botones y cierres. Se debe destacar el gran empeño que esta señora pone en su trabajo y con lo cual está ayudando a su familia, dándoles todo lo que necesitan y que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de necesidades.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres en Accion" group is in the second loan cycle of the communal bank program, where everyone works and helps one another to succeed. The members are carrying out productive activities, and those that don't yet are planning to undertake them, so that they can gradually increase their incomes. 

One of the members is Mercedes, who is a seamstress and has a small sewing workshop in her home. She has asked for the loan for the purchase of supplies and materials for her work, such as fabric and thread, buttons and zippers. The great effort that this woman puts into her work must be emphasized. With it she is helping her family by giving them everything they need, so that they do not have to experience privation of any kind.

loans.use: To buy fabric and thread, buttons and zippers.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Esperanza se formó con la unión de amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, son mujeres jefas de familia, que quieren dar a sus hijos todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Nelly es una persona por demás sacrificada, que trabaja como funcionaria de la salud, además se dedica a la venta de joyas variadas, y es por medio de sus trabajos que está saliendo adelante. Comenta que todo esfuerzo que haya, lo hace con mucho cariño para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas variadas, y de esa forma poder venderlos y seguir ayudando a sus seres queridos. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The La Esperanza group was formed by the coming together of friends and neighbors in the city of San Lorenzo. They are women who are heads of households and want to give their children everything they were not able to have.

Nelly is an extremely self-sacrificing person who works as a health official. In addition, she sells a variety of jewelry and it is through her jobs that she is succeeding in life. She says that every effort she makes she does with a great deal of love, in order to help her loved ones.

She is asking for this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of a variety of jewelry, so that she can sell it and continue helping her loved ones. She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her co-members are receiving.

loans.use: To buy a variety of jewelry to sell.

loans.name: 09.02.7 Phú Sơn 3 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thắng has a service business shipping goods. She is requesting a loan to buy means of shipping goods.

Thắng is 40 years old and she is married with two children. She is the group leader of the 09.02.7 Phú Sơn 3 solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with her two dependents

In 2012, Thắng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Thắng has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thắng has been involved in this business for five years and the main hardship she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thắng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to buy means of shipping goods

loans.name: 02.04.8Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Lương is applying for a loan to purchase fish to resell. She operates a business selling fish.

Lương is 45 years old and she is married with two children.

She is the leader of an eight-member group, the 02.04.08 Đông Hải solidarity group.

One of her children is grown up so Lương lives with one dependent in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Lương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lương has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Lương has been involved in this business for five years.

The main hardship that Lương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Lương hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Krat's Group

texts.en:
Living in a thatched roof house in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Krat is aged 59 years old and married. She and her husband have four children. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and working for others for a fee. With her current business, she is able to earn approximately 40,000 KHR per day to support her family.

This is the first loan for Krat with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to pay for harvesting fees. She hopes to have more crop yields and sell at a good price so as to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to pay for harvesting fees

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: Loreta is a 43-year-old married woman with eight children. She has a small plantation and grows cabbages, tomatoes, beans and cucumbers to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years.Loreta has requested a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, filings, bush knives and a rake. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012.  With her profits,Loreta hopes to improve her savings to support her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, filings, bush knives and a rake

loans.name: Temukisa

texts.en:
Temukisa is 42 years old, married, and has seven children. She makes and sells pastries and fried chicken with rice in her community, which she has been doing for many years.

Temukisa is requesting a loan from SPBD, which she will use to buy flour, sugar, dripping oil, baking soda, ripe bananas, rice, chicken, and gas. She plans to use her profits to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, dripping oil, baking soda, ripe bananas, rice, chicken, and gas

loans.name: Long's Group

texts.en:
Long is 32 years and single. He lives in a rural village of the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district earning a living through farming rice and also works as a worker to help earn income to support the family. He can earn about KHR 12,000 per day from the current business.
 
This is Long’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and he has been a member of VisionFund for two cycles. He successfully used the loans to better his living condition. Now he is leading his group to apply for a loan. Long will use his portion to harvest the paddy rice. He hopes to make more rice and sell it for a good price so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to harvesting the paddy rice.

loans.name: Saibaba Shg Group

texts.en:
Manorama is a 41-year-old lady and has two children. In the picture, the lady standing with a raised hand is Manorama. She lives in a small village of Chandikhole, Odisha, India with her husband, parents-in-law and her children. 

A few years back, she started a business of making and selling flour, such as wheat flour, maize flour, gram flour, lentil flour, rice flour, etc. She makes these flours with the help of grinders. She makes a variety of flours, depending on the demand for flour in the market. 

She is requesting a loan amount of 90,000 INR for her group. She will use her portion to buy more supplies, such as wheat, maize, grains, etc., and a new grinder machine. With this investment, she will expand her business so that she can generate more income and improve the quality of life for herself and her family. 

She is requesting within a group of nine members who all are women and all live in the same community. They named their group "Saibaba SHG" Self Help Group (named after lord Saibaba, who they believe will protect them).

Manorama hopes to construct a house for her family in the near future. She wants to say, "Thank you," to Kiva and its lenders across the world for their help and support.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies, such as wheat, maize, grains, etc., and a new grinder machine.

loans.name: Josie

texts.en: Josie grows hogs to sell as her business. Upon achieving the desired weight, she trades her hogs to butchers.This way, she earns PHP 3,000 per each hog. She has been in her business for a year now. Josie is 32 years old, married and had two children. She is now asking additional capital of PHP 6,000 to buy sacks of feed and medicines for the hogs' sustenance. She hopes to keep growing healthy hogs to generate more good income.

loans.use: to buy sacks of feed and medicines for her hog raising business

loans.name: Dalawusi

texts.en:
Dalawusi is 30-year-old married man with two children. He is a motocycle cyclist. He is also a farmer. He began this business to earn income to sustain his family. 

He will use the loan to purchase a new motorcycle.  

He hopes to put up his own home and establish himself. He faces the challenge of competition and poor roads. He is hard-working, honest, and resilient. 

In the photograph is the client(center), his wife, and the Ugafode credit officer at their land that was pledged as security.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a farmer living in Eldoret where he has been farming for 12 years. He is married and has 3 children, both of whom are of school going age. In his farm he produces and sells milk, vegetables, and maize, which he enjoys very much, but he experiences a challenge in the lack of adequate finances for carrying out his farming activities.

Joseph chose Juhudi Kilimo in order to access asset financing,and because they are interested with the welfare of small scale farmers. During the training he learnt a lot about group work and that unity is key for growth in business. With the loan,Moses will buy animal feed for his cattle. This will cause his income to increase due to increased production.

loans.use: construct a dairy unit.

loans.name: Jaria

texts.en:
Meet 45-year-old Jaria from Kandeh town, Southern area in Bo, Sierra Leone. She is married with four children. For the past 15 years, Jaria has established her retail business. She began her business because she wants to create a permanent source of income for her family. She works at the business from morning until night. She says that her business is doing well, because out of the profits she is able to take care of her family.

Jaria requires a loan in order to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and to increase her business. In the future, Jaria plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Haruna

texts.en:
Haruna has been living in Entebbe - Lunyo area for the past six years and has seen the price of charcoal double and firewood is sparingly used. Haruna is single and a motorcyclist by profession. He earns his income from this business and has been planning to marry. 
Haruna rarely cooks at home because of the time it takes to light up a charcoal stove. Haruna’s earnings does not support him to buy Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) and had not thought through this as an option. 

With KIVA loan, Haruna will make savings by acquiring a package of LPG. Now that Haruna has access to efficient heat, he will now eat from home rather than from restaurants. The savings will help Haruna to plan for his future.

loans.use: To pay for thermally efficient cooking energy from LPG, so that he can manage his savings for the prospective future.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a 26 year old lady, single and commenced her work as a sales representative. She works and lives in Nbulaagara – Kasubi. since graduating Catherine has been cooking on a paraffin stove. Catherine says that she does not like using charcoal because of the time it takes to prepare a meal. Because of the soot paraffin stove emits, Catherine has been contemplating in getting a liquefied petroleum stove, however the cost has been an issue.

Catherine is grateful that KIVA loan has been made available to her. She happy that she will now be cooking a balanced diet because she has a fuel which is available all the time.

loans.use: To pay for clean cooking gas so that she can switch from dirty fuels

loans.name: Hamuza

texts.en:
Hamuza is a 25 year old man, he is a freelancer marketer who lives in a single room with his partner. They both do not have a baby but they are looking forward to having one before end of the year. 
Hamuza says that due to the size of the room, they wouldnt wish to have a baby in a congested and full of dust. Hamuza and his wife are greatful that they have been given a chance to pay for cooking gas in installment because had it not been this arrangement they wouldnt have ever used cooking gas because in their area it is considered as an energy for the rich.

loans.use: To pay for clean cooking energy from Liquefied petroleum gas, to avoid dirty fuel when they have their child later in the year

loans.name: Danson

texts.en: Danson is a repeat client of Ugafode Microfinance who has previously applied for two loans of UGX.1,000,000. He runs a small retail shop in Mbarara town and has been doing this for more than five years. Edson is a hard working man who has managed to save money from his sales, which has enabled him to acquire a small piece of land in Mbarara town and in which he has constructed rentals. The purpose of the loan is to restock his business and renovate his rentals.

loans.use: To renovate his house and restock his business.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Doña Marcelina tiene una edad de 47 años, agricultora y ama de casa, casada y madre de 2 hijos quienes estudian y trabajan en el campo junto a sus padres ayudando a desarrollar actividades como: aplicación de abono, limpieza de maleza, fertilización, entre otros. Su grado de estudio es de primaria pero por la falta de apoyo económico por parte de sus padres ella no pudo completarlo cursando hasta el tercer pero se siente muy agradecida con sus padres por tal apoyo a pesar de las dificultades que en esa época se presentaron. Fueron ellos quienes le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra enseñándole las diferentes actividades y técnicas para cultivo de hortalizas siendo su experiencia de más de 20 años de práctica. El terreno que trabaja es una herencia por parte de sus padres el cual está ubicado a 5 minutos de distancia desde su casa de habitación al cual en familia se trasladan caminando. El desafío que encuentra con este tipo de cultivo son las plagas especialmente la aparatiosa que es una mosca que daña la hortaliza y se propaga a su vez.
Por lo que hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que dará asistencia y mantenimiento para evitar que dicha plaga mencionada anteriormente afecte su producto.
Sus planes a futuro comercializar su producto con instituciones que ayuden al desarrollo y mejora de su producto con nuevas ideas, nuevos métodos, etc. mejorando de esa manera sus ingresos para el bienestar de su familia y la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 47 years old, a farmer and a housewife. She is married and the mother of two children who go to school and work in the fields together with their parents, helping to do activities such as applying fertilizer, clearing weeds, fertilizing and other work.

She has a primary school education but because of the lack of financial support from her parent she wasn't able to complete it, and only went as far as the third grade. But she feels very grateful to her parents for their support, in spite of the difficulties that arose at that time. It was they who taught her to work the land, teaching her the various activities and techniques for growing vegetables, as they have more than 20 years of practical experience. 

The parcel of land she works is an inheritance from her parents and is located five minutes away from their home, so the family walks to it. The challenge she has with this type of agriculture is pests, especially the aparatiosa fly, which damages the vegetables and at the same time spreads. So today she has applied for a loan from the Comixmul  cooperative for the purchase of agricultural supplies with which she will look after and maintain her crop in order to avoid the above-mentioned past affecting it. 

Her plans for the future are to sell their crop through institutions that support the development and improvement of their crops with new ideas, new methods, etc., thereby improving their income for their family's well-being and the education of their children.

loans.use: For the purchase of agricultural supplies to maintain her vegetable crops.

loans.name: Felipe De Jesus

texts.es: Felipe de 54 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida con quien tienen tres hijos de 2, 6 y 9 años de edad. Felipe ha podido proveer a su familia de una vivienda digna, la que continua ampliando para que sus hijos se sientan bien dentro de ella. Él ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para continuar mejorando su vivienda con la pavimentación del área del corredor por lo que comprará cemento, arena, grava y regla pacha de pino para la elaboración del pavimento del corredor. Felipe, se compromete a solventar este crédito en el tiempo que el contrato así lo estipula para dejar las puertas siempre abiertas.
texts.en:
Felipe is 54 years old and lives with his life partner. They have three children, ages 2, 6 and 9.  Felipe has been able to provide his family with decent housing and he continues expanding the home so that his children feel comfortable in it.

He has requested a loan from FUSAI to continue improving his home by paving the passageway area. He will buy cement, sand, gravel for constructing the paved passageway, and pine struts as well. He promises to pay off this loan in the time stipulated in the contract, in order to leave the doors always open.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, and gravel for installing pavement in the passageway, as well as pine struts.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es: José de 24 años de edad vive con sus padres a quienes cuida con mucho esmero. José posee 2 manzanas de terreno con 450 arboles de naranjo manteniendo una producción constante por 6 meses al año, los otros 6 meses José trabaja como jornalero. Él a visto la necesidad de ampliar más el corredor de la vivienda de sus padres; techarla e instalar piso de ladrillo de cemento. Por lo que ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina  y madera para la estructura del techo, cemento, arena y grava para el encementado del corredor. José se compromete a solventar cada cuota que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
José is 24 years old and lives with his parents, whom he looks after with a great deal of care.  José has two manzanas of land (around 3.5 acres) with 450 orange trees, maintaining a constant production for six months of the year. The other six months José works as a day laborer. 

He has found it necessary to widen the passageway of his parents' home, put a roof on it and install a cement brick floor. So he has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy sheet metal and wood for the roof structure, and cement, sand and gravel for installing the cement floor of the passageway. 

José promises to make each payment that this loan entails.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal and wood for repairing the roof structure; cement, sand and gravel for paving the passageway.

loans.name: Dúo El Rosario De Buena Vista Group

texts.es: La encargada de este grupo es la señora Rosario quien se dedica a la fabricación y venta de zapatos para niños y adultos, y zapatillas para damas.  Cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo quien la ayuda los fines de semana a cortar, coser y pegar los zapatos. ella tiene varios pedidos pero le hace falta plantillas para la fabricación de los zapatos y debe compararlos, pero el dinero no le alcanza por eso necesita hacer un préstamo para comprar las plantillas que le hacen falta ya que no son muchas.  Su sueño es tener una gran fábrica de zapatos y darles trabajo a muchas personas que la necesiten, esperando que ustedes le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en: The Rosario Duo from Vista Hermosa:  Doña Ana has made a name for herself in her business because she offers her customers products such as clothing for ladies, men, and boys and girls.  From her home, she also sells basic necessities, gifts for all occasions, piñatas, cosmetics and perfume, and medicine.  Doña Ana needs money to invest and keep these various items that she sells in stock.  With her business, she helps take care of the expenses of her children.

loans.use: Comprar materiales para la elaboracion y venta de calzado.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Gustavo Alirio

texts.es: Gustavo de 31 años de edad está acompañado y tienen una niña de 2 años de edad. Gustavo es un agricultor que alquila 2.5 manzanas de terreno para sembrar maíz, frijol y algunas hortalizas, la mayor parte de lo que siembra lo vende y otra la deja para la alimentación de su familia. Gustavo desea realizar algunos reparaciones en su vivienda; en el área de la cocina el techo está deteriorado, el piso de cemento está agrietado el techo de su vivienda está muy deteriorado y el piso de cemento está agrietado. Gustavo solicitó un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina galvanizada, clavos, para reparar el techo y adquirir el cemento, arena, grava, regla riostra de pino para el encementado del área de cocina.

loans.use: Comprar lámina galvanizada, clavos, para reparar el techo y adquirida el cemento, arena, grava, regla riostra de pino para el encementado del área de cocina.

loans.name: Geronimo

texts.es: Gerónimo de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su hija de 12 años y su compañera de vida. Gerónimo es un hombre muy trabajador y desde hace 14 años aprendió el oficio de Albañilería por lo que en su municipio y lugares aledaños es ampliamente conocido y recomendado para trabajar en la construcción de diversas obras civiles. Gerónimo desea ampliar su humilde vivienda y construir con lámina y madera una nueva habitación y además encementar el piso de su vivienda. Gerónimo no posee el total del capital para la obra, por tal razón a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar madera, clavos, lámina galvanizada, arena, grava, cemento para la construcción de la habitación y encementar el piso.
texts.en:
Gerónimo is 50 years old and lives in his own home with his 12-year-old daughter and his life partner. Geronimo is a very hard-working man and 14 years ago learned the construction trade for which he is widely known in his municipality and surrounding areas. He is recommended for working on various civil construction projects. 

Geronimo wishes to enlarge his modest home and construct a new room with sheet metal and wood. In addition, he will install a cement floor in his home. Geronimo does not have all of the capital for the work and for this reason has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy wood, nails, galvanized sheet metal, sand, gravel, and cement for building the room and installing the cement floor.

loans.use: To buy wood, nails, sheet metal roofing, sand, gravel and cement for building a room and installing a cement floor.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: María de 37 años de edad está casada y tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. María junto a su esposo hace 18 años lograron adquirir un terreno y construir una pequeña vivienda. Hoy su vivienda necesita algunas reparaciones en el piso y en las paredes, que actualmente son de lámina galvanizada. María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para realizar las obras de instalación de ladrillo de cemento en todo el piso de su vivienda, sustituir algunas estructura de madera y las láminas de las paredes que están deterioradas. El dinero del crédito lo invertirá para pagar la mano de obra, comprará cemento, ladrillo de cemento para piso, arena, lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera.
texts.en:
María is 37 years old, married, and has three school-aged children. 18 years ago, Maria and her husband managed to acquire a parcel of land and build a small house. Now her home needs some repairs to the floor and to the walls, which currently are of galvanized sheet metal. 

Maria has requested a loan from FUSAI to undertake the work of installing cement bricks throughout the floor of her home and replace some structural wood and the sheet metal of the walls, both of which are in poor condition. She will use the loan money to pay for labor, and will buy cement, cement brick for the floor, sand, galvanized sheet metal, nails and wood.

loans.use: To buy cement brick, sand, cement, galvanized sheet metal, nails and wood, in order to repair the floor and replace some structural wood and sheet metal walls that are in poor condition.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 5 hijos a su cargo y reside en una aldea del municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Trabajo varios años en una empresa prestando servicios varios, y hace 4 años se ha dedicado a elaborar pan para vender y al cultivo de maíz y frijol. de estas actividades ella logra cubrir las necesidades básicas de sus hijos. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 5,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos como abonos para el cultivo,  herramientas para la siembra de maíz y frijoles. y materiales como harina, leche huevo manteca para elaborar pan y vender. El propósito de su crédito es aumentar la producción de maíz y frijol para obtener mas ingresos, ya que quiere mejorar su vivienda y dar buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old and is a single mother. She has five children in her care and lives in a village in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes. She worked for several years in a company providing various services, and for four years has been making bread to sell and growing corn and beans. With these activities she manages to cover the basic needs of her children. 

She is requesting a loan of 5,000 lempiras to buy supplies such as crop fertilizers, tools for growing corn and beans, and ingredients such as flour, milk, eggs and lard for making bread to sell. 

The purpose of her loan is to increase corn and bean production, in order to obtain more income, as she wants to improve her home and provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies such as crop fertilizers, tools for growing corn and beans, and ingredients such as flour, milk, eggs and lard for making bread to sell.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es:
Asunta vive en la ciudad de Camaná, trababa como obrera en un fundo agrícola, con lo puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante ya que es madre de familia y sus hijos son lo mas importante para ella.

Asunta esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora ya que actualmente no cuenta con ella y no tiene donde conservar sus alimentos, así podrá ir mejorando su calidad de vida y seguir en busca de hacer realidad su sueño: “Darle un futuro mejor a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Asunta lives in the city of Camaná and works as a laborer on a farm. This enables her to earn income to keep going, as she is a parent and her children are the most important thing for her.

Asunta is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help she will be able to buy a refrigerator, as currently she does not have one and has nowhere to conserve her food. In this way she will be able to gradually improve her quality of life, and continue seeking to make her greatest dream a reality: "to provide a better future for my children."

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Johnny Antonio

texts.es:
Johnny vive en la ciudad de Ica, día a día trabaja como chofer de taxi ya que con este humilde trabajo puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Johnny está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su hermana, ya que debido a algunos problemas económicos no cuenta con este artefacto y no tiene donde conservar sus alimentos, asi podra mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su sueño:”  Comprarse un auto”.
texts.en:
Johnny lives in the city of Ica and works daily as a taxi driver, as this modest work enables him to have the income to support himself. 

Johnny is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their support he will be able to buy a refrigerator for his sister, as due to some financial problems she doesn't have this appliance and has nowhere to conserve food. This way he will be able to improve his sister's quality of life and continue striving to make his dream a reality: "To buy myself a car."

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gregoria es una joven de 28 años de edad, en un estado civil en unión libre, madre de 2 hijos quienes asisten a la primaria en la escuela de la comunidad. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completo gracias al apoyo financiero y moral de sus padres pero divido a la mala situación financiera en su familia ella no pudo continuar estudiando ya que desciende de una familia humildemente económica. Gregoria se dedica a la caficultura ya que por 10 años ha dedicado a su propiedad esfuerzo y sacrificio para lograr obtener ingresos para su familia y su hogar siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad. Su esposo es apoyo en los  diferentes trabajos que en el campo se desarrollan ya que hay ciertas actividades que requieren de un mayor esfuerzo físico y dividiéndose estas para trabajar como equipo. Uno de sus mayores problemas es la falta de carretera para acceder hasta su propiedad por lo que tiene que caminar aproximadamente una hora desde su casa de habitación y por consiguiente el traslado de los insumos que necesita para poder dar asistencia a sus cultivos de café.
Por lo que ella actualmente solicita financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas con los que dará asistencia técnica a sus cultivos y pagar acarreo de la misma por medio de vestías o un vehículo apto para la carretera hasta su tierra cultivada de café. 
Sus planes a futuro dar a sus hijos la prioridad y la oportunidad para que ellos puedan estudiar y puedan prepararse académicamente ya que de esa manera ellos evitaran tener problemas al momento de integrarse a la sociedad y encontrar trabajos dignos y bien remunerados.
texts.en:
Gregoria is a 28 year old woman. She is in a common law marriage and the mother of 2 children who are in the community elementary school. She finished one grade of primary school thanks to the financial and moral support of her parents. However, due to the poor financial situation in her family she was unable to keep going to school, because she is from a very humble and poor family. Gregoria has grown coffee for 10 years. She has put her own hard work and sacrifice into it to be able to obtain income for her family and her home. It was her her parents who taught her to work the earth since she was very young. Her husband helps with the different jobs done in the field, since certain activities require more physical strength and they divide the work to function as a team. One of her biggest problems is the lack of a road to access her property. She has to walk approximately an hour from her house and  then transport the materials she needs to help her coffee crops.

That is why right now she is asking COMIXMUL for the farming materials she needs to give her crops technical assistance and pay for their transport through trucks or a vehicle apt for the highway to her crops. Her plans for the future are to make her children a priority and give them an opportunity to go to school and study. This way, the can avoid problems when they integrate into society and find dignified and well paid jobs.

loans.use: to buy materials and pay for their transport to help with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Le

texts.en: Le, 43, is married and has a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband started a food store many years ago. She sells beverages and cigarettes. She is requesting a loan to repair her scooter and buy a larger quantity of cigarettes to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To repair her scooter and buy cigarettes to sell.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moisés de 61 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y con  mucho esfuerzo han logrado establecer un pequeño comedor en el cual vende variedad de platillos a sus clientes. Moisés es un hombre trabajador y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para mantener la economía del hogar. Él desea ampliar las instalaciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: lámina, madera, ladrillo, y clavos para hacer un cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en: Moisés is 61 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife. With a lot of hard work, they have been able to set up a small restaurant where he sells a variety of dishes to his customers. Moisés is a hardworking and responsible man who does everything within his reach to support his family. He wants to add on to his house and that is why he is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy the materials he needs such as: sheeting, wood, bricks, and nails to make a bedroom.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, woods, bricks and nails to make a bedroom.

loans.name: Leonor Margarita

texts.es:
Leonor tiene 38 años de edad de estado civil Unida tiene dos hijos vive el espeso y con los hijos en el Recinto Mina de Piedra perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla 30 DE NOVIEMBRE se encuentra ubicada el  recinto MINA DE PIEDRA perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Leonor se dedica a la siembra de maíz.  Solicita el préstamo para  poder comprar los fertilizantes para la siembra y para arrendar terrenos.  Las compras lo realiza en el cantón ventanas.   Su sueño es mejorar su cultivo y la producción para tener una mejor calidad de  vida. El desafío  que enfrenta es combatir contra las malezas.  En su tiempo libre la gusta pasar con su familia.
texts.en:
Leonor is 38 years old, married, and lives with her spouse and children in the Stone Quarry community in Ventanas County of Los Ríos. 

She is a part of the community bank "30 DE NOVIEMBRE," which is located in the Stone Quarry area, and works in agriculture and with livestock. 

Leonor plants corn. She is asking for this loan to be able to buy plant fertilizer and to rent land. She will make these purchases within the Ventanas community. Her dream is to improve her crop production to have a better quality of life. The challenge she faces is fighting back weeds on her land. She likes to spend her free time with family.

loans.use: to buy plant fertilizer.

loans.name: Gissela Veronica

texts.es:
Gissela vive en al ciudad de Imperial, es madre de 2 hijos los cuales son pequeños y por ellos Gissela se esfuerza mucho cada día para pode salir adelante, Gissela trabaja todos los días como jaladora de pasajeros para las combis, sus trabajo consiste en conseguir clientes para suban a las combis y micros de transporte público de su ciudad y con este humilde trabajo puede tener ingresos para los gastos de su hogar.

Gissela está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder tarrajear las paredes de su vivienda, de esta manera poder seguir mejorando su calidad de vida y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en:
Gissela lives in the city of Imperial. She is the mother of 2 children who are little. It is for them that Gissela works hard every day to be able to get ahead. Gissela works every day as a passenger wrangler for mini-buses. Her job is to get customers to get into the public transportation mini- and micro-buses in her city. With this humble job, she is able to have income to pay for the household expenses.

Gissela is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she will be able to buy construction materials to be able to plaster the walls of her house. In this way, she can continue to improve her quality of life and keep fighting to make her dream come true: finish building her house out of brick.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Andres Eduardo

texts.es:
Andres tiene 20 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con los padres en casa de ellos,vive en en el Canton Mocache Perteneciente a la Provicncia de los Rios.

La ventanilla se llama 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Sara Guerrero, perteneciente al Canton Mocache se dedican a labores Agricolas y Pecuarias.

Andres se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz esta empezando a trabajar en la agricultura. Las compras las realiza en Mocache en la feria de los dias Jueves.

Con el dinero ha podido cubrir algunas necesidades como el pago de la mano de obra y adquir algunos insumos.El credito solicito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas, semillas y una bomba para fumigar. 

La meta es trabajar mucho para tener dinero para seguir invirtiendo en la agricultura. Cuando tiene tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte con los amigos del barrio.
texts.en:
William is 20 years old.  He is single and doesn’t have any children.  He lives with his parents in their home in the Mocache Canton, Los Ríos province.  When he has free time he likes to play sports with his friends in the neighborhood.

His communal bank is called 27 de Octubre.  It is located in the Sara Guerrero area of the Mocache Canton, Los Ríos province.

William works in agriculture, sowing corn.  He is just getting started in agriculture.  He makes his purchases on Thursdays in Mocache, at the market.

With the money he has asked for, he has been able to take care of his needs such as paying labor costs and getting supplies.  The loan that he asked for is for the purchase of fertilizers, soil amendments, insecticides, seed, and a spray pump.

His goal is to work hard in order to have money to keep investing in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, soil amendments, insecticides, seeds, and a pump for spraying.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
Abel vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura, ya con ello puede salir adelante y sobre todo poder sacar a su familia adelante, sobre todo porque es padre de una niña y por ella es que cada día se esfuerza para poder brindarle una vida digna.

Abel está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que con su apoyo el podrá comprar almácigos de arroz de la Variedad IR-43 , ya que sembrara este tipo de cultivo, asimismo podrá solventar los gastos para la compra de abono, fertilizantes, trasplante de almacigo, entre otros, de esta manera podrá tener una mejor cosecha y seguirá luchando en busca de hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia”.
texts.en:
Abel lives in the city of Guadalupe. He has worked for several years in agriculture. With it, he can get ahead and above all get his family ahead. he is the father of a little girl and it is for her that he works every day to give her a dignified life.

Abel is grateful to the kiva lenders, since with their support he will be able to buy IR-43 variety rice seedlings, since he will plant that crop. He will also be able to pay the expenses of fertilizers, seedling transplant, and more. This way, he will be able to have a better harvest and keep fighting to make his big dream come true: to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and more.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada, tiene  2 hijos y vive en la comunidad de Choloma, Cortes.  Ella trabajo por varios años en una maquila, pero hace un año decidió mejor por su propio negocio para estar cerca a sus hijos. Vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Lociones y otros productos de catalogo. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante. El préstamo que solicita es por 13,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y lociones para vender. Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio y llegar a ser auto sostenible.
texts.en: María is 33 years old. she is married and has 2 children. She lives in the community of Choloma, Cortes. She worked for several years in a factory, but a year ago she decided to have her own business so that she could be close to her children. She sells women's, men's and children's clothing, lotions and other products via catalog. She sells as a street vendor. The loan she is asking for will be invested in buying clothes and lotions to sell. Her plan is to grow her business and become self supporting.

loans.use: to buy clothes and lotion to sell.

loans.name: Los Claveles Group

texts.es:
Los Claveles se formó con mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, ellas son madres jefas de familia que se unieron para ayudar a sus familias. Todas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde quieren mejorar su situación de pobreza.
Eugenia forma parte de este grupo, quien por medio de la confección está saliendo adelante. Dice que es modista desde hace ya muchos años, y que por medio de su trabajo ha dado a su familia lo que necesitan para que no les falte nada. Es una persona muy trabajara y por sobre todo luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, botones y demás, y así seguir trabajando. Agradecen todas por esta oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
Los Claveles was formed with very hardworking and enterprising women from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. They are mothers who are heads of household who got together to help their families. They are all a part of the poverty elimination program, where they want to improve their poverty situation.

Eugenia is a part of this group. Through sewing she is getting ahead. She says that she has been a seamstress for several years and through her work she has given her family what they need so they lack nothing. She is a very hardworking woman and above all a fighter. She is asking for this loan to be able to invest in buying fabrics, threads, buttons and more, so she can keep on working. All of them are grateful for this opportunity they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, buttons and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour wholesale, and canned goods, yeast, lard, etc.

loans.name: Isaac Antonio

texts.es: Isaac tiene 19 años de edad y habita junto a sus padres en casa muy humilde. Él es un joven muy trabajador quien dese hace dos años se trabaja como mesero en un restaurante cercano a su localidad. Isaac desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda y para pintar las paredes de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará: lámina galvanizada, cemento y pintura. Esta consiente de la responsabilidad que el crédito implica y se compromete a pagar las cuotas mensuales en el tiempo correspondiente.
texts.en: Isaac is 19 years old. He lives with his parents in a very humble house. He is a hardworking young man who has worked as a waiter for two years in a restaurant close to where he lives. Isaac wants to improve the conditions of his home. That is why he is asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in repairing the roof and to paint its walls. With the amount he has asked for, he will buy: galvanized sheeting, cement and paint. He is aware of the responsibility that the loan implies and he is committed to making the monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to buy: galvanized sheeting, cement and paint to repair the roof of his house and paint its walls.

loans.name: Maria Expectacion

texts.es: Doña María está muy feliz y agradecida con la cooperativa COMIXMUL por haberla apoyado con la compra de semilla de papa de calidad, abonos, insecticidas y fertilizantes para abonar y proteger sus cultivos con su primer financiamiento. Gracias a su primer financiamiento la producción obtenida fue de 70 quintales de papa de primera calidad y 30 de segunda calidad logrando un total de producción de 100 quintales producto que pudo vender a muy buen precio con los habitantes de la zona, intermediarios y demás que sobreviven del comercio. La ganancia obtenida dio lugar a poder cancelar con mucha satisfacción su primer financiamiento mismo que sirvió para poder re invertir en sus cultivos para esta temporada y pago de otros compromisos agradeciéndole a Dios una vez más por tan esperado logro. Hoy nuevamente Doña María ha decidido solicitar un segundo financiamiento con el cual podrá afinar los últimos detalles de preparación de tierra para nueva mente cultivar papa de primera calidad logrando de esta forma mayores incrementos en la producción y mayores ingresos económicos para el bienestar de su familia ya que de esta manera ella espera ser apoyada nuevamente y cumplir sus metas, propósitos y sueños.
texts.en: María is very happy and grateful to the COMIXMUL cooperative for having helped her with buying quality potato seed, fertilizer, and insecticide to fertilize and protect her crops with her first loan. Thanks to that first loan, the yield was 70 quintals of best quality potatoes and 30 of second best quality, for a total yield of 100 quintals. She was able to sell it at a good price to area residents, middlemen and others who survive by commerce. The profits she obtained led to her paying off her first loan with much satisfaction. That made her able to re-invest in her crops for this season and pay for other things. She thanks God one more time for such an awaited accomplishment. Today, María has decided to ask for a second loan so that she can finish up the last details  of soil preparation to grow best quality potatoes again. This way, she will have increased yields and more income for her family's well being. In this way, she hopes to be helped once more in reaching her goals, purposes, and dreams.

loans.use: to buy farming materials to help her vegetable crops.

loans.name: Ernestina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ernestina tiene 43 años de edad  es casada vive con su esposo y sus hijo de 19, 14 y 10 años en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
Es integrante de ventanilla 30 de Noviembre que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto mina de piedra, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Ernestina se dedica a la agricultura  a la siembra de maíz.  Solicita el crédito para la compra de los insumos y para dar mantenimiento especifico a sus siembras.
Vende sus productos en Ventanas. El sueño es mejorar su vivienda. El desafío que se enfrenta  el mal tiempo. En el tiempo libre le gusta estar con su familia.
texts.en:
Ernestina is 43 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and children (ages 19, 14, and 10) in Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.  

Ernestina is a member of the November 30th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Mina de Piedra in the canton of Ventanas.  The members are farm workers and livestock breeders.  

Ernestina is a farmer who grows corn.  She is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies so that she can apply specific maintenance treatments to her crops.  Ernestina sells her products in Ventanas.  Her dream is to improve her home.  The challenge she faces is dealing with bad weather.  

In her free time, Ernestina enjoys being with her family.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana de 50 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y su hija de 25 años de edad, ella se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir. El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Ana es una mujer increíble y muy ejemplar ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y positiva, además, muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Elabora variedad de prendas de vestir  a precios muy accesibles. También ofrece calidad en su trabajo, razón por la cual muchas personas la prefieren. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y sobre todo con clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para  invertir en su pequeño negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: telas, hilos, elástico, etc. para la elaboración de variedad de prendas de vestir. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a los clientes de tal forma que los clientes se sientan motivados a seguir solicitando sus servicios y así sus ventas e ingresos se vean incrementados. Espera lograr su objetivo y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 50 years old. she lives in a house she owns with her husband and their 25 year old daughter. She works making and selling clothing. The business is located in her house. Ana is an incredible woman and a good role model because she is hardworking, responsible and positive. In addition, many people give good references about her as a person and her work. She makes a variety of clothing items at very accessible prices. She also offers quality work and that is why many people prefer her. She has been doing this work for many years. She has done this activity for several years and has a lot of experience and above all regular customers who prefer her more every day. She has made the decision to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to invest in her small business by buying materials she needs, such as fabric, threads, elastic, etc. to make a variety of items of clothing. She does all of this in order to give her customers better service so that they will be motivated to keep asking for her services and thus her sales and income will increase. She hopes to achieve her goal and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Lidia Jeanethe

texts.es: Lidia es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 4 años. Ella es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 8 años y y su hijo de un año de edad. Con el fin de dar mayor seguridad a sus hijos solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una puerta, ventanas y balcones para la vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en: Lidia is a very hardworking woman who has earned her living through domestic services for 4 years. She is a single mother and lives in her own home with her 8 year old daughter and her one year old son. In order to give her children more security she is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying a door, windows, and balconies for the house, since due to a lack of resources she hasn't been able to do it on her own.

loans.use: to buy: a door, windows, and balconies for her house.

loans.name: Magaly Guadalupe

texts.es: Magaly de 39 años de edad, habita con sus tres hijos en casa propia su esposo vive en el extranjero y le ayuda económicamente. Magaly es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en su hogar de residencia. El negocio consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para ella lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. Ella  sueña con dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y sabe que la única fuente de ingresos es su pequeño negocio, por tanto no puede descuidarse de el, por lo que cada día trabaja duramente para por mantenerlo activo. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en su tiendita y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Magaly is 39 years old. She lives with her three children and her own house. Her husband lives abroad and helps her financially. Magaly is an enterprising woman who is a fighter. Some years ago, she decided to open a small business in her home. The business is a small store where with a lot of hard work and dedication she has been able to maintain it for several years. She has a lot of customers because for her the customers are the most important thing.  She always serves them with a smile and a lot of friendliness. That is the reason that she gained the trust of many in the area and she also has what the customers are looking for. She dreams of giving her children a better quality of life and she knows that the only source of income is her little business. That is why she can't neglect it, and every day she works hard to keep it active. It is for this reason that she was motivated to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to invest in her little store and stock it with every type of product, such as: rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergent and more attractive products for her customers. She is confident that in this way, she will be bale to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper and detergent.

loans.name: Lisseeth Consuelo

texts.es:
Lisseth vive en al ciudad de Ica, trabaja en una granja como veterinaria y gracias al fruto de su trabajo puede sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos con la ayuda de su esposo, Lisseth trabaja alrededor de 9 horas y ella  cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable.

Lisseth esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar materiales de construcción para realizar mejoras en su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, así seguir luchando para hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener un vehículo y poder darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Lisseth lives in the city of Ica. She works on a farm as a veterinarian and thanks to her work, she is able to move her two children forward with the help of her husband. Lisseth works around nine hours a day and she thinks it's going well because she's very responsible.

Lisseth is grateful to Kiva loans because their support allowed her to buy construction materials to make home improvements and improve her family's quality of life. This allows her to keep working toward her dream: to have a vehicle and provide her children with a quality education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jose Ernesto

texts.es: José es un hombre de 31 años de edad quien junto a su compañera de vida mantienen a sus hijos de 8 años y 11 años de edad.  José trabaja en su pequeño taller que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación. Elabora puertas, balcones, polines y portones y es así como se gana la vida honradamente y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Para mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de materiales como: cemento, arena, grava y láminas para encementar el piso de la vivienda que actualmente es de tierra y para cambiar unas láminas que están en mal estado.
texts.en: Jose, 31, takes care of his 8 and 11-year-old children along with his life partner. Jose works in a small workshop, which he has been able to establish in his home with much effort. He makes doors, balconies, joists, and gates. This is how he makes an honest living and supports his household. To improve his living conditions, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying materials such as cement, sand, gravel, and laminate to add a cement floor to his home and to replace some laminate that is in poor condition.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and laminate to add a cement floor to his home and to replace some laminate that is in poor condition.

loans.name: Progressive Union Group

texts.en: Lamin is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Lamin was born in northern Sierra Leone twenty-five years ago. Lamin has two children, one of whom is attending primary school. Lamin manages a telephone centre (mobile phone booth) where he make calls for people for a fee, recharges customers' mobile phone batteries for a fee and sells recharge cards.  With the help of this loan, Lamin and his group members will be able to expand their individual businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Lamin will use his share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to improve his telephone booth by buying mobile phones, recharge cards, mobile phone accessories, etc.

loans.use: to improve his telephone booth by buying mobile phones, recharge cards, mobile phone accessories, etc.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
María Santos es una mujer muy trabajadora, con muchos sueños, esperanzas, y metas, con una edad de 35 años es ama de casa y agricultora, madre de 2 hijos quienes viven en su compañía y la de su esposo. Ella tiene un grado de estudio de primaria incompleta ya que por la falta de apoyo financiero por parte de sus padres ella no pudo terminar sus estudios. Su fuente de ingresos es el cultivo de hortalizas (papa) pero en temporadas del año ellos también cultivan maíz y frijol rubros que aprendió a muy temprana edad gracias a la enseñanza de sus padres quienes son agricultores por vocación y generaciones. Son ella y su esposo quienes más se involucran en el trabajo de campo siendo el quien haga la mayor parte del trabajo pesado como lo es la preparación de tierra y ella se involucra en ocasiones ya que atiende los diferentes trabajos en el hogar así como la preparación de sus alimentos y el de su familia involucrándose al 100% en la recolección del grano y de la papa al final de la temporada. La tierra que juntos trabajan es propia la cual está ubicada a 100 metros de su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan caminando.
Doña María Santos suela con poder dar a sus hijos una excelente educación dando a ellos la oportunidad que ella no tuvo en su juventud por la falta de apoyo financiero evitando de esa manera pasen por la misma situación que ella y dando a ellos la oportunidad de mejorar su calidad de vida, la integración con mucha más facilidad en la sociedad para encontrar buenos trabajos y enfrentar la situación económica de manera favorable. Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita apoyo financiero para la compra de semilla de papa de primera calidad certificada y fertilizantes para poder dar asistencia y mayor protección para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Maria Santos is a hard-working woman with many dreams, wishes, and goals. She is a 35-year-old housewife and farmer. She is also the mother of two children, who live with her and her husband. She has one incomplete year of school, but had to leave due to a lack of finances from her parents. Her source of income comes from potatoes, but during the seasons she also plants corn and beans, which she learned from a young age when she was taught by her parents, who are farmers by vocation and family history. She and her husband are getting more involved in farming, doing the most demanding part of the work, which includes preparing the land. She does the different work in the home such as preparing food. She is 100% involved in gathering the grains and potatoes at the end of the season. The land that they work together is their own, which is located 100 meters from her house. She walks to get there.

Maria Santos wants to giver her children a great education, giving them the opportunity she didn't have when she was young due to a lack of money. This will prevent the same situation from happening to them and it will give them a better quality of life. They will integrate into society much easier to find good jobs and have a better economic situation. This is why she is requesting a loan to buy top-quality certified potato seeds and fertilizer to plant and protect its development.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and certified potato seeds to plant and harvest.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel, 68, has been a fisherman for 40 years. He is very hard-working and responsible. Every day, he sells fish to support his household. He lives in his own home with his wife and wants to add a fourth bedroom, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, cement, sand, and iron because he doesn't have the capital he needs for expenses. However, he does have the ability to make the payments for this loan.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron to build a fourth bedroom.

loans.name: Claudia Maritza

texts.es: Claudia, 37, is a single mother. She has three children and lives in the municipality of San Marcos, Santa Barbara. She works by selling merchandise such as blouses, pants, shirts, t-shirts, school supplies, plastic products, accessories, and other low-cost consumer goods. She has had this business for 5 years and 3 months, which is based in her home. She is requesting 20,000 HNL to stock up on clothing such as pants, shirts, and blouses to sell. With this loan, she hopes to gain new customers and maintain her current customer base. Her goal is to invest in more second-hand clothing to earn income and give her children a better education.

loans.use: to stock up on clothes such as pants, shirts, and blouses to sell.

loans.name: Cyndia Lizbeth

texts.es:
Cyndia vive en la ciudad de chincha, trabaja como asistente en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad y con el fruto de su trabajo puede salir adelante y mejorar cada día.

Cyndia esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comparar materiales de construcción para poder realizar mejoras en la habitación donde vive, como colocar piso, tarrajear paredes, entre otros; con lo cual mejorara su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una casa construida de material noble”.

loans.use: Para la compra de materiales de construccion

loans.name: Leonel Eduardo

texts.es: Leonel tiene 41 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a su familia. Leonel se dedica a la pesca desde hace 13 años y es así como se gana la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. Leonel es muy trabajador y responsable y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su familia desea mejorar el piso de la vivienda el cual es de cemento y desea cambiarlo por ladrillo. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo de piso y arena para hacer el cambio de piso y para repellar las paredes de la vivienda.

loans.use: Para comprar: cemento, ladrillo de piso y arena para mejorar el  piso y para repellar las paredes de la vivienda.

loans.name: Eladio Bolivar

texts.es:
Eladio tiene 62 años de edad es soltero tiene cuatro hijos todos casados, vive solo vive en el Canton Mocache Perteneciente a la Provicncia de los Rios. 

La ventanilla se llama 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Sara Guerrero, perteneciente al Canton Mocache se dedican a labores Agricolas y Pecuarias. 

Eladio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz. Las compras las realiza en Mocache en la feria de los dias Jueves. Con el dinero ha podido cubrir algunas necesidades como el pago de la mano de obra y adquirir algunos insumos. Enfrenta desafios como la competencia y la falta de agua.

El credito solicito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos semillas liquidos para la maleza. La meta es pedir a dios por la salud para seguir trabajando. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver la television y descanzar.
texts.en:
Eladio is 62 years old and is single. He has four children aged 37 (twins), 36, 34 and 30 who are all married. He lives alone in the Mocache canton belonging to the Los Ríos province. The communal bank is called "27 de octubre" [27th October] and is situated in the recinto Sara Guerrero belonging to the Mocache canton. The locals work in agriculture and livestock.

Eladio works in agriculture growing corn. He makes his purchases in Mocache at the Thursday market. With his money he has been able to cover some of his needs such as paying for labour and buying some supplies. The challenges he faces are the competition and the lack of water.

Eladio is asking for the loan to buy fertilizers, manure, seeds and weedkiller. His aim is to ask God for good health so he can continue working. In his free time he likes watching television and relaxing.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, seeds and weedkiller.

loans.name: María Virginia

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortés junto a una nieta. Doña María  se ha dedicado desde siempre a la venta de alimentos a través de una pulpería, tiene 18 años de poseer su negocio. Ella vende arroz, manteca, sopas instantáneas, cereales, medicamentos de uso común, sardinas, refrescos, pan, azúcar, café, pan, productos enlatados y golosinas.
Actualmente ha solicitado otro préstamo siendo el cuarto ciclo y es por 21,000 Lempiras, los que piensa utilizar en compra de granos básicos, azúcar, carnes, lácteos,productos de aseo y refrescos.
Su objetivo es mantener surtir su negocio para aumentar sus ventas e ingresos lo que le permite mejorar su nivel de vida.

loans.use: Compra de granos básicos, azúcar, carnes, lácteos,productos de aseo y refrescos.

loans.name: Mariela Yadira

texts.es:
Mariela es una joven de 21 años de edad, luchadora, dinámica, soltera y sin hijos, con un grado de estudio de secundaria cursado hasta el 8 octavo grado y preparándose para este nuevo año para terminar sus estudios. Ella vive en compañía de sus padres, hermanos y sobrinos siendo una familia luchadora y muy feliz la cual se dedica al trabajo de campo especializándose en el cultivo de hortalizas siendo su experiencia de más de 5 años ya que dicha actividad la aprendió en compañía de sus padres. La tierra que trabaja pertenece a sus padres involucrándose todos en ella para llevar a cabo las diferentes actividades como: limpieza, aplicación de abono, fertilizantes, riego y demás que ayudan al desarrollo crecimiento y mantenimiento del mismo. Sus clientes son los diferentes intermediarios que llegan a la zona en busca del producto. Como desafíos encontrados en el trabajo de campo son las plagas y la variación de precios en el mercado sobre los diferentes insumos que son utilizados para asistir sus cultivos así como también la variación de precios sobre la papa.
Sus planes poder terminar su educación secundaria y así poder tener acceso a los estudios universitarios, poderse preparar aún más y poder apoyar a su familia en todo lo necesario posible así como ellos lo han hecho con ella para lograr sus sueños.  
Por lo que ella hoy en día solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de hortalizas, comprar semilla certificada de papa para cultivar y así mejorar la producción y los ingresos para cumplir sus planes y sueños.

loans.use: para la compra de insumos agrícolas y semilla de papa certificada para cultivar y asistir

loans.name: Maria Daisy

texts.es: Maria de 48 años de edad, habita en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposo, Maria posee un negocio de venta de tortillas. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esa actividad razón por la cual ya es muy conocida en la zona y los clientes la prefieren por brindar un buen servicio y sobre todo higiene y buenos precios en sus tortillas. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora cada día se esfuerza para poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para dar mantenimiento de la venta de tortillas comprando maiz por mayor y cal. Tiene mucha Fe que tendrá éxito con la decisión tomada y sus condiciones de vida poco a poco se irán trasformando de manera positiva.

loans.use: comprar maiz por mayor y cal

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria  tiene una despensa, se dedica a este trabajo desde el año 2000, está casado con el Sr. Felipe, quien trabaja en ventas, ambos son unos sacrificados padres, que gracias a su esfuerzo han podido criar a sus hijos, quienes hoy ya son mayores de edad, y personas de bien.
Este préstamo lo quiere invertir en la compra de bebidas y lácteos, carne, verduras y demás y así ofrecer buen servicio y mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, lo que también le dará un mejor margen de ganancia, que lo ayudara a mejorar su nivel de vida y el de su familia.

loans.use: Comprar bebidas y lácteos, carne, verduras y demás.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Doña Trinidad, tiene 65 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene  3 hijos y vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Hace muchos años que ella se dedica a la venta de leña para cocinar, este negocio lo tiene en su casa, de donde obtiene sus ingresos.  ha obtenido varios prestamos para mantener surtido su negocio, actualmente solicita otro que  es por 25,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar mas leña para vender y con una parte pagara un saldo pendiente que tiene con una institución. Su plan es seguir trabajando para lograr la compra de un carro  para transportar la leña.
texts.en:
Trinidad is 65 years old. She is a single mother of three children. She lives in San Pedro Sula. She has been selling firewood for many years. She sells the wood at home and this is how she makes a living.

She has received different loans for her business and is now requesting another one of 25,000 lempiras [HNL]. She will buy firewood to sell and will use the rest to pay off a debt she has with an institution. Her plan is to continue working to be able to buy a cart to transport the wood.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell, and to pay off a debt she has with an institution.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 17 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiando. Rosa es muy trabajadora ya que todos los días se dedica al comercio de verduras en el mercado municipal de su localidad. Rosa solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del piso de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y grava para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43, lives with her husband and her 17-year-old son in a house of their own. Her son is a student. Rosa is a hardworking woman who sells vegetables at the local marketplace every day.

Rosa is requesting a loan from FUSAI. She will use it to improve the floor of her house. With the requested amount, she will buy cement, sand and gravel in order to start the works as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to improve the floor of her house.

loans.name: Ana Melva

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad de clima cálido y acogedor y sobretodo tiene una variedad de fauna silvestre muy hermosa y una gastronomía muy variada. Ana es una mujer que ha atravesado por omentos muy difíciles tiene 2 hijos y cuando ellos aun eran pequeños, su esposo la abandono y la dejo sola al cuidado de sus hijos. Desde ese momento se convirtió en madre y padre para ellos. Con el fin de poder tener ingresos Ana luego de mucho esfuerzo inicio su negocio de venta de productos de belleza y venta de ropa, Ana trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 12 clientes diariamente y ella cree que está saliendo adelante en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de calidad.

Ana está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo en esta oportunidad podrá comprar materiales como clavos, madera, clavos, mano de obra, entre otros para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda ya que hay muchas lluvias y originan inundaciones en su vivienda, así mejorara  su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su  más grande sueño:” tener un salón de belleza”.
texts.en:
Ana is a hardworking woman. She lives in the city of Pucallpa, which has a warm and cozy climate, beautiful wildlife and delicious food. Ana has gone through difficult moments in her life. She has two children, and they were very young when their father abandoned them. She became both a mother and a father to them.

Ana started a business with a lot of effort. She sells beauty products and clothes in order to generate income. She works around nine hours every day and supplies up to twelve customers during that time. She believes that her business is successful because she is kind to her customers, but most of all because she sells high-quality products.

Ana appreciates what Kiva lenders do for her, since this is the second time she receives their help. This time, she will buy materials such as nails and wood and will pay for labor to make some home improvements. When it rains, her house gets flooded, so she wants to improve her quality of life and fight to reach her greatest goal: to have her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies and pay for labor.

loans.name: Nelda Nohemi

texts.es: Gracias al apoyo financiero brindado por los inversionistas en la plataforma KIVA en alianza con la cooperativa COMIXMUL Nelda pudo comprar los insumos necesarios para poder asistir sus cultivos de hortalizas como abono 12-24-12, gallinaza, entre otros que dieron protección, seguridad y tranquilidad a ella y su familia para poder sacar una excelente cosecha. Gracias a este financiamiento sus cultivos mejoraron en gran manera tanto en consistencia como en tamaño logrando obtener una buena ganancia la cual le permitió cumplir con su compromiso de pago a tiempo y poder seguir gozando de los beneficios que la cooperativa COMIXMUL ofrece a los pequeños productores con tazas accesibles para poder llevar a cabo los planes y metas propuestas para el desarrollo de sus cultivos. Nuevamente Nelda ha decidido solicitar un segundo financiamiento que le permita comprar una mayor cantidad de semilla certificada de papa de primera calidad para poder aumentar la producción de papa y de esa manera lograr mayores ingresos que le permitan ir creciendo y alcanzar sus ideales para el bienestar de su familia y demás seres queridos.
texts.en:
Thanks to the financial support given by Kiva lenders through its partnership with Cooperativa COMIXMUL, Nelda could buy the supplies she needed to maintain her crops. She bought "12-24-12" fertilizer, hen droppings (as fertilizer) and other things that made her and her family feel confident about the quality of the harvest.

Thanks to this loan, her crops improved greatly, both in quantity and quality. She made good profits and was able to pay the installments on time and continue to enjoy the services provided by COMIXMUL to small farmers, such as the low interest rates they offer to help them reach their goals.

Nelda has decided to request her second loan. She wants to buy more certified, high-quality potato seeds and increase her production. This way, her income will increase and she will be able to continue growing and pursuing her goals. Her relatives and beloved ones will benefit from this too.

loans.use: to buy certified, high-quality potato seeds.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.es: Doña Isidra, tiene 54 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de frutas y mercadería. Hace aproximadamente 2 años que se dedica a la elaboración de sillas de hierro decoradas con cabuya de nylon para la venta. Ella ha mantenido varios prestamos con ODEF para inversión en sus negocios. Actualmente solicita otro préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de materiales como hierro, estaño y cabuya de nylon para la elaboración de las sillas. Su plan es obtener buenas ganancias para agrandar mas el negocio.
texts.en:
Isidra is 54 years old, married and has two children. She lives in Puerto Cortes. She used to sell fruits and other goods, but two years ago she started to make iron chairs, decorated with nylon twine.
